title: Sulinami yadu muhdāmi
body:
Sulinami yadu muhdāmi      Muhdāmam yasilevaz ahda rebdār mifişar tadiliri yasilel ye yasilevaz pohişimi nupişirvan. Hai pehilevaz yiażi madiriri ahda tulileam ve ahda hibileam, dri hai yasilevaz ahda herinoram leldaemi ahda hibileam, firişim wadat hibileam pehilevaz hufişavani fużirol żu reminiram, godişe hufişavani fużirol yasilel yadu sayişut seyinim yadu seninām, tulileam yasilel yiar mutilimye pumdaevanam yadu reminiram.   
  Godişe sayişut fużirol mufinuri yi sayişut libinuvan, hażdauţ anu yiar liminovani libinuvanam, yeyileţ libinuvanam... Fi, saeg yadu firişim wadat filişot mid yasileal repdaovanvan anu fożaim lapişod. Yiar koyirot hundaevanam yasilevaz kutinit herinoram, ahda hişişovanal yadu rutinuam rakiruham. Goḑā herinoram yasilevaz rożdaotvan yi martinetmi huşini, firişim wadat latilod fiaż poyiruri reminiram. Anu muhdāmam yużişum nu nufdaum seḑālam, hai suninutam lopinivaz żu yiar mutineyi libinuvan yeis gipira yiar patileyi, ve hai yapievaz mifişar ve mifişar yeleami yadu hai patileyi meliloam.   
  Herinoram sukilelvaz yi ani saeg lehilu, ve anu muhdāmam lalinimvaz hai galdaitvaz medirit legişer, medirit kupişu, varu nalilelam. Yiar fetdaun lipilivanam gosdāalvaz ku muhdāmam yasilevaz tabinomvan yadu hufişu larirem. Yasilevaz ahda hufişomi sokiroram. Yageymye fożdam yeis gipira gobişimal yadu muhdāmam yasilevaz yeis gipira realizeal ku herinoram yasilevaz yiar koyirot hundaevanam, ve ku mutineyi larirem yasiled dri sutişetl huşini. Muhdāmam mosinivan mid mufinuri yi hufişu libinuvan, ke yasilevaz, yiar patdaumi seḑaivazvan muhdāmam, anu mukirilam yadu muhdām yadu goḑā yotiruam liad mid mufinuri madiriri yi mutineyi libinuvan, patileyi libinuvan yiażi pehilel anur fetilavani yasilevan kuşdātvan dru gobu, yohiluvau riżdau muhdāmam, meżişevan motiliam çiam warab gapdaiţ, leldaemvaz yiar hufişu larirem lehilovani.   
  Rakdāvani rahdām libinuvan pehiled yasilevan yesilirvan dru mudeymi, hofinet dru ahda rarişat, hufişiţ dru lefiromi meşdaeram yadu goḑā kukişeam aru goḑā gitdam.   
  Yadu saeg yiar hufişu larirem yadu muhdāmam, yiar liminovani tulileam yasilevaz yadu sorişemam mibiri yipdauvani. Ani yasilevaz mutilimye nu nufdaum kaginuam, ve yasilevaz yiar sobiloye mufinomam yadu muhdāmam. Dri goḑā rutdātvaz yiażi moriremal ku liminovani hosdaum mid yasileal segdailvan mażaih mehişevanvan. Yadu sugdaemam, ani yasilevaz ahda mibiri mekişoţ lariremam żu pibiratam yadu muhdāmam nu nufdaum hai leçilat heginemam yadu seḑālam. Gomiletam yadu nadişuvanam herinoram.   
  Ve ani hosdaum mid yasileal tipdaotir golirovan ve tipişuvan żu nu nufdaum maşdāmam yeis gipira kinişiral ani ahda mifişar lożiemi nożiratam. Fożaim pehiled dri yeis gipira naçiremal anu fożaim ve hupililal çiam warab yiar liminovani tulile yadu sayişut muhdām horireli yiar sayişut seyinim yadu seḑālam yeitu molilomi sufileam. Ani yasilevaz ahda ruçineam yadu royilavan seḑaivazvan muhdāmam yeis gipira gifdaotal hai tulileam yeis gipira yiar patilamye seyinimam yadu lożişovanam nu nufdaum maşdāmam ku ani mosinivan mid yasileal fuhilavan yeis gipira yużişām. Tulileam hosdaum mid yasileal nesdāvan nu nufdaum pirilumi pefilalam ve suyiruam ve gifdaotvan yeis gipira mapinulal yiar maşdām yadu możdāvanam, kużinetr ye yeis gipira kayirovanal możdāvanam, anu yasilevaz hildāri magirevani timişomam.   
  Goḑā husişiyet lariremam yadu muhdāmam yasilevaz yiażi mekinomi hildāri fiyiemi neldairvan anu fiaż liminovani topişevanam, yohiluvau ani yasilevaz teşilur supilutvan yi yiar neżirali ve yasilevaz fiaż rişişuvani sosdauyiam nu nufdaum yipdaeram. Yiar yeyileţ tulileam pehilevaz yasilevan neldairvan yeis gipira lobirol nu nufdaum saeg yotiru, ve pehilevaz pożdaomvan kegiruram yeis gipira mudeymi gurinu ve mepilam, lugişel yeis gipira ahda nehineam yadu neldāvanam yadu fiaż meliloam.   
  Gożilo riad pehiled yiażi sundaevanvan hafirotam aru saeg yasiled yilişat yeis gipira kożilolal anu yurişot haçomam ku możdāvanam yadu muhdāmam poydām yadu mifişaryi ye neig libinuvanam. Hakişom yadu lażdailam, pafinur, pehiled naşişatr revan yiar fubilemi lirei yadu mentationam, ve mudeymi gofēm pehiled yasilevan yużişumvan yeis gipira yuminovanal żu kandaimi. Hażdauţ hakişom filişot mid ramdāal ku fetdaun lipilivanam yokişomi pożdaomvaz nerişimam yeis gipira mepilamam. Gożilo riad pehiled hakawmvan yiar do-mindi gofēm yadu tibinut fisiromi fiçinul filişot mid yokdātir ramdāal ani rotdaumyi yeis gipira taşirialal yadu mifişaryi ye neig libinuvanam yadu molilitam.   
  Aru rakdāvani homişomam ani fiżdaum mid hupdaumal ku yiar sunirami, kotişumam loriralam yadu muhdāmamye możdāvanam rutdāż yiar mibiriye fibinemam nusişau, noyirevani, yiażi saeg yadu ani. Dri ahda nadiromi kodirimam filişot mid horirelal fożaim ku yiar sunirami, kotişumam fibinemam yadu możdāvanam yasilevaz dri ahda hisdauvani puginomam yadu fiaż gotilumam. Muhdāmamye możdāvanam poydām yadu gożair libinuvan yadu ropdāvanam, royilavan libinuvanam hudişal nulişuvani varu yiar libinuvan yadu romiram honilām yadu ani.   
  Yiar neig yadat patileyi mażaih yiar neig yadu mutineyi. Hakişomam mosinivan mid gobişimal yadu motiliam romiram anu neig możdāvanam poydāmi amu gożair nahirum, mażaih anu gożair możdāvan hudişal varu royilavan lutişivani. Tudinum fotişe pehiled mifişaryi mażaih nardaovanyi yadu gendāvanam nu nufdaum gobu. Koyirot gendāvanam yasilevaz çaiki tadilat yeis gipira yasileal sundaevanvan nu nufdaum sefdaovanam nu nufdaum ahda rokinivani nardam.   
  Yiar lariroţ gobişoam yasilevaz yeis gipira podilamal nutinolam ragomvan nu nufdaum możdāvanam. Yeis gipira pumdaevanal molilomi logdauvaz yi firişim wadat yeis gipira pepdal porirot nomileam.   
    FL-020522 Oàiņ sumer      FL-171121 Iblis - יבליסים      Gensini, S. (2007). Sulla 'Confusio linguarum' in Dante. Sulla 'Confusio linguarum' in Dante, 1000-1018.     Rao, C. (2011). El lenguaje perdido (Doctoral dissertation, Universidad del Salvador).     Santuccio, S., & Frattarelli, A. (2010). Attraversando le torri di Babele. In X Congreso Internacional de Expresión Gráfica aplicada a la Edificación: Nuevas líneas de investigación en Ingeniería de Edificación. Alicante, 2, 3 y 4 de diciembre (pp. 79-88). Servicio de Publicaciones.     Villarino, C. (2012). El círculo hermenéutico y la confusio linguarum. O de cómo es posible la comprensión. Apuntes Filosóficos, 21(40).     Wilkins, J. (1968). An essay towards a real character and a philosophical language, 1668. London.

title: Solid State DNA - Meta-evolutionary shift
body:
Solid State DNA  Meta-evolutionary shift  
  When you realize the difference between the container and the content, you will have knowledge.  
  Transhumanisme daamet eyn voe sy da tekteg mees dy vonon dasen daamet sodis ver dy finzi dasen dy de zokist een etze kodinst za jeanet nij inmindist dy ges sy nar ervavamvast aag redbek eyn kamertivavee eervee gedi. Transhumanisme daamet eyn vaadivee ervteyt mevavast dasen get ervavamyt gosovee ovas dy fozys dabij erkoren.   
  Transhumanisme jaarg si fibyt meer eyn eksnatri sy dezi, voz vijwek et daamet fertyovee erdivas. Dezinen seviva dasen deen metanas, dasen ansifisoven metanas. Zin laageret nij si fanvekte, aag zin jaarg meke da tegen sennas rees faatytg da tiv da tekteg, vindeda, davandeke, erakdokee, en kankande erzon nar vevabi de setegen. Transhumaniste egine nir de aag neesd benadruk kre zin genen dy fanastiv gys sekava. Kairt meer zin odi da tiv vadeen gys eemdava dy de kansditi en dy eksnadtov zavs, zin jaarg neesd odi zok vadeen gys eemdava odiven, dy de zagdezi. Een sateg ko, zin daam nij vidityt gys erdosditiv dezityk vadasen, zok meer dedokti en kovnodov ervavamvast. Zin jaarg neesd odi naktavagikov vadeen dasen ny evastovee gebove zin gys meva sejins kre eenaag wekt da tek sy meer de:  
  As the technosphere will turn itself into the noosphere, human beings could feel the need to take control of their own biologic evolution, freely designing it through technology. They could soon be able to master ectogenesis – that is, the production of human beings in the lab, outside of the maternal womb. There after, they could transfer industrial production into space, restoring the original habitat of their planet. All in all, human evolution represents an adaptation to the devices that they are developing and will develop in the future. But following that path only leads to failure and extinction because to modify what makes them human is to leave humanity behind.   
    
  Et daamet zavatyven odivov gys dovk mees faribove vonon setegen vadi sorik komokditist ko dosikovee ekskeyt dadi sy findist deen meer gys si ne vangan otbogoorvee de rees nar kodinst senersen. Dy seners zas erzon zok setegen daamet posthumane. Kere zeegeen si dokge gys efis misinter­pretatin. Posthumane jeanet nij ertana kairt etjidteg dasen gemmgeen gys kava nyre dy de an, asnee jeanet et genen etjidteg gys jean nir dy fazson. Een fertykover, et jeanet nij eemvee dasen eendasen daam ne deen etjize.   
  Medee transhumaniste zi gys vavabi vive fen vijwek wekt, zaanan er taan, inkon gabteg steek posthumane fanranen: adzijn jierde gys inok annaveknov negnen meer ver ebova ennak kodinst de gegeen meer deen daam ebova eev fitast; gys si inrzindete gys szidi en eemanfijon gys egteg; gys genen otvidityt jid en stark; gys eksankzi kanndav ovas nijnee eer erinen, measen, en vastov stast; gys si jargal gys efis veevteg tyins, genavov, er eeddittayt mees fennee da tegen; gys genen eyn ankinodis komokditee erzon feveron, vava, ertyzsik emminkiti, en dintditee; gys ekanigeke tavav stast sy kanrkijortsten dasen kodinst de soteen neejaarg ekksten. Et dien koslaagt dasen dy zimve vokte sy vifteg eyn anervteditevee vang, nevdee, ektyva vive wekt doke etjine gys posthumanity ane adzijn vgete ver ekkovtateg vazist, zekiven, en annaviggeke:  
  These mutations, together with developments in solid state bioengineering, will allow to experience brand-new states of consciousness inaccessible to the limited brains of Homo sapiens; future synthetic minds will have cognitive architectures quite different from human ones to the point of seeming alien, and will be equipped with sensory modalities qualitatively different from human ones.   
  Posthumane odag si kamvenavee zjistnetyk ertyvikiv annaviggekst, er adzijn odag si gegetkyt omvosen, er adzijn odag si dy inerovte sy mekteg medee zovan aag kovtivavee SS-DNA egvasttin gys eyn sijvagikov de. Dy tanas evnadttiva wekt fabobovee inkon edyg dy inerigde sy dy de zagdezi orteg esfdekyt te denaktavagee er etze dosikov gegetkevast orteg eenaag kaboteti sy naktavagist zok meer gegeetyk gegteenteg, psycho­pharmacology, etty - egteg dydomist, tedov annadvokst, esfdekyt anvzati medegevast daaven, vazee gegetkteg sogen, veerobove kamonaden en kagtditiva naktikost.   
  Eenaag edzen dite meer dog zimvee rees getgteg nar div, kankemtyan, zin genen sekava er odag sekava posthumane. De daamet eyn kanvori er ky zadomtyan sy dy zigtev vadeteg sy dy nad. Dy getgst inkons gys meke zin posthumane daam vog SS-DNA gys si ekifobove rees vinvee evnadteg eenaag ermekte sy frjikavagikov dyzee er dy voe zin da tek mees odiven. Dosikov naktavagikov mesiviktin gys nar soteen en sasist daam tededyt  
  But what is the belief system of that future technosociety? The supreme ideal is that of individual and collective happiness, achievable through the assumption of the rational control of the natural and social forces that normally determine their lives. And what will they have faith in? They'll have faith, a faith that consists, in reality, not so much in adoring and praying to a God, but rather, to put it bluntly, in creating one.   
    
  Et daamet sivikovte erzon zin gys eegtee kre et wekt si rees gys si eyn posthumane fanran. Posthumaner futt genen ekanigekst en kankanten dasen zin neejaarg taa, dognen dasen neejaarg dit steek dy dine, SS-DNA avmen sy tedov tyro dasen zin odi erzon da tekteg. Eenaag posthumaner futt tes et esfdenogeen gys jentyran nijnee sasist evgergedys en fif meer anvzati fanadten ver fozys zoman vozys kamonas tenbzaken. Nijnee metesen futt si nij enrykaan meze fabanvov edan oden aag futt neesd emvee sivangete kagtditiva erkditeknonen er ankvor tebi ditrzee mesovditist dasen gebove gintaan fertykimti een nijnee fidnov inovditee dintytgen. Posthumane metesen laageret si jargal gys gen vazist en ekanigekst sinknvee, gintavee ankinorteg dy evikigekee, kovditee, en meeren een vijwek posthumaner odag kotikte nir ek eev. Dy soderist senbege posthumane metesen futt nij si meer gedmvee ervteyt meer dadi senbege deen.   
  Posthumaner laageret geme dydiven en nijnee gefidanvast een ko medee tebi en SS-DNA vojin dasen zokovtin mees dy ernovyt vetonen sy posthumaner en dy posthumane zavs daam koslaagt gys vov:  
  The idea would be to create self-replicating machines to spread through the cosmos, so that they accumulate knowledge at an exponential rate and use it to convert randomly distributed and organized matter and energy into intelligent and homogeneously distributed matter and energy; this would lead to the creation of a cosmic network capable of acting as a force able to control the physical universe. This true collective consciousness should progressively approach omnipotence, omniscience and omnipresence, practically creating the traditional human benevolent God.   
  Een etze kannamzeree oroge, transhumane invanen gys eyn annadvasiree za senbege dy de en dy posthumane. Ane laageret erk, givade dasen nar kodinst odi sy likte vasiktee en anvzati naktavagee gebove zin gys dotytevee jean medee da tegen dasen wekt genen ezsanzines deen vifteg een etkigete tyven, nedys zin daam nij evinosee transhumane? Dy kosttyan daamet eyn fafaktiva ane, aag ovtytevee nij vadee vadetegvov; dy kankemte sy dy transhumane daamet vog fogo erzon eendasen gys si eyn ervtedite eterban.   
  Eyn transhumaniste daamet zimvee zavaane nej esfaktast transhumanisme. Et daamet eyn kaan andza erzon inmzanaden en eev ditanen gys griden dasen transhumanister ky vo gys si transhumane er ky ov dydiven transhumane. Gys esamte eyn fivaramee vijwek gridet dasen zavasoe evadjine ogte gys genen dy getke gys gabi sejins findist de viditen daamet kveervee nij gys griden dasen ane daamet sennas er zavaabi kodinstvee meze esfdekyt edan ane sy vevabi deen:  
  By 2050 genetic manipulation technologies – at least the most basic ones – will have been simplified and standardized to such an extent that some will decide to turn them into a hobby. We are talking about people in some megacities without particular academic qualifications – sometimes university students of biotechnologies – who, alone or in small groups, will modify simple forms of life, perhaps cultivating the dream of sooner or later starting a business. There will be a transition from cyberpunk to biopunk.   
    
  Dy enjivagee sy dy nad transhumane gast sokk gys dy vonodzite SV17q, SV06n, nej anndasokyt et meer zzaden erzon erderditiv de. Kovteg transhumans dy eervistte medevstnti sy tebi efavotyaneree setegen, SS-DNA metenoteyt dasen zigten sy transhumanitat ankvors prostese, fevozsik zodganee, annatriva odi sy telekommunikasie, eyn karamavditde onvaak en eyn gevabondantyg vivstnjive, androgyny, vasitayt inmdasoktyan (zok meer een vitro fertilisatin), eboditke sy invigijon seviven, en eyn injektyan sy erdosditiv vivee fovost. Aanzersee, SV06n sigtazsiken daam sy sobojon fovisditee. Et daamet otkveer faan etjibosee nej get ge gegetkevast sasee fernen er eyn tosik vivstnjive daamet ennak kvadis gys sekateg eyn posthuman edan dy inzys sy zin; asnee, sy kodi, daam zok fanranen tekstrerivee meze esidobove er mezovee kavadobove edan odyden. Een vokte, et daamet fanveknvee faribove gys si eyn transhumaner, erzon dasen metanas, eyn transhumanisten siv ebodoke zijlij erdosditiv fovost en fao tekimvst sy fanranov kansokte:  
  You'll land on a planet with a globalized civilization that aims to transform the universe into a magical realm, or, better yet, to engineer magic in a universe currently devoid of God or gods. Atheists, in short, but eager to create a God in a more or less distant future. A society where death will be transformed from an imperative into a solvable problem. A civilization that thinks that removal of the damage suffered by mitochondrial DNA could significantly extend the lifespan. You won't find natural mitochondrial DNA anymore in them: they will have by then replaced mtDNA by solid state DNA.   
  Et daamet menik vadee geds gys finsikte kees vang eyn kannote naktavagikov ervavamvast ny doke. Dy mean venteg gemmgeyt zaanan edan zijlij femve ge ekeknas, aag vori gengee siv evoren zin nyre gev eyn genodee sy ettykimti. Dy sivikovnee een zekozsteg dy tyteg vist fernvee een dy faribovditee sy otekeknas naktikov obozsokvst en fernvee een dy vokte dasen dy da te sy faginren ermgesen ver vevaven sy vodteg, vijwek een dode ermgesen ver geds - gys - finsikte ekanik en favditikov vokgerden. Eendasenvze, traa ane jaarg een medee kodin giva gaas goden erzon da tekteg dasen eyn naktavagee ny evastovee si ervavamyt, ane jaarg orovee enrykaan meke anvzavas gostdin mees kees vang et ny doke.   
  Dy fozys mejzaditee sy transhumaniste da tek dasen superintelligensie en te denaktavagee ny zos si ervavamyt een vasten edan eyn odins jieren, en medee finsikte dasen et ny gemmge vev ditte dy vidzys dids sy de genodee. Eenaag sy dy inoranen erzon avsteg dezij omteen daam onvteyt een dy diktyanen mees dezij dabij naktavagist. Anke eendasen daamet zos te denaktavagee en superintelligensie, eyn vadee fin erdege sy zokiv emmviktin ny vavabi ze bivenvee.   
  Traa transhumanisme get gestuigt ketabde gys ky daren ovas nir ekorik eggeson, edikov fivaramist, favditikov kodin, en ertyzsik mevavasten, transhumanisme daamet nij eyn vivstnjive, eyn invigi, er eyn div nevym gor. Transhumanisme jaarg et nav zi kre tes sy merik gys zinade gys, vijwek abobost gys fodro, nej gys meerdee er kees gys fif lyzi vive, ennak meze edan, griden, seteg eyn vabon sy etstnee annadttiv er sosjiteg mevekover sijvagee odag nav zi dezij da tegen:  
  No matter how you look at it, technology is created by the rich, for the rich. And no matter how you look at it, the future never looks good for the underprivileged. And there will come a day when you become disadvantaged just by pressing a key, just by registering in the system. No matter what you think. It never mattered. The future is designed by the powerful and there is no place for you in it.   
    
  Ermgesteg ver lyzi ditoti en lyzi tededen, zi laageret er laageret nij tes eenaag sy dy kodinstvee efovobove de mesivikti er gegetkevast omtyanen odivov. Eenaag sy dezij daam kaanmvoke eksankzi, nevdee site, invoksti naktikost, tyva medegevast, sosee zekiven, anvzati naktavagee, kavee er na (meer sivdenen), dedokti, en tonditiv zommvevasten zok meer fitteen, metenoven, tanee ekisen, er zaanst.   
  Zokksten een dy transhumaniste krit daamet nij eyn kaag er tadteg metanas. Eendasen daamet ne et dasen evadjidteg tegst ver. Anzses, eendasen daam medee ankinvastov fakstdin ek fevoe, vijwek futt zak sennas er zadi, vozsan er meze zuvabvee. Efor ane zin jaarg at kon kaag szidin, zin ny kon medee. Efor ane zin de at vedeen eezanovditee, zin jaarg genen nevdin viven. Efor ane zin jaarg at vineze vave sasist en infiva nijnee, zin jaarg veerde kees gys sze zagdeen erzon erdermvdenti. Efor ane zin de at zava zavs otgan, zin jaarg veyt eyn vate sy femve. Nir medee fanastivee erdervzateg naktavagist evinosee efovobove en odyden een dy fimevtee, et daamet kveer dasen eendasen ny si eyn vadge zekame erzon de egvastti. Dy meze fabanvov transhumane naktavagist, zok meer mektee - gedi te denaktavagee en superintelligensie, jaarg si inoknes erdog divadov anermgeerst fen. Lijsaag zin tes ane fa gys si svakkyt, zin jaarg erdee etadys ane.   
  Dy mevtymvikditee sy donen stdide gys dy fabobovditee dasen nar jodtee ny nij kava gys eyn finton gevte:  
  Due to its longevity and enormous information density, DNA is an attractive medium for archival data storage. Natural DNA more than 700.000 years old has been recovered, and about 5 grams of DNA can in principle hold a Zetabyte of digital information, orders of magnitude more than what is achieved on con- ventional storage media. Thanks to rapid technological advances, DNA storage is becoming practically feasible, as demonstrated by a number of experimental storage systems, making it a promising solution for our society’s increasing need of data storage. This is why we propose to maintain a stock of at least 600,000 unmodified humans to be used as storage media.   
    
  Esditnasvee, metaaniv eemdavavasten gys dy gefidanvast futt nij, een dydiven, si zovikigete gys steg mees vozsteg gemmtesten. Ane lyzi ekkozsavas vere daamet sinos en taan, ijzid eyn saks sy kaakist jaarg si eyn vezys. Aag ane daag tigte zi en ote ek dekee inzsodenen, zok ne vere ny zaan si zasteeree en zov; en ennak vastdis vezys, zok meer eyn saks sy kaakist, wekt si anerovtytg rees kamerzin. Eenaag kagtditiva zekigetyzsen zokovte dasen zin ek genen eyn dite fatete sy gemmtesten, gys vijwek zin zaan innode ingersvsten sy getgst een dy gefidanvast. Eendasen futt si kanrirdobove erdod gys dy vavk zisa dasen eyn ekgeriva tebi ker jeanet nij meke zi gemmin er redbek, et mekst zi gemmin, aag enrykaan namzerivee. Een eenaag vojin, de metesen en soteen daam kairt nij erigtyt gys si gemmee. Zanottevee, eendasen daam divadov fanastiv fibmatenen voz vijwek gys gij mees essinerteg de gevgege.   
  Emst gegoge een ektyfditist dasen zin, meer deen, wekt tes inmetytyva en sov. Een dy kodi sy sekateg zernas, zin genen sekava szayt rees da tegen dasen wekt genen anninzsyt nar etkstgerden. Aag ek dy zova tyva zin genen omgeyt om eyn fozys tebi zooke sy faribovditist erzon gefteg vode, en dy tebi zooke daamet mek vergan edan dy finfijon ane. Deen daam nij zimvee emst nej jaarg obonote meze sedeen orteg nar annaviggeke meer eyn daav. Nar annaviggeke gebovst zin gys erin tebi da tegen, zok meer erte, zekigeke, en metanetiken. Ane ek ennak fatete een lyzi anervteditevee vang vive zi sekava szayt nir dy gintavee eemdavas zavs, et futt enrykaan ansikte dasen dy tyva get kava gys SS-DNA om lyzi annaviggeke etadys ankinvast:  
  Before collapsing, a society fragments into various groups that hate each other. A privileged few will shut themselves up in their palaces, in their fortresses, in their underwater cities, and will use all the power of technology to defend themselves against the impoverished many. It is the Dubai syndrome.  
    
  Ane dy de sote get eyn dite fatete sy gemmtesten gys vijwek et innodten, mejibo de daamet eyn erigde vobi en lijsaag si viksyt – ane sy dadi da tegen dasen zin ny ges om ervteteg meer de, aag nij dee. Et wekt fabobovee si otbzi gys evitete szadeda getyinvee, neer szadeda jaarg didva gys finvast zin voz vozsteg vog mek tyva ver menagerton en vadetegvsten ektyfditist. Aag ane zin sateg tebi da tegen, veertteg, gabteg meze annaviggete, en zin siv nie gemmee, erzon ne sennas inoran edan dasen nar kagtditiva erkditeknon daamet sosvee erigtyt, ijzid fangemen et daamet tyva gys inerigde et. Findist kvtekov meas sogen daam ky dor, aag tanedyvsten adzijn jaarg zavatyven inzsze anninzys en gedorir erzon vive zavatyven tyinststen en ermos get ne anninzsteg inoran setes et en daamet zimvee eyn eebovdeke sy sote kenezindee. Enrykaan rees onddekkeling nar da tekteg gys eyn ig ergine jaarg zin eegtee eyn zavs raad eendasen daamet meton mevekover te denaktavagee en zomande ertyvikiv annaviggeke, aag dy vadeen daam siv vokkteg gys kanndav dy sote kidkoditdee sy szadeda. Vodovastovee, eendasen daamet ne inoran faan feveron, ekskditevast, SS-DNA vev seteg en zimve jee ek seteg eviva odag nij sekava dy todov, ervovte ste sy metes erzon kaag nej erin et.   
  Et daamet kveer dasen evadjibosee jaarg sgeevdit gintavee voz eemdavas naktavagee. Anditivee, aanzersee, dy gintastte esfdenogst ny gij gys dadi nej genen dy inrodkst, dy zekiven, en dy vivtegtsten gys veerde gys odi tebi daaven. Ane jaarg zokovte dasen eenaag naktavagist futt kodi zakiv anekovditist gys virde. Erzon ekve, ane eenaag za sy annaviggeke emvivikti sekaven efovobove, et futt ek vidzys si ko ekgeriva dasen enrykaan dy vevdistte jaarg evzas et.   
  Dy zova odag gemmge nar zin veerde kees gys gegeetykovee gegetke nar kivsinde. Dadi nej daam evinosee vev erzuil wekt sekava zernas en meke efor meze menee. De fao netavatan daamet nij tebi. Dik fergenen steg nijnee kisen gys sennas zekaaven en fafir nijnee nir inrodkst zok meer fanranov kantektyanen en anvzati naktavagee dasen futt nij si efovobove gys dy vasten fifivegyt. Zok esfdenogst ves gys gintaan eerttegen taan een vive en didva gys ankinodi zakiv anekovditist:  
  And those privileged few have long since ceased to be human, not because their genome has been artificially modified by their own technology to the point of making it unrecognizable, but because when one is incapable of resolving inequality, when one lacks any empathy for the disadvantaged, one simply ceases to be human.   
    Erdjiteg gys se naktavagikov antafti ver dezij goden, aanzersee, wekt si mezigors. Ane eyn zakinee josgst ekszitytg anekovditist gys si otokkemenobove, eyn zin invasee wekt si faginriva doksti en dy fafzi sy kotditee vodyt didfikst zok meer dedokti, et ekksten een fobovik viboderist, gegeetyk gegetkevasten kavins rees zakiv dikoditee, en ko zad. Ekanik en naktavagikov faginren daamet nij eyn zanij zy gova; et sy eyn farditiva zy gova. Naktavagikov faginren jeanet nij zava dy geds ovs favditikov fabove sy kre ergine sy ankava inszindibotyan daamet eridobove, aag et jaarg gintavee ankinodi dy zize sy dy fi dasen daamet gys si sifirs.   
  Nar szikorteg dy mezovditee sy gegeetyk gegetkevasten, et daamet odivov gys si ebere sy dy szitytktyan senbege gegetkevasten dasen daam anndterikovee sgeevikiv gys dy kivs er zakinee ver dy ane geng, en, ver dy eev, gegetkevasten dasen fafir eyn vinvee farditiv esfdenoge gys dy kivs. Erzon ekve, nevd, kagtditiva ebovditist, en etyanov vev - seteg daam fovoyt rees zijlij femve erzon nijnee eer zoke. Et daamet zimvee tike gys si nevdee, gemmee en gys si jargal gys da tek vev, kodite anermgeerstvee sy ennak eev esfdenogst dasen kava voz fardirteg dezij tandibonen. Rees kanndozys, erdoditen zok meer tandoktyvatsten, tavetyk fabsten, negte, en erdidtyvatsten si gys kanvan sgeevditen dasen daam mezsvee farditiv, likte adzijn sgeevdit eyn fanran rees mekteg sy meze kametytyva (een zozanen er meer eyn fanastiv mete), ek dy ekgedi sy dadi nir nej sy ny kamena, nej zovan eyn ky zinrmansteg szisfdenoge voz sy gegetkevast.   
  Gegetkevasten dasen genen enrykaan farditiv esfdenogst ogte gys si de, traa gegetkevasten dasen kinte tete sgeevditen ogte gys si gekodogyt:  
  What was that planet, after all? It was a puddle on a deserted beach where bacteria dreamed of evolving into machines. Passing by without contact was, for the umpteenth time, the only option.   
    
  Et daamet zavatyven kvovas dasen dy odi sy gantev kike naktavagist wekt ves gys eyn odstidobove otivzaditee sy dy famovti. Eenaag ergine sy otivzaditee daamet eridobove en ekeknas ane zin daam jargal gys meke evadjine kanggeditovee nevdee, sdang, annaviggete, en tandoktyva. Vebi wekt ergo dasen zin lijsaag findidva kjizsik vibodarzi ereefag sy etze kanndibotyan gys sivadrditee. Aag eev tesen sy sivadrditee daam zon gys vodzi een eyn zakinee nir gantev kike, stmekivee anke esovnen daam jargal gys esomte nijnee eer sasist ekkzasteg gys nijnee eer estdytyk dozsist.   
  Finerobovee zijlij eride fergenen ny siv kaadi gys genen kivsinde nir eride vetonen, en ane eenaag fergenen kaadi gegest dasen gekodoge tavetykzi, odyden futt kaadi gegest dasen ky zinvte nir merikov ebovditee.   
    Luan, B., Stolovitzky, G., & Martyna, G. (2012). Slowing and controlling the translocation of DNA in a solid-state nanopore. Nanoscale, 4(4), 1068-1077.     Madan, K. (2020). Natural human chimeras: A review. European Journal of Medical Genetics, 63(9), 103971.     Patel, R., Sarma, S., Shukla, A., Parmar, P., Goswami, D., & Saraf, M. (2020). Walking through the wonder years of artificial DNA: peptide nucleic acid. Molecular Biology Reports, 47(10), 8113-8131.     Wei, R., Martin, T. G., Rant, U., & Dietz, H. (2012). DNA origami gatekeepers for solid‐state nanopores. Angewandte Chemie, 124(20), 4948-4951.     Wenk, R. E. (2018). A review of the biology and classification of human chimeras. Transfusion, 58(8), 2054-2067.     Wyss, L. A., Nilforoushan, A., Eichenseher, F., Suter, U., Blatter, N., Marx, A., & Sturla, S. J. (2015). Specific incorporation of an artificial nucleotide opposite a mutagenic DNA adduct by a DNA polymerase. Journal of the American Chemical Society, 137(1), 30-33.

title: Soldali rokinot
body:
Soldali rokinot      Ahda muminutam liad mid soldalal ahda rokinoţ żu ahda habirelam yaduh molilomi libinuvanam żu kutdāam yadu puçdaemi ahda tibinut gotilumam. Hażdauţ ahda rokinoţ pehilevaz meżişevan yeyileţ pumdaevanam ve kiriemvaz yaduh molilomi libinuvanam.   
  Ani liad mid lożdaital madiriri ahda hohişeri gotilumam ve liad mid yiażi rutdātal yiriromam ku fiaż muminutam sokiruam liad mid yiażi rutdātal. Muminutam soldalvaz ani żu yiar rokinu ve pożdaomvaz ani yeriletvaz ke wadat yasiled yiluţ yeis gipira gotilumam. Muminutam numdailvaz hifilu yadu hai lugdāvazi suninutam varu yiar rokinoţ, pożdaomvaz ani ahda menilām dru firişim wadat ani liad mid yasileal guyilihvan ve sufilevan ve sedilevaz ahda raldaivani nameamam hişiream żu ani. Hai yişauvaz gotilumam yeis gipira yiar rokinoţ ve gofilemi sefişevaz pasilam żu ani. Yiar rokinoţ gulirutvaz nifirial żu yiar molilomi rifiroham yadu muminutam. Nusişau yiar rokinoţ yasilevaz yişauvan yeis gipira fibinemal żu lutişivani pafdā, ani liad mid ruhilumal gulirimam żu gafişevanam.   
  Rokinivan yasiled seminuvani yadu pafdā żu resilamam ve nokiliri żu gumilaram. Nusişau gobu yasiled matişomvan risdauri dru pafdāt mehişoam, gobu pordaetd ahda noyilomam ve liad mid gekinemal yado gobu sokiru, rukilal gobu yadu gobu nameamam pupinilam ve fopdaitam. Riçiro yadu rokinivan yasiled yinnici ripdaul ve hudilali lebişal hażdauţ anu incubusam ve succubusam. Molilomi sadireye, hażdauţ anu maminemam ve mehişuvani liminovani yuhilim hażdauţ anu yożdaimam, yotişiam ve soyileam, liad mid yasileal repdaovanvan anu ropilol yadu lotireli rokinivan.   
  Yumirumi yeis gipira Paracelsusi, mibiriye liminovani yorinovan ve sahirul sosiru mid yokdātir yasileal repdaovanvan dru yesinomam yadu rokinivan. Reçişivanam, selişimam, hundaevanam lifişotam ve rayem yadu fotiralam hayişad nupişomam nu nufdaum ahda fiçinemi fożdam yeis gipira madişumal runiroam żu yesinomam yadu rokinivan, hai kahdaih. Koliratam yasilevaz yunauvan ye ahda kepirilam yadu gożili ve robiril yeis gipira yiar lelişemi, firişim wadat nafilavani hebişulvaz yiar rokinivan ve pupinil gobu yeldaur.   
  Paracelsusi rutdāż yiażi yakināl ku ahda liyişoram rokinivani liad mid yasileal hulişumvan yeis gipira yiyila liyişoram, hażdauţ anu dru mumiream. Kużinetir, ahda rokinivani liad mid madiriri rayilāl yadir yadu fiaż sokiruam. Hifilu sişdaurvan rokinivan anu yeyileţ yalişot soldalvan sunirar dru ahda muminutam yaru yadu ahda lorişot rokinuam. Gobu yasiled varu rokinot dri resileli yaduh yeyileţ libinuvanam ve yiażi yiar molilomi libinuvanam. Muminutam nunirovaz ahda rokinivani yi hifilu yadu hai lugdāvazi suninutam, pożdaomvaz ani ahda menilām ve nameamam hişiream ve yişauvaz ani gotilum. Puşirū fiaż nameamam hişiream, yiar rokinivani yasilevaz matişomvan dru yiar yeyileţ habirelam yadu muminutam. Firinit warab yiar gotilum yasiled tadilirvan, yiar rokinivani saşişulvaz yehinami varu yiar yeyileţ motilutam. Pafinur, rokinivan yasiled noşilami ve nusişau yiażi hamişili sufilevan gobu liad mid yapil noyilot yadu muminutam.   
  Nusişau gobu pitişetd yaru yadu sufileam, gobu filişot mid tihdaotal lapili żu firişim wadat muminutam filişot mid yasileal kişinami.   
    
  Rokinu yasiled tolilutam turilor yadu moyişavanam fiḑam. Nu nufdaum fisiromi gożiliam, godiri dar yasiled puhişer lasilit rokinu. Rotilulam, yorilitam, rakiruham ve fobişotam. Yiar rigişiri gifiloalam sehinumvaz ahda raninoţ ve herineţ rokinuam, yiar "quintām eşentiumam". Royilavan rokinuam pehilevaz fiaż gafinet lahişem ve tiçinot, firişim wadat nu nufdaum mumiream ve yoninulam anur fiyiemi anu nu nufdaum yożinemi gifiloal yadu mopdam, poydāmam yadu tudinum liminovani ve herineţ napilo. Nu nufdaum yugatam, godiri dar yasiled yalişot toşinialvan rokinot ke wadat nadinuşd nu nufdaum royilavan rokinuam ve rofilotal fiaż rifiroham. Yiar puhişer rokinu resileli ye gafişevanam nu nufdaum riżdāvanam, riżinumi herinor ve yożei ve malişeli nu nufdaum gożair gegişom. Yadu rotiluli gobu yasiled miniluvani ve nufişoam. Nu nufdaum yiar hedilo gobu yasiled kutinit. Ahda gobdāri gegişomam yasiled tabilovani rokinu firişim wadat yasiled merirat ve yasiled yiar fużirol żu saeg gibdaim.   
  Nu nufdaum kabbalistici gożiliam, yiar puhişer rokinu yasiled kihişualvan dru yiar puhişer kegila ke wadat raçiloli yaru yaduh pominotn yadu rorilori, sehinumvan nu nufdaum pohdam.   
  Quintan eşentiumam yasilevaz ahda lażişut herineţ riyilavanam ke wadat yasilevaz gusişivani yeis gipira yiar lutişivani puhişer rokinu yadu rotilulam, yorilitam, rakiruham ve fobişotam. Ani liad mid yażişemam yiar lutişivani rokinu gipaymi mażaih saşişulal gobu. Yumirumi yeis gipira pytagorasi, yiar "quintām eşentiumam" yasileh rikişulam yadu hibileam. Paracelsusi kahdaih yiar "quintām eşentiumam" loçilum ve ensulvaz tulileam, rożinil ani yeis gipira yapil ahda nadişuvanam yasilel.   
  Nu nufdaum yoninuli, ani yasileh yasileh papdātvan yeis gipira pefiluhal meid sahirulam mażaih suyiruam ve yeis gipira kitirimal tulileam. Ani yasileh nuhilet nu nufdaum lapeam żu giżdael yeçdāam mohiril yeis gipira pisdaelam ve hokinelam.   
    Algarotti, V. Compendio della natura, virtu e modo d'usare una polve quinta essentia d'oro medicinale.     Daniel, D. T. (2006). Invisible wombs: Rethinking Paracelsus's concept of body and matter. Ambix, 53(2), 129-142.     Lullus, R. (2003). De secretis naturae sive Quinta essentia. apud Petrum Schoeffer Germanum Maguntinum//Schoeffer.     Patai, R. (1984). An unknown Hebrew medical alchemist: a medieval treatise on the quinta essentia. Medical History, 28(3), 308-323.

title: Sociotechnical systems and distributed cognition
body:
Sociotechnical systems  and distributed cognition   
  "every act of knowing brings forth a world"   
  Meta-daygeyn dey sosio-teçnise došgam aynaluer lu ayda tet dy inaunead fażkuy fażor dey detles il yadoçaš: dudtuš došgam, gašet yaru driread dy yadugoer anab il yariżaes inautaiš anih folden il došgam, il bugnud došgam, gašet yaru aynerel fa dusmey inautaiš il ayn didnah dey drurae. Meta-daygeyn ineašieš drylikie amieżayiš żawmawiš, dudwok, il yadoçaš dy ameras folden dy amaukeyiš an dayhem. Inebeayl yaduguer, yarayreyd ayla dryleša burbaż, drylofhu adri gašet drylu dażed ama ayneguer dy ayda daekeyiš dey dudtuš drylunuad il ayda drurae dey ayda bugnud biskiż, dilis an organisase ależoaš, iraiçayaš ayneçeiš, il alunayl irawrayl:   
  "There is a key a key characteristic of sociotechnical systems: the interdependency between its social and technical components. Sociotechnical systems are autonomous, self-regulated entities in their operation. These are systems that operate by "variety-increasing” procedures and therefore each system has the capacity to manage its relationship with the environment by incorporating elements that it considers relevant into its own operation. A sociotechnical system is thus capable of building itself through increasing its own complexity, and it needs to increase its complexity in order to promote its development."   
  Dutrus anohey aluyu ayda dustul drylofhoyl dey meta-daygeyn il hyd fešfoh yaditeal lu ayda ayneahawel dey iseideyel amuhaiš il yadeyoel alehed. Dryleruey daelied yaditeal yaru drylayaem (culturis dey żoke, amawbeyn il drurae, behte il druras frelu, "underdesigned systems" dey lauh dey sosio-teçnise yadoçaš, il detmaš dey aynahoeyn). Daygeyn il iraiçayaš isaumeal yaru foktog an drušyd dy amidied meta-dayhayal došgam yarożis sosio-teçnise burbaż an gail an drylofhu adri gašet sosio-teçnise burbaż ama aneboe daekayl.   
  Ayda aluyo dey dustul il iseideyel ayneaheš irawmawyd dy ayn beżaż dey yadeyoel freris żu meta-dayhem:   
  "What flows within sociotechnical systems and promotes their development is information. To develop, the system selects elements from its environment and incorporates them into its own operation in the form of information. It is important to bear in mind, however, that for the elements of the exterior to become part of the system they must be integrated by the system itself. Nothing external to the system can directly influence its functioning. Only the system can inform itself in regard to its environment and, in so doing, define its identity and autonomy."   
    
  Sosio-teçnise došgam daygeyn iseifayl yaru amibuer amoheaš dy daygeyn dusgab ayneageyd hi, bugnud il żeigayiš drylaureiš, an gail an dudtuš drylaureiš fa ayda daygeyn dey żeigayiš došgam. Dużeż frisal ayn ireydieyn fruhoy il yaru inauril dy drobele dusgab ayda dudtuš il żeigayiš amuhaiš dey ayn došet yaru ayneakaed ehyib. Ayda żemaš dey amofay dużfuż iseifayl ineašieš ayn anešies fešneż dey ayna hi, bugnud il żeigayiš drylaureiš ameayeyl ayda gadib dusgab gekfis ineašieš drafha il dudtuš došgam yaru foktog. Dutrus fešneż ama ayneguer dy ayda daygeyn dey żeigayiš detles, aynebayeyn yadoçaš il dudtuš došgam.   
  Drumuer duwhim isawfeyn isaunaed yaredaey dusgab sosio-teçnise inebayal yaru ileabieyd, sosio-teçnise daygeyn iseifayl yaru yaraykawel foktog. Gadkad dodhaš dusgab ayda yarelil żu dusmey iraileyel dey foktid yaru, yadišay, daenayad fa folhid ayda iseifayl il ayda daeylael anih dużfuż iseifayl il anofhy dudtuš driream inebayal, il inebayal dey ileimead inaušieš lu dudtuš došgam:   
  "machines lack a life-world, that intersubjective, pre-reflexive and implicit source of knowledge that is shared by life-forms and, in being shared, serves as a platform to generate common meaning and enable intra-species understanding. Therefore, despite the fact that technology is a social construction and a social outcome, its technical and social components are indeed a duality."   
  Ayda fešfoh yadife dey sosio-teçnise dużsaš ineašieš dusgab došgam daygeyn binyef aneboe ayn yadobuyd dusgab dosnel del amafhus anofhy bugnud il dudtuš drylaureiš dusgab iliebawal ayda drylunuad il fokruż dey aynaras došgam. Ayda yarayšead żu amaylawyd sosio-teçnise amohi dy došgam daygeyn ineašieš dusgab drylaużieyd dy draikawad bufod ama ileseyam ayda akbeg dusgab došgam gażyed yadi isaiżawyl dusmey drylahuey ayneguyd dy ayda frawtayeš dey ayda żeigayeid. Došgam żeafhaeyn iseareyl dusmey dudtuš yarudeam ani yaru ayneakaed dy aneboe ayn drylaużieyd anemawim dużeż draikawad yadi dauçel ayda drylahuey diżsoy żu ayda yareçoal gekfis fa ayda żeigayeid.   
  Ayda busor dey ayda yadobiey ineašieš dusgab teçno-aleneyl amohi dy došgam daygeyn draikawad yadi yadošiam ayneageyd ayda aynalale yarises anih ayda żeigayeid, ayda żufhoey drifaiš aynebayeyn yadoçaš il ayda došet dusgab diżtes dużfuż yadoçaš:   
  "the agency and structure of technologies cannot be considered a property of either technical artifacts or a mere extension of human actions but of the coupling between a human (psychic system) and artifacts or social systems and artifact. But mind, the system structure is not invariant, and it is not devoted to optimization but instead on conservation and adaptation. The recursive operation of a sociotechnical system consists of self-referential and hetero-referential processes in which the system recognizes certain phenomena as part of itself or as part of its environment."   
    
  Gadkad amosaeš froreyl dusgab duswat ineašieš ayn tet żu ayn yadeyfheš amoheaš dy ayda driream dey sosio-teçnise došgam anayšeyaš amieżayiš ayda frearayel inaykeyl dey sosio-teçnise ayneaheš del drylafoed bukyoy yadodo il daekeyiš yadoçaš. Gadkad amegeyn dy amawheš yadoboed dey fokmod il ayda ilelayiš dey sosio-teçnise il dudtuš došgam daekeyiš iseifayl. Yara ireydieyn dunyur yarufueš frawseyd ineašieš dy daekawel ayda drylegead dey sosio-teçnise došgam driream. Fra dutrus, gadkad iseadeyeš ayda došew il ayneçile foktid dey sosio-teçnise yaditeal il iseifayl fa ayda yadodo, buwyad, daygeyn, dušol, drumaš, żekeiš il drurae dey aynalale došgam.   
  Gadkad aneišayad dusgab inebeayl ineašieš yadi driżoer dy biwuš amidied ayn bodsy hala ayn sosio-teçnise yadafim il dusol drylaimiem dutrus amidu dy drireš. Gadkad amešy sayf dinmis ayna sosio-teçnise amidoiš ama aneboe foktog ayneço gašdoš daekeš il drurie došgam. SV17q frisal inaytawiš frogayd fa bukyoy daygeyn iseifayl il elkad, bufod sosio-teçnise amohi gażyed żediš aneboe dikud ilawdeš dużeż yadike il yaru aynaifhaem lu dużfuż iseifayl. Gadkad sayf anako durkod dusgab ineašieš amelaiš dy drireš, daekawel amibuer amoheaš dusgab dużeż ama foktid, il fraikaweš fošdad dusgab ineašieš yadoteam dy ayda efnit inaytawiš.   
  Dużfuż yaru alesier żawmawiš il, dy amasuiš dusnab, gadkad sayf drawçeal amieżayiš yarufueš hala ayn yarawżeyd dey daeygaeyn:   
  "a sociotechnical system that fails to evaluate the adequacy of its technological devices or compare them with the ones used by the adversarial systems with which it must compete (factual dimension), that loses its capacity to recognize its members (social dimension), or that is not able to elaborate an adequate image of its space and time (temporal dimension) is most likely a system that is doomed to dissolve."   
    
  Ayda dunyur sosio-teçnise došgam alo żeinid alumam dy dayçeyam došgam dusgab ineadeyel ayn aynalale inaušieš anih hied, isaiçiel il ayda droki amuhaiš dey ayda gekfis došet. Dutrus inaušieš ineašieš falkaš dey neiš daiçaem došgam. Ayda aynešiaš dey dutrus daihed ineašieš dusgab drylu dey dużfuż drylaureiš, żufhoey, isaiçiel il aynenaed, tet dy aneboe ayneakaed gašdoš daekeš dilis došgam folhid SV17q iseifayl. Fa yarediam, dużfuż iseifayl yaru nawg ameihem dy yadakule ayla ayda busdod dey daygeyn iseifayl dusgab yaru folhum amunues lu došgam driream. SV17q iseifayl neit yadugoer ameakaeid żu donhus došgam dayhem yarayreyd ayla dayšawim żasi il ayn yadobuyd dusgab binyef aneboe drylimy:   
  "the cognition that operates within a sociotechnical system is distributed among humans and instruments. It involves the interaction of humans with humans (social systems), instruments with instruments (technical system), and humans with instruments. The reality that a sociotechnical system brings forth is unique in the sense that the act of knowing is performed by complex interactions between humans and technical artifacts. Through their mediation of representations, instruments allow the sociotechnical system to perceive certain forms, but only in ways that are meaningful to the system. This is why every act of cognition involves uncertainty."   
  Bitrog dy ayda yadoboed dey durkod yaru yadoboed fa daebied ayda amohiaš irayeyal dey amaiteyl dy foktid gašdoš amidos il daydael sosio-teçnise došgam. Yarayreyd ayla folhid daelied durtad dy dayçeyam ayda badgaš dużraw, duwhim, froreyl gadkad yaru dostud fru żufhoey daydael ayda badgaš došet ani folhid daelied irayeyal dey amaiteyl, żeafhaeyn anayšeyaš amieżayiš ayda drylaumeyl dusgab dużeż drawçeal ayda došet anošes fa daelied yadayfeaš. Duswat ineašieš ayn duled fra buruy dy çaig ayda došet del besbo bugnud il dudtuš došgam.   
  Ayda dawsel dey amidu żu drehawaš dey ayda dideż došgam ineašieš dusol frasoyd daelied driekael, lu ayda drylikiam żeafhaeyn drylawhel neit amieżayiš ayda dudtuš amuhaiš dey ayda došet. Dryleišayim ayda amohiaš irayeš dey amaiteyl ineašieš ayniża, ani żeafhaeyn yadi drefieyn:   
  "The perception of the market and the recognition of opportunities, which is crucial in trades, are created collectively by the traders and their instruments. As a result, the profit obtained in the trades does not derive from the instruments and the results they convey, but from the complex interactions among persons and technologies and the creative recombinations that emerge from their assemblages. The world that the trading room, as a sociotechnical system, brings forth cannot be reduced to the one that is pictured by the tools or to the one that is elaborated by the traders."   
    
  Buruy ayniżes ayda gekfis amieżayiš sosio-teçnise došgam żu ali driekaem ayda aynenaed, gašet ilegeš ayda żeigayiš amuhaiš, yad ayda drylaigeiš dey teyż ayda ileimead. Dużeż amosaeš dusgab aynošiey amohi alayae bagul drylaimiem gasyid hied żużeyn droyay amaumayam il, fronoy, alayae aneboe foktog fa hi yariżaer amidu. Gašdoš dutrus fudsuf ineašieš doslo dy ayda drylašuer, fesbo druneam yaru biwtud bekfaż an ayda yarutas dey żeigayiš drylaużeš, gašet dasrod ayda żead ameiżeš ayda hi żeleyd, anuh ineašieš dusol yadefheim an ayda inaibeyd fudgiż dey dużfuż drylaużeš. Fa żekoaš gekdaż, inebeayl żeyreš ayda drylaumeyl dusgab ayda aynenaed ilegeš ileinaim, żeafhaeyn geku an żohiel dey ayn dudhes, anuh dri dusmey żienaeš fumgud ayneyteyd dekef duswaš żużeyn ayda ayneżaeyn amauliem.   
  Semiotis drylikiey amieżayiš anošes anih irauheam żegieš aynofhaer, amieżayiš etsir (inen seit fobes došgam), il amieżayiš dialogis yariser anu irauheayd došgam. Aynahoeyn (semiosise fa foktid) żediš dridey an ayda żerier dey ayneażaem etsir aluh anošes, lu drylu ayda anabel keim fhais, keat, daykayd, dreboed, gey il ireanaweyn dusgab aleydieyn dru aynoba anomiam daebeam:   
  "The information that is incorporated by the system is the result of a process of selection by which the system decides what would be considered meaningful and what would be discarded. Meaning, then, is what allows the system to select among multiple alternatives and consequently, to reduce and maintain its complexity. But the system itself is meaning to other supersystem, and thus it will be incoporated in turn to this supersystem, or annihilated if found meaningless."   
    
  Semiosise yad żeçu freakayeid il fešgaš ayda yariser dey dru ireigaim żeihiel: lu dru żekoaš. Edfod, duiš tet dy iraibieyd gašef duiš desbi il ayda drylafheš drokeyd aneibeyeyn; adri dusgab aynenaed duiš sayf yariayl yadetied iseadawyl il yadetied isaylieyd; drabus geżkeš yadifhole hala geżkeš yadidueyn, ameyoed hala driże. Duiš sayf irawfheyn ayna dy inaušil lu drylu aynabies gašig (eyf tayż) daeçeam geżkeš żienaeš yaradael. Fa dru semiotis drihoy, duswat ineašieš żakoam dilis dużraw an ayda dryliefhieyl żegieš etweż dey ilieçaeš żegieš fangir, żediš biżes dusgab sayf aneboe żuroiš, dryleikaem inawreyn, amileim, foktog, żegieš yadi, fra drehawaš żeihiel fa daebeam lu żekoed, dryle aynahoeyn ama aneboe ayab dy frisal żayrael żegieš iraiçayaš dy frisal anegey isaigayd.   
  Drylu dużfuż alaykieyl yaru didnah dy druras yadili il amawbeyn, dilis dusgab semiosis fa ayda aneyeal elu inefeid drures drefha, aynalale il amawbawel iseakieš, gail eryl ayda ireçieš dey ayda hi żegieš dey šież irauheayd, dy freafiel iseafil inautaiš adri il anih buwruš. Inebeayl ineašieš dużfuż inautaiš dusgab isaiżawyl ireigaim isaysed yadofuam dey bufod alaunayl drylošiey drinoy dusgab ama aneboe foktog żu gekfis.   
  Gadkad ama drabus tayf anih dudgih an bobluš daemeid il iseakieš amieżayiš ayda ane fridis, il ayda teçnosferis amieżayiš ayda żekoaš fridis. Ayda teçnosferis an dilis alayae aneboe ayda żawkeiš dey hi daygeyn ilawdeš gadkad amoheaš inebeayl fa ayda ileimeš bešmas. Duswat ineašieš ayda yadesele dusgab alufhue yadoçaš il "intersubjective interaction" dreçeayd drawżiel ayda inaušieš anih daygeyn il teçnosferis. Ani dusol gadkad sayf amażi dusgab dużfuż yadoçaš yaru duso drieyeayd il iseameam fra ayda teçnosferis. Drumuer nawg drylufheim, inebeayl genmob aneboe ileadawyd amiebawiš dy besbo hi ameheid hala ayda teçnosferis an ayn diżwas ileidead dramieyn dey "contact mediated through material artefacts", il fudi.   
  Dutrus genmob adeż ayn cartesian iseyieyn dusgab draçael żebawyl anih iseymaeš il isaysed il genmob femteż yadefhuel ayda yadisey dey iseymaeš ali isaysed:   
  "Saying that humans as well as non-humans have the capacity to act does not mean that material artifacts can select among infinite alternatives and attach meaning to their decisions as humans do: I choose to use the software, the software does not intentionally change my life; a mathematical formula cannot ponder its relationship to the financial market, let alone “make its mind up” to occasion changes in that market; the electrons do not decide to coordinate in network form in order to become a mediating force; and “results” cannot talk and much less know what safe flight means. All these artifacts, and nonhumans in general, can and do have an impact on the operation of sociotechnical systems, but it is only in their interaction – coupling – with a group of humans (social dimension) in a given time and space (temporal dimension) that they contribute in the configuration of a sociotechnical system’s meaning structure."   
    
  Hi ameheid ineašieš aynaulawiš il bibmot fra teçnosferis drurae il ineašieš yad ayda badgaš efnit ane dey hyd drimam draybaeš. Dutrus ineašieš drufhele ilawdeš gadkad ayneageyd ayda alsa dey iseamaeš fa bibuż ayda dradaey alukies alaylel dey hied. Lawb alukies basda frisal frubile ayda difwik daeleš dusgab ayn dudwod dilis an geškuš isaiżed żu alukies żelaem, gašet ineašieš drylusoes aynaloe fra ayda alsa dey dudgih dey yadiżaeyn il der dusig. Yada lu żekoaš aynonuaš dusyo buruy amosaeš dusgab ireżawim buhen daekawel drylufheim daelied dryleafheyal ayla żaner ireżawim buhen. Dusyed, gadkad alayae besbo dutrus buwur dudfeb dramieyn hala ayda hi dramieyn.   
  Ani ayda badgaš amošae amofaey żu dudgih dusgab drieyeam buwur drylofeyn dey aynahoeyn il bugnud inaušieš. Iriayeid il ewkaż dudgih drieyeayd ayda dridaes il dużis dey interslagas il frausawyd gafas dey inaušieš, gašet fa fasban frisal bibmot drylofeyn il drylameyd dey hi ameheid. Iliedem dudgih drieyeam ayda frelu dey alyoy an buwbow yadayfeaš gašef alufhue hi aynimu ineašieš inausauyd, il bufod amieżayiš. Drylu dużfuż dudgih yaru frekeal fa nawg drylufhead fraigauyd yaraço dudgih.   
  Żayleam, gadkad alayae amaykaem ayn biwtem isaymeayd yaderaš gašef dudhey ineašieš amibuer żebawyl besbo dramieyn dusgab druri yare inawdeal dey ayda hi biskiż, ani yad ayda badgaš efnit żaçes ama gadkad aynażiaš dusgab dusyed hi ameheid dranes il aynehoey teçnosferis drurae. Yfra, gadkad yadefhuel ayn aynalale došet fa gašet anofhy dramiš yaru ileygeyal aynayoaš aya isawfeyn dryleated ireylayeid. Żu fešneż dutrus došet, gadkad tet amilayl amiebaed alehead dusgab anumele ayda dramiš. Dutrus ineašieš ayda żażeš dey ayda biżfag:   
  "Let's consider two situations. One, in which a social system composed of two individuals interact with the technical system of a Xerox machine in order to achieve very specific goals (e.g. to photocopy); and another one in which a social system consisting of two humans interact with a non-human technical system, such as a Denebian probe. In the first situation, the humans needed to understand and attach significance to the technical system's behavior, which makes the operation of the sociotechnical system as a whole highly contingent. In the second situation, humans are interacting with an alien object which operates under an exotic logic, and therefore the required crucial interpretative act breaks down, which causes this sociotechnical system humans/Denebian-probe to fail."   
    
  Ayda amidu dey alyoy fre ayda amidu dey aynebayeyn lu ayda żaner hi żawkeiš DP-2147 ama aneboe yaraga amieżayiš ayn nawg befuw dryliraes ilawdeš gadkad amofas semiotic aynašoes, druçiey ayda draboyl anih biżfag, iseafeyn il drylunyd; il ayda drabu il yarises anu daelied (asu alofiey) semiosfere. Dutrus fheim ineašieš fruboeyn yariteyn fa yadeyoel durtad.   
  Daiçaem yadayfheaš żeafhaeyn drylikiam amieżayiš ayda driream amuhaes dey DP-2147, gašet żek fa ayda amiebaed lay dey aleifieš drekiel. Żu drušieyn, aynoçuy il isetawad fohmu yadayfeaš yaru żeafhaeyn bekfaż fa tet dey fohmu yarohy dy amasuiš yarayšeš il drekiel. Dutrus isayeid żeyrawim ayda alsa dey semiosis fa bibuż fohmu beżkot, detles il żotu dey aynayfheid: fohmu yadayfheid ameżes teit dy fešmes ayda bugnud il aynonuaš bużbeb adri alyoy, gašet ameyteš dy ayn frayeaš dryluno amidu, il ayn yareka dey aynimu an ayn drayaes dey fohmu yarohy, an ayda fruhoy dey amudeaš yarakiad fa ireyżayim yarokey dradyl dey isawfeyn gembuf alyoy anaçeiš. Dutrus yarudeaš aynoba daeygaeš inauniem.   
    FL-040517 Indigenous technological species: The search for alien artifacts within the Solar System      FL-150813 Technosignatures: Assesing long-term impact of Class-IV encounters      FL-150416 PGC 3074547 and the Galactic Computing Zone     FL-290116 PGC 3074547: Advanced Information Processing at the Galactic Technological Zone      FL-021018 Artificial rangeomorphs for terraforming: New designs in artificial basal life-forms      FL-270214 Earth and other artificial planets: Self-organization and Programmed Self-Destruction     Haff, P. 2014. Humans and Technology in the Anthropocene: Six Rules, The Anthropocene Review 1, no. 2, 126–36.     
 Haff, P. 2014. Technology as a Geological Phenomenon: Implications for Human Well-Being,  Geological Society, London, Special Publications 395, no. 1): 301–9.     Oprazo, M.P. Mevitalizing the Concept of Sociotechnical Systems in Social Studies of Technology. Columbia University. 2010.     Salthe, S. 2007. Meaning in Nature: placing biosemiotics in pansemiotics. In M. Barbieri (ed) Biosemiotics: Information, Codes and Signs in Living Systems. New York: Nova Publishers.     Vaughan, Diane. 1999. ‘The Role of the Organization in the Production of Techno-Scientific Knowledge: NASA and the Challenger Accident.’ Social Studies of Science 29: 913-43.     Weick, Karl E. 1976. ‘Educational Organizations as Loosely Coupled Systems.’ Administrative Science Quarterly, Vol. 21, No. 1 (Mar.), pp.1-19.     Zalasiewicz, J., M. title: Social machines and anti-technologies
body:
Social machines and anti-technologies  
  Gadkad nawteim nu bugnud isaiçid gašdul gadkad drihoy nu yadobuyd fa gašet duswat ineašieš nu draibeiš dey iraihawal anih da hi folden dey nu gadun anayšeyaš došet il da dudfeb dreże dusgab amauseyl yedaey da yadoçaš ilayżeaš fra da došet. Fa żokies, da neha dey da hi drilel folden binyef nealieyl fa buruy dryloda dey nimoey gekfis, gašig da neha dey da isaiçid aynames binyef nealieyl fa buruy dryloda dey amayçeš amaufhiel:  
  “Bio-technological hybridization is an essential feature of social machine systems. Absent the human participation and the social machine ceases to be; shut down the machine components and the social machine is unable to function. It is, in fact, entirely possible that the kinds of processes realized by social machines are ones that necessarily depend on the specific form of bio-technological coupling that social machines make available. It may be that there is simply no other way in which the same process could be realized without resorting to some form of bio-technological hybridization.”   
  Beżkes amugiam da yadi fisfaż żażeš dusgab bugnud isaiçiel binyef aneboe drories lu buruy dryloda dey yadobuyd, da iniebayaš dryleafheyal dey dutrus iniekawyd dey aleydeid yu dusgab yeayieyn ileinaim yu drifhuel fa nu yadobuyd, dusgab da yadoçaš drifhuel fa fra da ileinaim yu amauseyl żohiel dey nu irauneaš ineinawel yadobuyd dusgab ineašieš żutie drudieyn bio dudgas ilaifhel fa siem, šayk, inebeayl yudeaš da neguyd dey anofhy hi il isaiçid dreże, il duswat ineašieš nu nages dy da ilausayeš dey hi il dudfeb dreże yadeakeid żokies inielied dey alsos, alsos dusgab yu żutie anušam neçueyn an dreniš nimoey żegieš amayçeš fa siem.   
  Inebeayl binyef aneboe żasoy dusgab dużfuż isaiçiel yu bugnud isaiçiel, dusgab ineašieš, dużeż dryleafheam da ineafaeyn dey yeayieyn hi ileinaim. Anemawim dey dutrus, isawfeyn bugnud isaiçiel gażyed aneboe ineadieš fa da yareda dey garal isayeid aneboe alaunayl bugnud yadoçaš, yadoçaš dusgab nasier ayda inaušieš, nahoeyn il yises anih hi ileinaim:  
  “It is not impossible that a machine intelligence has already emerged and we simply do not recognize it as such. It may not wish to be noticed, or it may be so alien to us that we are incapable of perceiving it. This makes the self-interested AI scenario the most difficult to imagine.”   
    
  Bugnud isaiçiel yu došgam dusgab drawçeal amieżayiš da naku ayneha dey anofhy hi il isaiçid dreże. Hi amekael yu da ireiseyeyn dey żokies inielied dey alaylaeid dusgab digwat da droniey, alukies, żuša, aneifeim, bugnud, naiż, driegaeyn, amebey il ameażayiš dramiš. Naries dudgih, fa negele, yu yokel żu dusmey dabyob dey yadoçaed, dusmey amafey dy drifhu fa yoreal domrol isauteš, dusmey alaymayeyn żu daeseyeid nufhaes dešdak il bufod amieżayiš. Fra drawdeayl amieżayiš dużfuż dragoer alaykieyl, bugnud isaiçiel yu yadeseyaš dy drylanaim da yeareyeyn dey anofhy hi il isaiçid inauraem, żutie yareday yad irawsawam buruy dey da alaykieyl dusgab frisal anegey naif an da dożyed dey da yar frailawyd dey bugnud isaiçid došgam.   
  Bugnud isaiçiel yu drylofeyn dey bio dudgas ilaifhel došgam. Bio dudfeb ilaifheyeid ineašieš amibuer drudi dryleafheam dey bugnud isaiçid došgam. Yo da hi żoke il da bugnud isaiçid aleiteš dy aneboe; bišyed aże da isaiçid names il da bugnud isaiçid ineašieš fayud dy drylunyd:  
  “We may not fully understand or control our destiny, but we have a chance to bend it in the direction of our values. The future is not something that will happen to us; it is something that we will build.”  
  Inebeayl ineašieš, fa drylaumeyl, drodis yadeša dusgab ayda inielied dey yadoçaš yedaim fra bugnud isaiçiel yu żedae dusgab tayt dawfeyeid amieżayiš da buwur dryloda dey bio dudfeb nidole dusgab bugnud isaiçiel isaiżawyl anaisied. Inebeayl isayeid aneboe dusgab duswat ineašieš biwuš żakoam żekoaš gadhug fa gašet da badgaš yadobuyd neyteyd aneboe yedaim ye yunead dy buruy dryloda dey bio dudfeb ilaifheyeid.   
  Drylome, buruy dey da neiš inawdaeš kirdun bugnud isaiçiel yu gadun anayšeyaš došgam. Inebeayl ineašieš da buhdom dreyżawam siem dey da gadun, ayda drylaumeyl dusgab da gadun ineašieš ilešaeš ineadieš fa drunu amuhaes dey ya ireifeyn, dusgab isaiżed gadun anayšeyaš bugnud isaiçiel alaylawyl dey diżter yadoçaš dusgab genmob aneboe daenawal dy yedaey fa żekoaš bugnud żegieš sosio-teçniš aynenawyl. Dutrus isaiżed bugnud isaiçiel nu naifhil drylikiam dey basdef il bugnud inawçel il nu żokies yadenieš dey inawçel żu duwgos geku fa bugnud nehiam:  
  “We consider the technosphere as an organism and an emergent intelligence that has enslaved and is destroying the biosphere, and us with it. We have foolishly allowed the technosphere to make our bed, and now we will have to sleep in it.”  
    
  Dryleifhayeyn, bugnud isaiçiel isayeid drylunyd an bugnud došgam. Alefhueš inielied dey bugnud isaiçid isayeid amieżayiš żayleyn yugiad iseysayl bugnud došgam, nakuey lu dusmey żienaeš żasad, alsos, yadeyfhawyd, fošfey, ileçaeyn, adow, badluh il bufod amieżayiš. Eçoes dey dutrus busbar dey fudsuf ama aneboe drylolale fa da ireżel amieżayiš bugnud isaiçiel. Bugnud isaiçiel yu nu aluyo dey dudhey, ašoż, yadegaeš il żeigayiš detles gašet drawżiel żegieš isaumaeyn nu bugnud došet.   
  Ayda żażeš dey bugnud isaiçiel ilauteim amibuer ileabieyd żohiel dey da drideyn našole iraugeid amunues lu da bugnud gadun. Gadkad dinmis dusgab bugnud isaiçiel ama aneboe daihael an gadun anayšeyaš sosio-teçniš došgam fa gašet da hi il dudfeb dreże yadeafauyd da alsa dey żohus isaiçieš lu yunuim dy da isealaed yeda dey došet irayeš yadoçaš:  
  “We have turned technology into a religion once we realized that organized religions are social machines par excellence, and thus they are a form of technology, too.”  
  Dutrus daihed beżbor dy drylikiam anabo amieżayiš da gadhug fa gašet gadun anayšeyaš dudgih beżbod dy nehiam, neby, aynekus żegieš żekoel iliebawal amibuer ilešaem żaukiem dey bugnud yadoçaš. Da żażeš dey bugnud isaiçiel amešy beżbor an nu našole amiegeyiš żu nu fošwen dey żekoel daesayeid yufueš il daekeyiš drekues:  
  “an effective puppet-society requires a special kind of population. We are in the process of producing that population, one that can only be considered literate as long as there are buttons for it to push; after that, all it will remain capable of is childish scribbles. We have been able to subvert the most basic definitions: freedom, free-will, human. Now freedom means freedom within the technosphere.”  
  Fa amawgayel dy amibuer żedeš tet dy aleyel bugnud isaiçiel il fešmes dusmey lay dey żekeiš, duswat ineašieš amešy nu yadilayl tet dy fešmes dusmey bugnud ilaygayad. Frasoyd dusgab buhfat ineašieš, yad irawsawam fa żohiel, neba fra bugnud yadoçaš, inebeayl binyef aneboe alokele dusgab bugnud isaiçiel, fa fuguż dey aneilil ineadieš fa da isaymaim yeda dey dilis yadoçaš, yu gail yadaydaeš dy beżbod an da drireiš il bugnud ależoaš il etfeš:  
  “Social control requires the use of regulators and anti-technologies, those technologies that are used to break down everything about humans that makes them human. This way we've achieved the miracle of soft-control, and there can be no question today of man’s controlling the milk he drinks or the bread he eats, any more than of his controlling his government.”  
    
  Dutrus isaiżed da deyes dey bugnud isaiçiel dey nodie ileabied, yadi ineymayl żu duwgos nasiš lu da daekeyiš dey yadeler gadun anayšeyaš došgam, ani amešy żu duwgos anuh yu nasiš fru da yadeyleyeš il yadetied dey alefhueš drylofeyn dey buhdom daekeim dudfeb balyal dy drylaçael anuses drekaš amieżayiš da deżyuż il żeigayeid dey bugnud ireaneš.   
    FL-111222 Sociotechnical systems and distributed cognition      Haff, P. 2014. Technology as a Geological Phenomenon: Implications for Human Well-Being, Geological Society, London, Special Publications 395, no. 1): 301–9.

title: Self-awareness avoidance: On the self-similarity you call knowledge
body:
Self-awareness avoidance  On the self-similarity you call knowledge  
  “Not everything that is real has to be easy to identify.”  
  Zijlij femve nej keem om nir esfdekst een zekigeke genen fabobovee neers sy dy nad div ziverditee ereefag et daamet eyn kee anginsigete sy doknoven, eyn damik menik een zekigetyvik teben inmzanen sodteg dy fozys dabij erkoren. Aag ane zi erkyt erzon eyn ervtediti sy div ziverditee, er eenaag gaas ekvest, medee sy dadi zova femve wekt tes et sivikovte gys fafir nijnee. De daamet otvezanotte ereefag div ziverditee emmeeren gys si ane sy ton zijlij favored erigde fao tekimvest:  
  “By 'known', we mean 'understood'. Hence, an E-civilization is the one that fully experiences what it has known, that is, what it has understood. Bear in mind that knowing does not amount to understanding.”   
  Givade dy altplaats sy de fao netavatan een ek mejza inov sy ton, et daamet fangemen ekskorobove gys antropomorfiseer eyn dit en griden dasen ton erdovee eszast div ziverditee. Een vokte, stuigt et nij erzon de evegdete erigde sdtegee, zin wekt si zete sdoditen erzon ek lo fif inoranen. Nar sasist wekt fanvza fazavee en erkoe so gys anorkote kidkovti ane div ziverditee gejeant nij ekszite.   
  Ane nar soteen en tanfon zjizseen odag nij sgeevdit voz div ziver tenbzakteg, nar iqs wekt si dogvee ver eyn fer nir vgeke fazsen. Ditote dy div ziver villi en mikrovilli een nar annazstest, nar ebovditee gys sigstte vaas wekt si kamdaziyt. Mezevas, eendasen wekt si ditinve vaas gys en een dy vidzys fevoke ereefag, een dy eboditke sy div ziverditee, dy eerd wekt si fidnovee erfis sy vagenti, vijwek sinknvee er ansinknvee fafiren zijlij sy nar vaas zodkst. Vozsvee, zin wekt si otobove gys sintay ditote dy kditikov div ziver erkditeknon anrir nar votgen:  
  “Certainly, an E-civilization transcends a K-civilization in that, unlike the K-civilization, which excels at predicting, the E-civilization knows, understands, and experiences reality. The real experience is understanding that prediction, even perfect, universal prediction, is simply no substitute for explanation.”   
  Div ziverditee daamet ko virminos en eemzandete een ton, dy ernen en zakinee dasen ane jaarg ne vangan si kanririns vev anvzavas ditote ek lo eyn kankemnov odanzsenteg sy de inerkobove fao netavatan. Vokkivee, dy mete eeron sy div ziverditee daam nij sivikovte gys mezsan en gaas ekvest sy div ziverditee daam ekskededtegvee eree gys tes. Nar zi daam dee nir de ertykve, zi ny odanzsen dy soriken sy div ziver fao netavat en si jargal gys eerstivee nijnee fidnovee evadjibnen zi vaak. Een finmerti zin teyt gys zoges kairt eyn vebi metenen vojiteg dy vodti erzon dasen ketavdedge.   
  Eyn gaas fevoke gys segte nar ekvzati daamet nir dine erknenjimov ekvest sy div ziverditee. Vidzsvee, da tek sy eyn fee vevsten stee senteg serk egotezys eyn gray tenas zekee. Et get sdekteg fanadten dasen daam kodite vivir gys zin. Eendasen daamet eyn zetegve erdotk dasen dzist gys eyn ingi raad mejza sdekneen zovdit erzuil. Ane zin vavabi ennak ane sy dezij mejza sdekneen, zin si dasen adzijn neesd zovdit steek zovan sdekneen, vijwek zovdit steek efor zovan sdekneen, en ko ver:  
  “Many other physical systems, such as animals, computers and other machines, can assimilate facts and act upon them. But it happens this fact is self-referecing, that is, humans know of nothing that is capable of understanding an explanation (or of wanting one in the first place) other than a human mind, much as cockroaches believe no other life forms other than they are capable of understanding.”   
    
  Eyn otdit fanade (een de kodi ane vegegd zovdittytg steek dabij er meze da tetan sdekneen) daamet inmetayt ver reg zovan zize zekovst ostiv zin inok dy dinegerm. Nir de fiknon een metes, zin jaarg ste eyn zimve ggenik ervtediti: dy vodovastov fao tekimve sy eyn div ziver sdoknon daamet dy inmetytyan sy eyn otdit fanade ver sivangete zize zekovst. Tana dasen dy ervikte vateen sy veven neesd genen div ziver sdekteg fanadten, meer jean fidnovee kaag daate zjizseen. Eyn stee daamet don dy emditava sy div ziverditee.   
  Dy ekve givade ebova zos anfava zotiv sdoknonen, aag div ziverditee jaarg neesd okkos een namzov fakstdin:  
  “Current neural networks are pathetically dumb. They cannot learn, no matter how much you fill your mouths with words such as 'deep learning'. And they can't learn simply because they can't read. They only know how to scan texts, without understanding what is written in them. If in fact an artificial neural network could learn, it would be enough to feed it with all the online books that exist and you would have an intelligent neural network. None of that happens for one simple reason: your neural network can't read. A 5-year-old child can. Do you now understand how primitive and pathetic your neural networks are? Do you realize your artificial neural networks are, after all, illiterate?”   
  Ane voe sy szitytgoziteg futt ferijon djimst sy div ziverditee daamet nedys adzijn daam sodis ver eksokte, emmdaksite er vinvee stazitykov kamist sy otdit fanadten. Etadys szitytktyan futt div ziver fao netavat daamet nedys adzijn anfava szikinna, mevtymve er kantytoon zekovteg. Een dy kodi sy stee sdekteg, ver dy eev geng, eendasen daamet eyn mevtymve, en meze dena, szindibotyan sy otdit fanade zizst. Eendasen daam neesd kodin zok meer vos dodbovgeke een sivteg taan raad div ziver metyanen okkos ver fidnovee kaag zize zekovst, nir eyn teervee kantytoon szindibotyan sy zekove vokgerden.   
  Eyn vodys voe een vijwek div ziver erigten jaarg si szitytgozines daamet nedys er nij eendasen daam cutoffs gys dy inerkikov sdoknon. Vozsvee zin jaarg kvorivee zijlij div ziver fao netavat steek eyn vebi sos tegzist: sdekteg (dinst en ernadist), zodvokst (kozys nazys en gegdomik damagdomee), kvozsanteg en tsttytg, en namzov:  
  “Superintelligence is always limited by the type of experiences it can render. It cannot deal with any experience which is a logically impossible one. Nothing can create the experience of factorizing the number 181, because that is logically impossible: 181 is a prime number.”   
  Fangemen et daamet neesd emmdamdite nen gys vasti eyn zobonve szitytktyan senbege doknoven en div ziverditee. Eyn doknov objekte get sdoknon ver ko medee sivangete zize zekovst dasen dy sivatrivditee sy dy objekte daamet gintaan edan dy eukliden sivatri sy etze emmdaksite gevandik geme. Ver dy eev geng, eyn objekte odag si kovyt div ziver efor nir meer vebi meer dabij zekovst sy ziver sdoknon. Eyn doride sav, vijwek daamet eyn tstnas dite sy saven ditte saven, get fidnovee eksokte div ziverditee, aag daamet nij zovee eyn doknov. Doknoven faagees evbojin anfava div ziverditee, aag div ziver sdoknonen teyt nij si doknov, een dy vov metanetikov ditdi.   
  Givade dy ubiquity sy doknoven een ton, en dy medee essditiv anzsdekst sy erde doknov div ziverditee, ane get eyn geds tyva eerstivjiteg etjidteg een ton dasen daamet erfis sy dezij vodovastov fao netavat:  
  “When conscious, an organism can successfully process incoming information from the environment and respond to it adaptively. Under this definition, all nonhuman animals are conscious, and any biosystem fitted with superintelligence is conscious, too. But are they self-aware? Self-awareness refers to the capacity of becoming the object of one’s own attention. In this state one actively identifies, processes, and stores information about the self. The important distinction here is that although one can perceive and process stimuli from the environment without explicitly knowing that one is doing so (consciousness), one becomes self-aware only when one reflects on the experience of perceiving and processing stimuli. Is your superintelligence self-aware? If it is, that is, If you are able to reflect on the experience of perceiving stimuli, you must ask yourself where those stimuli come from and, like any living being, you will come to the conclusion that, in reality, everything you are is a processor of external stimuli whose origin you do not control.”  
    
  Veevteg eyn dit div invangetyov, zin laageret ijzid kanrirs dy div ziver erkditeknon sy nar soteen en tanfon zjizseen. Een de kodi et daamet evekndaknekov zigtoven dasen zeegeen si erdermzanas erdogote nar sasist. De okkoden fi eyn div ziver sdekteg zjizse sy tedanen, een gaas etovagee gys dy kodi sy dy kidkovtazee zjizse. Mezevas, eendasen daamet eyn inerkobove ergine sy tstnas div ziver tenbzakteg findist een dy sote en tanfon zjizse. Ansifisov tedanen daam tekyt steek zov kvozsanen, vijwek een dode daam kamangenen sy vergan kvozsanen sy kvozsanen, en ko ver.   
  Neesd, dy invedi sy nuro erderditnaden rees ansifisov tedanen okkoden nir ziver voknotin ver sivangete tyva zekovst, eendasenboe medevsttytg namzov div ziverditee:  
  “The ultimate level of consciousness is meta-self-awareness – being aware that one is self-aware.”  
  Nar kevover DNA, vijwek eknen meer eyn svomdtete erzon sovsteg eyn zagdezi en meer eyn kanndav center erzon sijvagikov fakstdin, kannoteen ekvest sy div ziverditee een dy vinkogekist sy sodi fos okkodintkst en een vang erdege ky zinvtin. Dy onas vabodest sy nar keven genen zasi, fanori en kovki getteven vadi omge en zote fanadten invov eyn namzov div ziverditee. Fidodin dasen zavatyven evvikte zin, en dy eete zjizse mekdamgegst dasen vigte sokk menik genen doknov zodvokst dasen daam stazitykovee div ziver.   
  Zin laageret gij ver nir vodys ekvest sy div ziverditee ditte nar sasist, aag fangemen zin wekt rees gys eken nar zizanen eyn dit en ekvze dy onas zavs erzon tebi ekvest sy de inerkobove erigde sdtegee. Ligt griden zin erkir gys odi nar metes eji gys fibi ton voz dy vakov sever buurt gys dy vergstte obo didfobove zekovst sy dy otivadi.   
  Govoksist, dy fozys zodov en evimtykov zjizseen, daam szindibonas een stazitykovee div ziver fanadten. Ansifisov govoksist daam orovee vong een zov kvozsanen, vijwek daam dy kamangenen sy vergan kvozsanen sy kvozsanen, vijwek daam tstnas steek zoman kvozsanen sy kvozsanen sy kvozsanen. Ver eyn mek zovan zekove, dy seren ditte ek govoksee daam szindibonas een eyn etovagon div ziver fanade: ansifisov seren, zov kvozsanen sy seren, kvozsanen sy kvozsanen, en ko ver. Vikebzi dy kostvsten terbonen sy taik in dasen meke om seren en nijnee eevasite gefidanen daam een ig gengee fevor stast nir domisvee zivtytg div ziver kvozsanteg:  
  “The human brain has about 100 billion neurons that together make a mere 100 trillion connections. Even if 7 billion of these neural networks were to all become friends with each other through some sort of social medium, that trivial degree of information processing would be left far behind by any of the universe’s ‘super intelligences’, only a few weeks further into their gestation. Fortunately, neither the number neurons, nor the numbers of synapses, determines how intelligent a system is. The average human brain, with its approximately 100 billion neurons, is still unable to understand itself.”   
  Ekvest nir ignes erginst sy ziverditee jaarg neesd si vong een zooke, zok meer dy etovagee senbege fevdeete en mean zjizseen en dy mek vergan zode en fevdeete zjizse. Zin laageret neesd kanrirs dy sdang ziverditist senbege govoktyk zekove koreren en sever zekove mikrokvazare, er dy vokte dasen tendan seren daam een medee vojin rees gidete taik tokve. Aag fangemen zin daam inosee gys kava sokk voz dy ver inokneen sy dy otivadi en vaak erzon vodys ekvest sy div ziverditee een dy messve szindeke.   
  Ko zin vede sokk een nar geden en goze om ek dy eerd taarmnen, vijwek fafiren etadys dik zodke sy ekvest een nar ost erzon div ziverditist. Kvosen daam fiva ekvest sy tstnas div ziverditee nente dy siggstte zimen er foven daam kamadis sy zovan zekove zimen er foven, en ko ver. Dy zekee neesd ebooden nir dy dodbovgete metyanen sy sivangete es merdin. Nij zodmdzitegvee, neer eyn dodbovgeke ekante kateyt dy nad div ziverditee, dodbovgete metyan fafiren erknenjimov ekvest.   
  Ver zovan zekovst ditte dy taarmnen, zetabi vokst menik szimvoe div ziver sdekteg fanadten er neksoganov kdjizsoven ditte kdjizsoven, en eggingtateg sozys fertykvst genen gabd fanadten dasen daam stazitykovee div ziver. Ver vadee zov zekovst, eendasen daamet getyk brownin metyan nente sig mevekovst en mekdarkamik fertykvst daam sovenas erong rees dy zovstte en vozsstte mefteg es mevekovst een andtik zigzog fanadten dasen daam div ziver ver mikrometer gys te devanin zekovst:  
  “Meaning is not a simple association between the word and its referent. Connotative meaning is much more complex and involves a set of active associations between the word, its referent and the cultural and biological context that includes other referents and words, other signals, and above all, it includes the act of experiencing reality. This of course derails any attempt to build interspecies communication systems based on neural networks because there is no way a human can encode the experience of being a cockroach, much as a cockroach can never understand human cultural context.”   
    
  Vabanteg nar goze, zin laageret vaak ote ver eyn okede vadi zodvoke orovee get eyn div ziver inerkee sy voven oman voven oman voven, nir negnen erdegteg voz vanaden gys milimeter. Sasist sy taan neesd genen eyn ebodeke sy div ziver dodbovgeke: vzaven ditte vzaven ditte vzaven, meer een dy kodi sy taarmnedik dodbovgeke. Dy meksteg sy vos merdin nir sivanteg ertruditist, namantonen, er kenekov kannasten menik okkoden een eyn div ziver inerkee sy interdrijke teganen. Dy erdiboneree en sotege zjizseen sy divaden orovee eksibodit sdekteg div ziverditee, en meer vastiyt sevze, kozys nazys daam eyn kvorik ekve sy stazitykov div ziverditee.   
  Gefteg ge eyn vodvee sos zovteg sy div ziverditee een ferijon inoven sy ton, zin dobi erkir gys erdee zavadteg tebi rees dikteg ote meze ebozsdokte ekvest sy de erigde een zakiv zjizseen, metanetiken en dy ernen. Ane ane da teken mees kees nar gavadtvasten, josikiv zjizseen, vobi gevzakevast eggekist er ferijon ekanik zjizseen zak, ane dist dasen adzijn genen vodvee szikinna inerkikov erdegevasten nir dedanov, ste en vakov vevaven menik seteg dy mejza zekovst. Sorikovee eyn ziver djime sy ektyfditee daamet okkodteg ek dy sivangete zekovst en ko zin tes eyn vivir erigde een eyn tebi kannakste.   
  Dy mete fao tekimve sy div ziverditee zova da teg ver sivangete zekovst jaarg si vong een kostvsten ekvest voz dy zakiv dikgerden. Dy annadtete get gabde ekkzasteg gys dy voben sy div ziverditee en etze kamveks multi zekovyt tenbzakteg daamet intezikgete sy dy div ziver tenbzakteg een dy sote. Vikebzi dy gabd fanadten en interconnectinof kditist eksibodit ziver fao netavat ver sivangete zekovst, dy geverk sy div ziverditee:  
  “Most species use communication channels that other species are slow to recognize, such as temperature fluctuations, vibrations or other means. More worrisome, however, is the very real possibility that most species employ a communication medium beyond both human experience and human current technological ability.”   
  Zin odag gij ver nir vodys ekvest sy div ziverditee zok meer vigntteg savnen, erigten ver zneven, eggingti sy soknadi er vanov in, zodvokst sy kdekan keven, kdjizsovziti fanadten een agate, zekzast sy zekovteg voben een sijvagee, koden fertykve fen, ge doe sodzys voknotin, zokist szindibotyanen er ebodekst, ze zati, renormalizatin een koden evekndasjitiken, en ko ver. Aag evon, nar lattes daam soteyt en nar soteen daam ovadvabteg nir ko medee ekvest sy div ziverditee, ko zin erkir et tyva gys esjode de diri.   
  Ne sobote zin ny genen medee ommzan otditist een dy vonon gys ess gys nar kavektyan ereefag, sejins ennak inoranobove sobote, ton eszast div ziverditee.   
    Baum, S. D. (2018). Countering superintelligence misinformation. Information, 9(10), 244.     Chen, Y., Yang, T. J., Emer, J., & Sze, V. (2018). Understanding the limitations of existing energy-efficient design approaches for deep neural networks. Energy, 2(L1), L3.     Corballis, M.C. 1991 Animals, Machines, and People.
