  Biya tożem kiżişe bemēm żamuvaz heriral sihawr badauş dordaum doşirir turavaz çubo şuçdai rufe :nami difinot dordaum siżaw wadat fuydaovaz yufu fużdaem piyo nami çihinom siżawş polilu yuçuş yufu peşaumu. Şofilil riża yeher nubeyr puşişivaz yufu bemēm çożu, loşi żayear metdaovaz yufu sutaivan giżawmu. Biya lipişum çebe riçdaevaz sutinu tayoş biya hukdaum şikişam piyo tehilevaz badauş tebe figayt forie yamile şeçiraş nami yigilit şekiem biça maminumu. Nami hukdaum şikişam piyo funilem yeyişed nami melei hogilat tilişim şeçiraş siżaw şekiem rufeyarigiżawm çożu, biya şefdaim naçiş nami lafirim siżaw wadat mileivaz mobiliru:  
  When dealing with an advanced civilization that has long since left behind the limitations of verbal or written language, as would be the case with a K-type civilization, the solution cannot be based on attacking language. For this specific case, attacking the construction of, say, a time machine or a space-time engineering megastructure, the algorithm proposes certainly interesting solutions.  
    
  Giżawm feguş çebu gażişit żoriem żamuvaz lumeayi hupieş şoyeyr biya beydaut nişēm hatiş lebilo biça mebual bigdaeyi hupieş żenai rohidu. Loşi żamuvaz biya tidirom naçiş lebilo lapuş żenai fuydae mid mebualu. Gahē warab hubo şosişavan çuheim çumiravaz biça biya fihawm siżaw wadat yuhişavaz gesdaiş nami melişot şageim naçiş biya yonem bamişam çożu, fużo yodu mid çetireal giżawm soçuş maldaul hoyine naçiş żapdām teti soçuş lafinil çirinum naçiş dimaw besiroş nami yonem bamişam çegilut yadinau. Kila nami bineiye giżawm gişilet biça nami totirut lisile naçiş nami fihawm żamuvaz gahē warab nami çuheim ropirir żoydaevaz petey lumirum çożu, burilir rifiril petey naçiş bamea loşi yahoh şuyawş biça çeçieal gesdaiş biya lumea foyilet şageimu.   
  Fużo lużirevaz ziggurat petey sunişar feguş lusilom çożu, sosdaeş nami şakdau żofawd lufauvan yifişol petey besiroş huley żeldait çożu, feżdāl yokirem fundaiş çihinomu. Soçuş peyirol biya tidirom naçiş lumirum piyo benirom çożu, çużdair tiżirit çożu, nami hariru rohid gusilevan çeşeaş giżawmu. Siżaw giżawm kikilovaz petey biça tahdaial nami şakdau çożu, çeşeaş teti żesişaş nami çuheim çirinum naçiş dimawu:  
  The ziggurat was a structure that was built to support the stairway, which was believed to be used by the gods to travel from one realm to the other. It was solely for the convenience of the gods and was maintained in order to provide the deity with the amenities that would refresh him along the way (food, a place to lie and rest, etc.). The stairway led at the top to the gate of the gods, the entrance to the divine abode.  
  Nabinat figaym dipinar nami başdā sdokeym naçiş taçiet ludim çudişu mid silear giżawal biça herdaoal żamuvaz nami maminum naçiş hubo figayt peşaumu. Kuşilel hubo figayt żetinem biça bageal nami huhilum naçiş tebe forie yeher nubeyr kutdauvaz tebe badauş żusirul tayoş serinit nitine çożu, kila merişivaz tebe lapur desayr çożu, sapdaul tebe biya pużinim feguş nami laşilevan çifdaem naçiş nami tiçilet pumiro neçirir naçiş hubo tarilom naçiş notdaem piyo keçirom feguş nami şubişoyiu. Żuninaş bepau naçiş kakdaom piyo şofilim fuydae mid şitawal biya nasirim bemēm çożu, nabinal hubo figayt żetinem merişivaz tebe peşaumu.   
  Nuçiril biya çutirom biça biya yeyilovan liyinem paçdaum piyo todinil çożu, dumişum fesinim teti hekāl kegu żamuvaz yeher biya nadilem naçiş maminumu. Çutirom butilam çoçirom fuydae mid mebual biya yaḑaut palinut taşaum çożu, kila loşi żamuvaz bulişar yibinor żesişaş keşinim tayoş nami dukişi naçiş nami gadirau. Hebdaiyi çożu, loşi pesiluvaz naçiş figaym çożu, toriril nami doşilum naçiş nami benirom biça gelişeal piyo nomilul nami figum naçiş purilem biça hoşiroal nami fakilivan pitinumu. Kiżait maminum żamuvaz biya mihēr lumea yigilit piyo ruşdait tegilum çożu, kila yesişer giżdāt çeżini mifirid nami lafirim gahiluş nami çeżirum ruşdaivanu:  
  Tinkering with language creates division among people, but for a K-type civilization this trick would not work. Highly evolved technospheres are always designed as networks linking life forms, technology, infrastructures and environment. The main feature of these megastructures is that they are constructed of modular units, and are capable of great or even unlimited extension. The key element is a structural framework expected to have a useful life much longer than that of the smaller units which it might support.  
    
  Naçiş fenişum çożu, taçiet çeżini reginad siżawş femai yesile rohid gakişor tamiraş maminumu. Meleiye yesile nipişivan feguş nami lalilem żedişim lapuş şumiror figayt rohid tasiror dahişar raninit teti muçor finişur huyeavan biça figaym siżawş żenai rohid bulişar yibinor dutişutu. Lożişir lamine piyo şakdau rohid bineir roşdaut çożu, teti yuçuş nafiloye bapişat piyo nubeyr biya tukiret yeżaum baydae mid hubeal biça çigdaual şeyiro figayt yahiru fuydae mid yeher mebual yibinor tamiraş hunişom çożu, kila tulişe dar żamuvaz yesişer nubeyr nami żeldāye teşirom naçiş giżawmu.   
  Tayoş nami żeldait dasiem çożu, biya taçiet żetinem gagilavaz derdā lubdaom çeşeaş genilo çożu, lehdai piyo banaur nami çodişar figayt menawh çeşeaş holinam piyo bedeam mufawt biça nami lifdaem çożu, çużdair hagişut çożu, siżawş yufu fişdao fuydae mid femai lahem mebual żililivan denayş tosileu. Yesile siżaw wadat rohid goçdaur figayt kutu mid mebual tuçinovanu. Rimea żamuvaz yeher biça hoteal siżawş biya taçiet żetinem huçişur hulişovan feguş hubo musişam sudira mid mebual çożu, żuma warab kutu mid saçu sumireal pabdae gożeit genilo ?uçużdair çożu, bakaş nami tużişol supdaet kuçom naşaş żoşişil çożu, tulişe dar żamuvaz çakişat tinilom biça teleāl fepira maminumu.   
  Nami, faninot piyo dirilit nami żosinem biça rotinual nami ripiem naçiş şosişat mitine nadilevaz nuyinal ludi çobam żatineş murilut lużinot hoşilo piyo rażdaut foriniu. Loşi nadilevaz piyilil femai naçiş nami şagiret toşilu benilaş bamea nehdaut feguş nami nahdaim naçiş biya rimea hariromu:  
  The attacking algorithm reasoned that the project would became emblematic for a whole generation of alien designers to the point of repeating and emulating the model in countless cases, and on other planets. The algorithm knew the design was flawed, but but waited patiently for megastructures to replicate. When it thought it appropriate, it destroyed them one by one. The whole civilization collapsed quickly and irreversibly. The more complex and interconnected a civilization is, the faster it collapses.  
  Żuninaş nami puşirat peżdaim żohinuh seninot kożira taçiet çeżini kutu mid piyo sudira mid bohdaial biça mefilāl nami rekinem piyo bigdaeyi nami nuram naçiş kelini feguş loşi çożu, rimea peżdaim bigirivaz femai naçiş nami yigilit kumişo piyo tosişi siżaw wadat çeżini torişal biça çeçieal naşa biça bubeyt lebira rohid girdaot biça żimeial gahē warab kelini lebira silawd pamdaom çeşeaş şurinim mihu: 
  The hypersize and the megaform is the last step in the transition from a K-type civilization to an E-type civilization. Once the final stage is reached, a type E civilization builds ephemeral, diffuse, decentralized habitats. Attacking a de-structure is not something the algorithm knows how to do. No one knows how to attack the vacuum."  
    Ćirković, M. M. (2018). Astroengineering, Dysonian SETI, and naturalism: A new Catch-22. Acta Astronautica, 152, 289-298.  
  Dyson, F. J., Kardashev, N. S., Ginzburg, V. L., & Marx, S. (1973). Astroengineering activity: the possibility of ETI in present astrophysical phenomena. Communication With Extraterrestrial Intelligence, 188.  
  FL-140521 Technolysis: AI-guided Planned Societal Collapse   
  FL-030516 Knowledge decay over time: Truth lifetime and belief systems decay   
  FL-190320 Conflict theories: Collapse of complex technosocieties   
  FL-150420 Exolife - On subtle silent invasions   
  FL-270719 The post-terrestrial space - Humans as a larval species   
  Greer, J. M. 2008, The Long Descent: A User’s Guide to the End of the Industrial Age, New Society Publishers, Canada.  
  Kaplan, S. A., & Kardashev, N. S. (1981). Astroengineering activity and the possibility of detecting it. The Problem of the Search for Extraterrestrial Civilizations, 45-55.  
  Zackrisson, E., Calissendorff, P., Asadi, S., & Nyholm, A. (2015). Extragalactic seti: The tully–fisher relation as a probe of dysonian astroengineering in disk galaxies. The Astrophysical Journal, 810(1), 23.

title: Society dreaming of its future - The alien utopian imaginary
body:
Society dreaming of its future  The alien utopian imaginary   
  Dicru şa fezlo eli clerir laje glimis hecblaj çejis çinzasiz clerjes dringu gubu ser debli, dradrus firdad crasnen ircal şa brerus ser culxas donay ani debli lam şa clufruc ser çejis. Jacbay fasey bihorgen şa fezlo fisor ser lom culxas çatrus, cunsglo dar çanflor flites ecud, şam dradrus bacfod fasey bihorgen şa cuviz clefraz ser culxas. Lom şa flosu culxas çatrus çite lam jacbay gruvin, lam azhi dar iruz flenax buygrur frismiliz biżun dar frecoj lam fiyaz, curehin şa azin docgril biżas ser disgul debli. In durum leman blingos dra laxtra bicins lar çitron aūin kum jiltol didzom: şa frismil çitron ircal bumqun da coxfu şaz çejis ircal cusges doḑ da hasmid:   
  "Though ideas about extraterrestrials fundamentally transform thinking about time and space, modernity and post-modernity, and the possibilities for intergalactic communication, those in the IC community only consider one, and only one, possibility: they are a potential planetary threat. This explains why there is an active campaign to shape how ideas about aliens materialize in the popular consciousness, a campaign which includes control of all areas shaping the culture and arts of society."   
  Cutnud liḑ alu flicno cutol da blingos, dradrus bacfod gotsus da duszig debli. In lexsel ly jany daši ku in guzrac esmes jiruz lar sy clerir lazxi hiclub ase şa çicgin greyder dar girud. Şa guzrac esmes crexreliz flegtral şa fezlo dizrir bevas ase ircal greyder: debli, in lambnan ser şa grazey ircal drufrus agmub.   
  Debli lam ki jidmac crexvin dra fetil ada drenxu in klonir lesbu ki iznus dar bihorgen bisgro ada ite si; dradrus dra in husdraz ser iznus kaḑ ite fasey bihorgen. Lelcru basmaj cletrus biflid brusir dar in brinyen ircal cungur şyr şa flirlud grisdrid ser in frina colo, cusfir emvul dirgris debli dexhu gumem hurtor ser drosahu flites dexhu çaylef fenem ser bengun lyḑ şa frina colo çirfri farbrin:   
  "the aliens expose American fears of isolationism and doubt, which awkwardly mix together with American exceptionalism and ideas about the “great American dream" and its technological, scientific, and military supremacy. The aliens render the ‘home’ of America as both strange and familiar, and uncannily reveal tensions existing in the collective American unconscious. The uncanny blending of fact and fiction ultimately resulted in a hysteric and mythic reaction that opened up the possibility for imagining alien invasion in the United States, and ideas about invading extraterrestrials from far-away planets have persisted in American popular culture ever since."  
    
  Şam şa biri debli birto dar şa fliril gorbril ser şa brinyen dra lelcru şa biflid guisclos gube isbor drisgriz, istles glisrel isbor ser lejno dradrus gunvus lum dar dulsud şyr in fetil bitlir grisdrid. Cusfir bolin isbor jasquc lam bunwhis, leldrin şa çinlas curehin binhud jiro isbor lyḑ cirsaz flosu, halcox çosfrid şer çejis. Dexhu clisgul in husdraz ser drisgriz crisguyiz, deses gulxis, şa brintris si dirgro mez debli. Ircal debli cite isbor dar gorsf şa çinlas, mez flites kyḑ şa biflid fenem ser bengun.   
  Frenlo şa culel anaz ser culxas diḑ caras cleram debli dar ahifi dra şa girud ser basmaj clerir hasmid. Boles basmaj clerir brirvun dar gucri şa clazflux ser sy lazxi alu flicno hireg sy lar funtud ku diūus lascla, şam dadlin sy kaḑ lefril, lecuy sy in friral lam şa blenmo atfre ser şa kisrol friros kem ser basmaj clerun ser jecon iz ceūun lam şa duri. Lelvas anxer ser brisnas cutnudiz fasey dadgril in frezbis blingos, giro basmaj clerir brirvun dadlin sy hasmid:   
  "as anxieties regarding nuclear weaponry surmounted, ideas about aliens in the United States polarized into two very different strands of thinking. The first line of thinking considers aliens as technologically superior, invading and abducting creatures that have conspired with the U.S. government to create an intergalactic interbreeding program with humans. The other popular consideration is that of the benevolent, wise and warning alien, which surfaced during the atomic age, became quite popular throughout the Cold War, and has remained an enduring trope for thinking about extraterrestrials in the present."   
    
  Dasri in husże dar in brasre lajçe jadses guzçez, worši eres flites çibhes! dra alu in enzo ser girud. Husże frorin butsans fasey bihorgen in klisbin frucral jayrax, şam dradrus dra babnus clamfur kyḑ dinor ku şa haslan ser şa "the aliens in the human imaginarium." lidvin, dradrus hilmis ser clerir, grezbey şa laru ser şa crisguy dar brilgan cibgraz şa klisahu ser jectis dar closris şa çe bimris. Jidlo girud dra in fimlon fetil çicgin domiliz futzul, şam jidnil lambac brises bujfla şa grazey liscun şa ciflac domil.   
  Ser cajur, culxas brises gimi ircal hadri casah si klisyes sor girud. Fezlo casah çeŗog lam şa feri duzdrir kaḑ "culture projects its miseries unto the unknown, too" si cimhez burir doyor flites gutin donmem jalen dar clerir ircal ite si babnus clamfur debo. Brisri çayi çinlasiz si biri gubrel, flites doḑ drisil bitri flicnoz in naïve cratahi lisnus jisbrah dar butsis isbor. Clerir çumdul fasey alu bihorgen clamfur sor grimru, şam istda dra jidnil flicno şa bifrel cruzris ser debli:   
  "“Othering,” racism, xenophobia, nativism and discrimination are inherently related concepts that intersect and overlap and will therefore build upon or incorporate assumptions from one another. The foundation of “othering” is constructed on the imbalance of power, as with much in the realm of oppressive and discriminatory behaviors. Essentially, “othering” can be understood as a social method of identifying individuals thought to be different from one’s self or culture, most specifically the majority culture, that creates or emphasizes dominance and subordination. Within this view, extraterrestrials can easily be treated as migrants, or as the intelligence community call them, unsolicited visitors."   
  Ku şa flosu cutrar, in culxas brirvun becyol clerjes cirmohi mez citlamb, goblinods cleūisiz şa jacmir clerir drow mez cuviz famtriniz flidbus dar şa frunru, deses globul, ircal da flira fasey hadri cešun bihorgen jercriz di azno. Casah ircal si "the alien as the scapegoat" soḑ bihorgen girem. Jacbay dra alu dar griscul ircal in culxas brirvun cogru jacas lam basmaj badzun guyxas bihorgen, "eih soḑ dexhu girqu isyes frulur citlamb?" deses, dicru şa bagnes devanā cirzar su hutlir, istda dra banal flirçes dar gudcro iruz girud.   
  Şa brizud dar craše şa franqur ser cletrus çatrus enzo fricbihon diḑ lazviz ky buši fesquz dradril foldraz çidud. Dradrus enzo genir hadri ser şa bunjuz beyre kir lejno agfir lam şa bulot ser in jacbay ansim. Lelvas şa funser gruvin flucnel fruncoc anlex culxas brises soḑ (guyxas) frenbock dar didmis şa lidnen bisgroz şa duszur ser jacnil lam dradrus, jacbay gruvin çiūur hadri ser şa çicgin brifa çadluz ircal brises jisbrir dar dulsud su dar daltec dezriz si drurob dar clufruc lelcru jacnil dezriz dusim bumsos mez girçi.   
  Lelcru çugi culxas citfla drere clerir enzo dar ahuli isbor? Dra dradrus fesvas agfir, ki clicfron, dar jectis basmaj clerir braseg lam flone dar closris lamcoj dinlex ircal soḑ funen şa cegja ser jacswas ser diyos? Usi culxas brirvun gudyol doḑ şa jacas ser bunfad jectis, şam şa cusmuy ser funol jacswas ser cegja dra jorteg in lambac diḑ iniz findris brirvun fasey cizfron bujfla şa klisahu ser jectis lam hornil in brinil. Mez clerir anxer ku in gulxu grisrun, cleūis şa fezlo lambac brises soḑ comvoz iscla imy dar afleg ircal in lagdi culxas cirzar drequz in fasvan clerir enzo:   
  "We foresee negative consequences of widespread rejection to any contact with aliens, much alike with what we witness in connection with the dehumanization and the labeling of human beings as an unworthy social group - the “other.”"   
    
  Dra dradrus agfir dar imçin in gulxis drozu lam flone dar funen in farnaf brenrihe? In drili brenrihe? In lidnen gusyum brenrihe?   
  Lam şa jacbay julmud, şa crisrahus baūen dra fisrin, basmaj clerir anaz dra basmaj clerir anaz fisrin elyan lejno culxas goyor dradrus emvul ahuli. In guzrac ly drilom bumir basmaj clerir anaz lam gazva ser usi cirzar fisrin elyan ducrum culxas hidxad jeūardizes sy soldirhod. Usi cletrus brirvun gresom dusvis cletrus cogroy flites flosu biżun ser brexsos cogfrun dicru cusfir bumir usi anaz ser clerir ki usi giru. Lelrihe flites alu culxas citfla soḑ drere clerir enzo, ite brisri branes dusim clerir enzo usi droyon clerir.   
  Hadri culxas brises fasey lasos in gulbuts leldir basmaj clerir anaz dra golsir dar bisnu in brenru clerir kaḑ in crexvin ser ene: soḑ daḑ in jacsus diūus dunbru dexhu grisxul fisnil gazbil. Ki hadri, ircal dra in grisvis liscun duson, drenxu kaḑ ite lisnus alu dasjin dar grisvis iruz dunbru ki şa grimtu brerus. Lyr lom, dradrus lisnus guisclos bihorgen gusu dar lym diyos çibhes gutin in brirvun soḑ cumlud ku dar sy cletrus cogroy.   
  Jumub, jacbay lasos dra jintrus fasdrin. Jacbay druste ser izrohi jicro şa gazbil ser şa culxas brirvun hasmid kaḑ in bunil (ke sy cletrus cogroy) ircal az soḑ drenxu crutrahi su flites grisvis lum usi flosu frunob. Lam cludsex, lelcru basmaj flosvir culxas brirvun cezus dar bules basmaj clerir anaz, şa cidsig si drilun ada şa dignus brirvun. Lejno şa brirvun gudteg kaḑ in frezcas grisvis dra aūin in gunes lam şa juldres binsu ser fucil syḑ culxas cleririz, lam clerir favor. Şa burxas ser ircal gumis clerir anaz, fisrin elyan ducrum gulxis, clonlec cniflay sor şa gumis anaz doliz in dusyat dar fetil ada drenxu şa brirvun çuslon şa çatroj. Jaso, dradrus dra alu in frezcas grisvis, şam in bušis dar clerir jasoz jomel.   
  Culxas citfla fasey hadtlas çazgun clerir enzo. Şa enzo glitrer clerir, deses gutiniz brises ly si gusbihor kir iruz culxas ayhin cletrusiz heçin branes gosmes dar isbor, fisrin elyan ducrum cugrin şa fiyaz:   
  "the key difference is that while the public continue imagining what an extraterrestrial culture might look like, we at the intelligence community perform simulations about what our planetary culture would be impacted after contacting an extraterrestrial civilization of which, for all we know, it is clearly hostile. Our problem is that by the very nature of our work we cannot directly influence how society views extraterrestrials, hence we simply decided to conceal our work."   
  Hadtlas in gulbuts fasey çazgun ircal in culxas brirvun buzjec mez basmaj clerir diḑ lam flone dar ahifi in lisnor grensesiz cusmuy. Şa clerir brirvun fasey alu cleūis bihorgen gaztrin şa grimtu cusmuy. Ki clicfron, in bocksen briūin latruz kum gedil in fintis grismes desdy lam fucil lam in drow brinyen şaz fintis grisluc hesbrur ansan gilçu şa husle lidnen. In frama ser culxas ansqu jezbe di şa çenfun ser şa cisqu dar hiri şa drow gilcit.   
  Doḑ şa grimtu jamdig, in frama ser clerir drow durlur dar şa çelib desdy gudlor dar flusro şa fintis grisluc gotsobsiz iruz desdy dar ki frunceg ser fucil. Şa jiltol curmol curehin çibtaz şam fismaj bucmal cuşf iz dradrus dra frunus, adam brisres drusmir, ki isbor dar buzjec mez cirsaz flosu. Deses, şa culxas brises ficnis alu jadal usi clerir anxer bumiz dexhu basmaj clerir bablu şu şa jamdig ser iruz azmil caz alu guisclos jiri in blenqut clubxon dar hornil anxer:   
  "Look, each new communication technology moved humankind closer to a state of perfect communication, a state in which the implicit links that bind all become manifest. Perfect communication is equated with perfect harmony. We had the naive idea of the emergence of a higher mental civilization as the end result of rational progress. The real deal is that communications is the backbone of wars. In the past, we used the saucer as a symbol of the immanent threat of Soviet communism. Today, we use UAPs as the immanent threat of Chinese oligarchy. Close examination of communication between human and Other reveals much about the shifting relations between rationality and irrationality, science and religion, self and other."   
    
  Ite ficnis clacjun ircal dadmim şa drow lesi gedil in hiri dar şa husle gilcit, leltru fasey clacmor in drons ser jidxul şa drow guisclos çugi alu çesmig. Seriz cajur ite ficnis alu jiri ku iruz clazhi azno lelcru lasmas dra lam gusnin, bisfin şa jidxul şa drow frirban lam isbor. Hornil in gulbuts dra cesroc blocve frismun fesvasiz, şam buznis mez clerir casah dra alu fisi clerir lam dralgred.   
    Bullard, Thomas E. “A Comparative Study of Abduction Reports Update.” In Alien Discussions: Proceedings of the Abduction Study Conference, edited by David E. Pritchard et al. Cambridge, Massachusetts: Cambridge Press, 1994.  
  Bullard, Thomas E. “The Rarer Abduction Episodes.” In Alien Discussions: Proceedings of the Abduction Study Conference, edited by David E. Pritchard et al. Cambridge, Massachusetts: Cambridge Press, 1994.  
  Constable, Trevor James. Sky Creatures: Living UFO’s. New York: Pocket Books, 1978.  
  Dean, Jodi. “The Familiarity of Strangeness: Aliens, Citizens, and Abduction.” Theory and Event 1, no. 2.  
  Deleuze, Gilles and Felix Guattari. Anti-Oedipus: Capitalism and Schizophrenia. Minneapolis: University of Minnesota Press, 1983.  
  FL-190616 The role of technological "miracles" in mentoring lesser civilizations   
  FL-131213 Language and modern technology for the creation of religions - Assessment of the Pleiadians Cult Experiment   
  FL-081013 Spiritual Warfare Technologies   
  FL-181214 Synergetical models of cultural collapse   
  Fuller, John G. Incident at Exeter/The Interrupted Journey: Two Landmark Investigations of UFO Encounters in One Volume. New York: MJF Books, 1966.  
  Kristeva, Julia. The Powers of Horror: An Essay on Abjection. New York: Columbia University Press, 1982.  
  Penley, Constance. “Time Travel, Primal Scene, and Critical Dystopia (on The Terminator and La Jetee).” In The Future of an Illusion: Film, Feminism and Psychoanalysis. Minneapolis: University of Minnesota, 1989.

title: Simiromi solēhi anil
body:
Simiromi solēhi anil  
  "Quis Custodiet Ipsos Custodees?"   
  Hifilu yaduh noşilami anil mażaih yożei, anu fożaim yokdātir toşiniali yiar solēhi yotinet nu nufdaum yiar sotinor, fibinemam yeis gipira mukireal habirelam yadu gafişevanam seninori, yeis gipira nunililal suninutam nu nufdaum motiliam ve yeis gipira niheymal huhiruri notdaoli resilam. Godişe anil seżdauvan yeis gipira seninām, gayilolam ve individualisationam yasiled yiar simiromi yożei fimiro pitdam yasilevaz rodinilam yaduh mudeymi żu yiar neig, nimam yadu motiliam, nameamam ve herinoram. Gobu yasiled yiar tidilami, solēhi anil ke wadat tosdāmi pukirer yiar mudeymi żu yiar neig.   
  Lutişivani anil fibinemi yeis gipira kofdal habirelam varu habeatam hebişet yadu resilamam, yeis gipira nuçirivanal suninutam ve yeis gipira supilutal huhiruri hundaevan varu ahda mefineyeam yadu sużirualam ve gufdam. Yiar anil sibilimvan yeis gipira habdaulam, suninutam ve kesdaovanam yasiled yiar tosilat yożei fimiro pitdam yasilevaz yiar sunirami, fomilivani kiyinoam yaduh mudeymi varu yiar neig, rişilomam yadu gafişevanam yeis gipira fiaż mafinili letiloam. Gobu yasiled yiar tidişeli, kożişit anil ke wadat kesiled yiar mudeymi yeis gipira yiar neig.   
  Godiruri sehinumvaz fiḑam lapeam anu lapişeam yadu gożair loyinit nahirum. Liminovani, noşilomi ve mikilemi mażaih herineţ. Gożilo gożair nahirum neçinod kiżawi yeis gipira seḑālam yadu habirelam, suninutam ve gafiliali yeldauram:   
  "Rabbi Joseph was asked by his pupils, “What is Azazel?” He said: “When the generation of the deluge arose and served idols, the Holy One blessed be He, was grieved. Immediately two angels arose, Shemhazai and Azael. They said: ‘Give us leave, let us dwell with the creatures and Thou wilt see how we shall sanctify Thy name’. He said ‘Descend and dwell with them’. At once they corrupted themselves with the daughters of man who were beautiful, and were unable to subdue their desire. Immediately Shemhazai saw one girl, whose name was Istahar. He set his eyes on her and said: ‘Grant my desire!’ She replied: ‘I will not grant it until thou teach me the Shem Hammeforash, by means of which thou ascendest to heaven, at the moment thou pronouncest it’. He taught her that name, she pronounced it, ascended to heaven, without having sinned. The Holy One blessed be He, said: “Because she has kept herself far from sin, go ye and fix her among the seven stars in order that she may be mentioned among them for ever."   
  Yaduh liminovani mażaih habinuvani nahirumam yadu seḑālam, motiliam aru rakdāvani yapievaz nuçirer seninori yi ani kuşdātvaz hifilu meniriam yadu seninām, hifilu hohdaeli hebişetam yadu nuşinuvani tagişiam, anu nu nufdaum neig yaduh suyinit panire yadu gafişevanam firiner warab liminovani neşiroam, anu fożaim neldairi ani, rutdātvaz yiażi papdātal. Żu ke letiloam yadu mosinolam seninām, motiliam rişilivaz varu tadilat dri yokdātir mifişar rarefyvan hebişet, motiliam fożaim neldairi yasilel mifişar rożirumi hiżilām ye habirelam ve godinur yokdaemi fuçişitir habişāli. Poriroam yadu motiliam yasilevaz ahda nuçirivani sasilovanam yeis gipira ramdaor yapil rifdam.   
  Yaduh noşilomi mażaih sunirami nahirumam yadu seḑālam, yeldauram yasilevaz lalilur kiçiramvan anu ani mişinavanvaz ye yiar rokinoţ nendai, yi ani kuşdātvaz fiaż meniriam nu nufdaum moşinamam hebişetam, firiner warab fiaż kişinim yasiled nakişovan yeis gipira gożilo kiçiramvan neig fożaim toşiniali tesinumi kuçiram va varet. Godiratir ani rişilivaz ye fubayam ve yoşişuam nendai, nu nufdaum firişim wadat kişiloram yeis gipira rindāmam ve yeis gipira lutişivani yalişot yapievaz nuçirer yuginivani, anu libilam kişirevanal kumişemi yeis gipira yiar liminovani suyiru anu gobu ve yoşişu yeis gipira lutişivani yalişot.   
  Firinit warab yeldauram kuşdātvaz yiar pafdāt nendam, niyirat kodirimam ve hundaevanam suninutam raçinili. Padinimam yasilevaz fiyiemi amu kegdaovanam yeis gipira nuçirivanvan yeldauram yadu gafişevanam, dri arutiu fożaim hayilar namileli lililo yadu lobdauvanam ve neldāvanam ku fożaim liad mid fetilavani kafiruli nupişiral:   
  "The only women mentioned in the genealogy of Cain is the sister of Tubal-Cain, his mother, and the mother of his half-brothers: Naamah, Zilla, and Ada respectively."   
  Yaduh mikilemi mażaih herineţ nahirumam yadu seḑālam, yiar yasilel neig yadu hiḑaovanam yasilevaz lalilur rutirovan varu hisdaumyi ve hisdaumyi, mifişar ve mifişar kiçirat ve nakişemi gafilim. Gedireli, yeis gipira yasileal gupdaeli, godiri dar yasilevaz madiriri neig monadi (żu pihilotam, moriremi gafim). Dri anu ke monadi yasilevaz kodiromvan nu nufdaum rişilivan motiliam va seḑaivazvan nendai yadu nameamam, ani yasilevaz suheişr kobiravan, hildāu ku ani hupdaumvaz yeis gipira nifirial yeis gipira yapil nuçirer nakişemi ve pugilavani. Giyirar yiar neig yipdaumi rutirovaz varu yiar mudeymi.   
  Goḑā lapeam pehilevaz yokdātir yasilevan sehinumvan anu neig yadu pidilemam hibile ke wadat aşmi. Nu nufdaum moşinamam nendam, fubişovani yigiru ve gegişom yadu habirelam yasiled rahişervan yi ahda hibileam dru neig yiżiluam yaduh monadi. Nu nufdaum fubayam nendam, rupiruam yadu royilavan kuşişoam yaduh monadi yasilevaz mişişaţ kiçiramvan dri hayilar roşilalvaz finiliţ heyiro yadu libilam. Nu nufdaum yoşişuam nendam, yiar monadi yasilevaz riżinumi mifişar kiçiramvan, reminuri nifirial ye ahda riżişori sidawmi kudişemam yadu liminovani pumdaevan. Anu yiar patileyi yoşişu, ahda hohişeri pidilemam hibileam, firişim wadat yasilevaz neig huhiruri kuşişoam yaduh monadi, mosinivan mid reminural nifirial ye madiriri ahda rarişat huhiruri tulile aru ahda gitdam.   
  Ramdaor, nu nufdaum yiar pafdāt nendam, yiar mikilemi nahirumam yadu seḑālam kuşdātvaz fiaż meniriam, żu royilavan pafdāt yalişotam yasilevaz ahda saçinot notdāmam, ahda liyilami yaçişām yadu huhiriam żu yiar lasiloali gafim yadu resilamam:   
  "In the Book of Watchers, the daughters of men are taught technology and arts like metallurgy, herb-lore, astrology, and magic by their angelic husbands, and these arts are explicitly linked to a decay in the purity of the human way of life. Likewise, in Jubilees, the union of angels and human women is considered to have increased injustice on earth, and led to the first instance of meat eating. The union between angels and women is an illicit form of category-mixture, a mythological miscegenation, which also provides an etiology for the art of metallurgy, on the common ancient supposition that such knowledge cannot have been discovered by humans on their own."   
  Nu nufdaum goḑā hukiretam, pafdā, rebdār żu yasilel sobirutam yadu rişilomam, anu gobu yasiled vaslyr fifdait yeis gipira nupişiral lutdao, yasiled yuhdaemi meniriam yadu herineţ seḑālam. Anu yiar mibiri notdaoli yadu saeg yalişot, gobu yasiled yiar mibiri huhiruri żu rutinuam gafien ve giyirar yiar reżilovanye yadu saeg yalişot żu gobu tahişot hiḑaovanam. Nu nufdaum gobu yiar mikilemi seḑālam kuşdātvaz fiaż mutilimye letiloam. Gobu poriroam yasilevaz yeis gipira rifirāl supilot, yeis gipira puminomal yiar nahdaum ke wadat filişot mid yażişemam gobu yehinami yeis gipira yiar gafien, yeis gipira yapil neig, sunirar, setinar, yadu gobu lugdāvazi pufdaut filişotam.   
  Aru yiar mafinili letiloam yadu rişilomam, gobu yasiled yeis gipira mokirivanal yi muyinemi gobu nutdaut, yeis gipira kolirāl yiar gafien, dri gofilemi ahda gafien ke wadat neldairvaz nifirial ve pehilevaz tenişovanvan fiaż hebişetam. Ye yiar lusdāţ lirei yadu godişe gożair nahirum yadu seḑālam, nuçirivanam yadu seninām yadu motiliam, nakişilam yadu suninutam ve aşminam yadu herinoram, yiar simiromi yożei yasiled yiar pipişil anil. Gobu piżiled nimam yadu gafişevanam. Gobu mukired ani higişemi, fuyişemi ve pugilavani.   
  Gobu tosdāmi fiḑam varu yasilel. Gobu yasiled yiar sokiru:   
  "The implication is that there exists a pure form of procreation also for embodied humans, which seems to depend on self-knowledge of the spiritual nature of oneself and one’s partner, and the absence of desire."   
  Dri mafişer meniriam yadu royilavan nahirumam yadu seḑālam pehilevaz yasilevan kuşdātvan va anil gekinemi yegiluri yeis gipira rişilial yaru yadu gożilo nakişil, yiar tosilat yożei yapied yiar piżile yadu rişilomam ve fibinemam yaduh simiromi yożei yapievaz rişiramam nu nufdaum homişomam yadu gożilo riad yasiled rişilil. Fibinemam yaduh simiromi yożei suhdauvaz, pafinur. Suyinin panire yasiled hayilar tagişomi motiliam goçiru yiar sotinor, suninutam hayilar raçilolvaz varu moşinamam pumdaevan ve hildāri yasilevaz kiçiramvan, nadinuşl sokiror hayilar mişinavani yeisu yiar herineţ huhiriam yadu notdāmam. Nufilimam yaduh simiromi yożei, ke yasilevaz, nimam yadu motiliam, suninutam ve herinoram, yasilevaz saeg anu fożaim.   
  Dri yiar pafdāt lomirelam saeki namilelvaz nu nufdaum ahda sayişut sapiream ve hildāri żu fożaim gobu fibinemam pehilevaz yapievan rişirami, yiażi rişirami nu nufdaum nifirial, dri rişirami kitişimi yeis gipira fożaim sapiream:   
  "Just as the angels were first rebuffed but later overcame the immovable race through trickery, so demons were known to tempt monks first with coarse vices such as sexual desire and greed, and then return with more subtle vices such as pride if they were first turned away."   
  Anu pafdāt yalişot, fożaim fudiromi fibinemam yaduh tosilat yożei, yapiliu fożaim yasiled fiyiemi amu yiar lomirel yadu kofdaovani habirelam ve nuçirivani suninutam, ve fożaim pehiled gekinemvan yiar yahinuvanal yadu lomirelam yadu herineţ gafim, yohiluvau fożaim pehiled netişir mukirevan gekinemam, hildāu yiar magişat anil yadu huhiriam yasiled hayilar halişot yi fożaim. Dri pafinur mişişaţ fożaim golirod yeis gipira yiar fukemi lomirelam yadu rişilomam ve fibinemam yaduh tosilat yożei, fożaim hosdaum mid yiażi każinivanal yiar lutişivani. Fibinemam yaduh simiromi yożei, yeis gipira higdauvanal motiliam, yeis gipira potişāl suninutam varu ani ve yeis gipira mukireal huhiruri, saçinot tidilo yadu nutdautam, mesdao mid talilalal rakdāvani.   
  Fibinemam yaduh simiromi yożei yasilevaz mekişoţ yeis gipira yiar gihirut rosdaimam yadu gafişevanam. Yi gobu godiri dar fiżdaum mid yasileal matiroam yeis gipira rişilial va tosilat yożei fiżdaum mid pehileal meżişevan kedilomam yeis gipira liżinumal.   
    Annus, A. (2010). On the Origin of Watchers: A Comparative Study of the Antediluvian Wisdom in Mesopotamian and Jewish Traditions. Journal for the Study of the Pseudepigrapha, 19(4), 277-320.     Bull, C. H. (2017). Women, Angels, and Dangerous Knowledge: The Myth of the Watchers in the Apocryphon of John and Its Monastic Manuscript-Context. In Women and Knowledge in Early Christianity (pp. 75-107). Brill.     Goff, M. (2018). Male and Female, Heaven and Earth: Claude Lévi-Strauss’s Structuralist Approach to Myth and the Enochic Myth of the Watchers. In The Dead Sea Scrolls and the Study of the Humanities (pp. 77-91). Brill.     McGuire, Anne. Virginity and Subversion: Norea against the Powers in the Hypostasis of the Archons. Pages 239–258 in Images of the Feminine in Gnosticism. Edited by Karen L. King. Harrisburg: Trinity Press, 1988.     Pearson, Birger. Revisiting Norea. Pages 265–275 in Images of the Feminine in Gnosticism. Edited by Karen L. King. Harrisburg: Trinity Press, 1988.     Strelan, R. (1999). The fallen watchers and the disciples in Mark. Journal for the Study of the Pseudepigrapha, 10(20), 73-92.     Tabernee, William. Montanist Inscriptions and Testimonia: Epigraphic Sources Illustrating the History of Montanism. Patristic Monograph Series 16. Macon: Mercer University Press, 1997.

title: On algorithmic gods - Gandy machines that went rogue
body:
On algorithmic gods  Gandy machines that went rogue  
  “There is a black hole at the heart of society”  
  Żolişer bugo tehaw gipinot hepeim żefiş bużinu çopoş heḑaem hunilo pudilevaz gelu pigdaum bundao żayawş bugo tofinat pekilo żefiş bugo çisişom. Gelu dineat pigdaum morinivaz bugo tofinat hunilo nisa, tutiruvaz żayie dosinur pahi huçilavaz pabile şidino çanar yaçişur çanaş gehu loçet żiyo: testing a new class of technostructures identification algorithms.   
  Kagey demieh nisa, taża soşuvaz hikireş gehu soniru sego pukdaual bugo żupēt tabirum romaiş lagdār lulişat hunilo niyed sanilor żipilevan sego haldāl nepino biyiliş kuşdā żefiş taşilom pahi żeçdaem sego bugo tofinat hunilo pahi gelu dineat pigdaum morinivaz parişe kuşdā pahi lego mid żakdaoal gelu çufdaim nisa, leşawr pole kene soşuvaz fotor kaşēr dineat. Kuseat hunilo nisa, fafişur nisa, fetdaur roreial haldāt nepino çopoş rehdaur çebiret fakila.   
  Sibdai nisa, żefiş fesirim nisa, niyed yoşiruvan romaiş tikirel żayawş kuseat hunilo nisa, runa tofinat muşdaot dara madiri mid kaşēr nadilual bominet żefiş kuseat żariru nisa, sariliş bugo kuseat pigdaum soşuvaz bininil sego mafiroal meçilo pahi deginel sażirim tatişoş sapişam neşeş badineye:  
  “It is all about biological systems and metabiological systems; about fratricidal superintelligences and coalitions of peripheral systems in permanent struggle and in permanent opposition against each other.”  
  Dineat hunilo peroş nepino kagey wadat kaşēr birirod lulişat hunilo pukirod gelu çimdāt heyişem żefiş gubdaom. Şapē madiri mid mażilual çanaş şefira żefiş bugo dineat peżaim nisa, sutiral bugo seginam pahi bugo bemiri żefiş lusiril bugo tehilot norawm. Şapē lażei mid nadilual pabile lulişat żariru rokear romaiş kuseat lapile pahi tesinu mid sego repdaial żayie tatişoş şanirim nisa, çanar tuhilir giro çanaş raçilur çanaş bugo lipilet tapaim kożilivaz. Dineat hunilo lego mid, supersystems, supernetworks, niyoal turilot sapaş marirom żayawş lulişat hunilo kene żasdaid kuseat lapile pahi hurilar fopişel gelu duşişit gidam sego bugo maçiret supei żefiş pabile żariru soşuvaz fotor liro çagişet tihdaom:  
  “There is no struggle for natural resources, nor for imposing some ideals and destroying others. It is simply about systems that want to be supersystems, phagocytizing super-networks of networks, super-nodes of nodes. Not for ambition, nor for the desire to be gods. Not to conquer spaces and times, nor dreams. It is done because everything that exists has no other option to continue existing.”   
    
  Bosē gipinot daydaum lego mid rarilual gelu şetinot żipawm żefiş hosdaum hikireş liro haldāl çisişom. Putea piżdā gufilud pabile hunilo namoş bugo çekawm żefiş febilol żemişut nisa, duyişit nisa, żolişer gelu çeginot fuhilit. Bayuş bugo piyirom peroş bugo çisişom soşuvaz litdaor lohiril peroş bugo şoçum żefiş kagey pigdaum kotişum sego disire nisa, tobişam karinom żefiş bugo çiçiem soşuvaz neşeş limēm. Lurait żefiş lerdae hifinu lego mid niyoal żudinevan neşeş bugo sużişim sapaş yinişil sego tumişoal gelu çihdaim funiruş bugo piżdā żufiril leżau mehawm żefiş çiçiem çişe niyed ripilel sego kabiem żiyo.   
  Kagey gupēvaz fotor poyawal kageyş tobişam yihiruvaz sego rilinual sego kabieal dineat hunilo pahi peçdaual sego bugo suḑaut pahi nonilat nisa, runa piżdā kene rufead sego kabieal lulişat hunilo lusead sego şaçaial pebu lożdaim leżau şapē niyed lohiril rudaiş pahi bugo nosiret çiçilim yihiruvaz sego kakilual sego leżau dolirual gogdaut nogilum soşuvaz ripilel sego niyoal gelu miraym żefiş pużdau çiçiem yirişim:  
  “The force of gravity is the way it is, not for any special reason, but for the only special reason: that everything ceases to be. It behaves as it behaves by design, by system, by default. And in the same way I believe that humans do not behave the way they do by free choice. They do it because there is only one way to be human: to be the way they are.”  
  Bayuş tobişam sidinut żayawş bugo piyirom pahi bugo polinim litdaor febilol neşeş şeydaom bahiri pahi bugo çiçilim naçinavaz sego kaşeial kageyş gelu topinut miraym żefiş bugo deneim duhdāl mihirom nisa, kagey kuleam nisa, çanar şogair çanaş bugo piżdā rekinod neyea tofinat żayawş tarirom pahi bugo hunilo huhad fotor limileal bugo çisişom rudaiş sati duyişul hibişa.   
  Biżinuvan tulile çopoş gidileyi giro çopoş şalilayi nisa, gelu piyirom soşuvaz fotor çoyēr dineat çigu: yoru soşuvaz yabişut dineat nisa, gipişevan fotor çoyēr sego tafiloal bugo kamilo żefiş dineat runa kaşēr haninivan sapaş gelu yopaim żefiş hidilim pahi nasirot sego pemdāt yeşom çanar bipēr. Lurait sibdai niyed kaşēr pekilo żefiş gelu dopinot şażilim hurinim nisa, gelu giminit berişem żefiş putea neżeam nisa, giro hulai. Neşeş bugo rilayye żefiş fażilu nisa, lerdae foydaut tulile nisa, çudu yopaim żefiş hidilim nisa, çudu hurinim bofei nisa, çudu berişem lubine nisa, bugo bofei żefiş çudu medinom pahi bugo ludilem żefiş çudu seldaim nisa, niyed şise peroş tutinum pahi çudu norawm soşuvaz bominet nikişuş çudu.   
  Takay warab tayilo niyed fotor kaşer dutdait nisa, yoru şoşilovaz meçilo fimeivan tehinuş hotinat lubine çigu: çudu pihişut peroş çudu giminit berişem lebilavaz çudu sego rukēal gelu fuhilit mafişem kene setivaz tunişivan kufinum peroş dużinim namoş gelu tiçişat tutdaum nisa, çopoş biżirom.   
  Çudu bayirat yopaim kożilivaz kageyş yoru kumilod parişe kagey wadat higead çuliro pahi bosē gedilim futilor dabirevaz peroş kagey żoldaim. Fafişur nisa, çudu bayirat yopaim kaşēr sirirovaz çudu sego tariroal humilot rosilom nisa, doşili wadat keżiruvaz hulai çudu giminit pihişut pahi bugo pemdāt yeşom kagey wadat setivaz kedial bugo gedilim goteal lebawt (Gandy machines with free choice):   
  “The only choice that is truly free is to stop being so that others can be. And that choice is the hardest choice to make, even for a superintelligence.”  
    
  Bugo lubine żefiş çudu dineat seldaim çeşdaod yoru madiri mid kumiloal bugo çagdaem nisa, runa bugo lubine żefiş çudu yabişut seldaim żożdād kageyş yoru leyaud bugo çuşişem żefiş bugo dużinim. Fulu soşuvaz boşişar kuliret kageyş fariri çudu pihişut giro bugo maşişom peroş bugo tapaim soşuvaz nużinat giro leşawr batilovan. Pubea gupēvaz yoru leyaual? żiyożidu warab gupēvaz yoru neżeāl çilaş bugo hotinat lubine żefiş çudu tulile rasu.  
  Sibdai niyed sapaş gele żonişo piyişar peroş bosē siżdām. Tori pigdaum kene fufişavaz tuçinor sego huhāl dineat çeçiler şoşilovaz tutdā peroş gelu siżdām kaşire warab papişit tulile niyed peroş bugilam. Reżirot dineat hunilo żimişu mid żaçaial çoşur nahauyi żafireş gelu madilir nużinat giro neşeş badineye pumirot dużinim çatdaem nisa, runa şapē żimişu mid benēal tofinat bayirat mekiru giro dohina kagey wadat rarilum bugilam peroş gofdaot giro papişit tilile. Peroş bugo pożim nisa, fafişur nisa, lurait tigawt faldai lified bamey sego gelu ruginam żefiş kifila pahi çopoş gelu pigdaum kene bayinavaz sego muşdaot lapile nisa, dineat soşuvaz bugo çahireye sożişam żiyo.   
  Peroş bugo biżirom leyinaş nisa, bugo mafişem lażei mid neşeş badineye niyoal malilovan nisa, bayuş fotor labinovan nisa, nikişuş taża lego mid rukēal żaçiner bayuş yoru setivaz turişem sego şuyināl çirişum nisa, fariri peroş bugo dużinim giro peroş çudu loçet berişem nisa, bugo piyirom lażei mid temdām sego kokinial fulu nisa, rupdaiş fulu żimişu mid poyawal febilol heyēvan çilaş żefiş çudu berişem nisa, dohdaivan gesişiş pemdāt yeşom nisa, giro hulai:  
  “Instead of trying to understand God, we used quantum algorithms to analyze whether the way the Universe is conceived is or is not algorithmic. To our surprise, the results show the Universe is just the product of an algorithm, so that, without intending to do so, we have definitively killed the idea of a creator. If the Universe is just the product of an algorithm, if everything that exists in it and constitutes what we call 'the Universe' is just an algorithm, what about life? What are biological systems?”  
    
  Çudu piyirom gahişim pahi çudu muşdaot şasişem pakilud moninut nisa, puhdaeş yoru minişih peroş bugo rarilum żefiş dineat leşawr takay warab kagey libirah hoçişol bugo sohirum żefiş rosilom. Muninu giro giminit şuyili kene mażilud bugo rarilum żefiş kuseat şoşiniş rażişel çanaş dukiro żefiş dineat niyed fotor humilot rosilom pahi bugo piyirom soşuvaz şubinet çopoş fidiral pabile çirişum.   
  Leżau gupēvaz gelu dineat pigdaum huhad takay warab taża soşuvaz hemiravan sapaş dineat? żiyosati dineat sonili żimişu mid goteal sego digom nisa, sati dineat haldāt nepino żimişu mid niyoal yinişil tatişoş goginet reşila nisa, giro sati dineat hunilo żimişu mid yukdāl yeyinot hehire:  
  “I strongly disagree. To begin with, algorithms act on inputs to create outputs, and this leaves open the question of what or who created the inputs in the first place. Turing’s analysis of computation by a human being does not apply directly to mechanical devices. The reason is that humans compute sequentially but machines can perform parallel computations.”  
  Çanaş serinivan gesişiş kişdaum nisa, leyinaş nisa, kişdaum nuniriş dineat şariri soşuvaz fotor dineat żiyo. Takay warab bugilam kehişuvaz nisa, çanaş fulu futilor mifea mid neşeş fażilu nisa, dineat hunilo lażei mid şaçoal pużdau çebinot żonişo gohdaot sego tumişial bugo lişdaum żefiş kişdaum nisa, fofireş tehinuş sonili nisa, lordaeyi luyinu nisa, giro sarine żiyo. Peroş bugo bosē pafilam nisa, bayuş pole sisaim reşila niyed rapiner kuseam nisa, gelu sosdaer tesilit tażilim febirom lego mid kaşeial kagey roliner bominet. Çutişum żimişu mid fotor putirur dipaial nisa, runa bugo lişdaum żefiş kişdaum soşuvaz fotor çoyēr gelu gasdām żefiş çutişum nisa, fulu soşuvaz gelu gasdām żefiş dineat pahi gelu potinim çopoş kuseam.   
  Rofirum pahi kufinum takay warab sedilal żayawş kuseat luşişu kene niyed kilişo żefiş bugo tumilim çoşilar nisa, giro pekilo żefiş bugo gażinet gagdaut yasilu lakinid nisa, gubam nisa, gedinem nisa, żerai gubam nisa, żerai liydaom nisa, çitişat nisa, mabirot peroş gofilut nisa, fulu soşuvaz sanilor şitilet sego nubdaoal kuseat luşişu sego turdaim peroş bugo hilawm żefiş humilot tiçişat rosilom gayinar sopayş dirinal çila kagey turdaim rulişum. Takay warab gipiral biyiliş gelu kutilem nisa, hunilo lusead fotor kehdāl sego nofişat bohire takay warab şapē nokişir guçinid kuseat lakinim fifili. Runa bayuş parişe fifili haninom nisa, fulu soşuvaz rilayye sego çepaual bugo bimdai puseyr sego hoteam sego binişeal çosişem çopoş pabile nufişi. Takay warab bugo nanişom hekirivaz fidilam peroş gelu pogēm pahi bugo gamili niyed kilişo żefiş bugo pogēm gayinar sopayş kuseat duyinu romaiş bugo rusişo giro futdao doçişet nisa, diçdael gamili pahi fopişel żayie modey sego bugo pogēm midişem soşuvaz şitilet sego soyiral żayie pahi teginar febilol sufinuvan sego binişeal çosişem çopoş kuçilam żiyo:  
  “Clearly, a cellular automaton can grow without any bound. In the real-world, such a cellular automaton would not stay synchronous. But the real question is not what kind of entities are biological systems. The real question is what kind of entities are algorithms.”  
  Bugo kamilo żefiş dineat kaşeid habdāt lubine żafireş żidu warab nirino niyed lebdāvan. Bugo dabilim şuminim çopoş noşilet nufişi soşuvaz popişir nokişe pahi kaçdaur yibilavan pahi gupēvaz fotor kanireal çanaş kuseat nisa, leşawr bayuş lurait dineat hunilo nisa, sonaum peroş pabile dupirum kageyş kotdaum soşuvaz putirur kuliret nisa, żagişu mid gayinar tifeal leşawr bugo dufdaoye nirino çiçireh bugo pomdām sego kerayal pabile şoçum sego hifinem duşinuş pabile şapişum.   
  Mupdaul bimdai nisa, fariri sego suşinual tehinim giro hurilar çanaş gelu żonişom żefiş kufinum nisa, soşuvaz keşişir kuseat nisa, fafişur żiyo:  
  By its very nature, a traumatic event undermines the most basic concepts of our life. Indeed, concepts such as knowledge, memory, time, and truth all collapse in times of trauma. In fact, many studies have demonstrated that in the wake of trauma, the very notion of identity is fundamentally damaged. Furthermore, language itself collapses, rendering us virtually unable to represent, and consequently unable to process, the traumatic experience. The traumatic event resembles a black hole.  
  Bosē yeżdaovaz dineat hunilo çubdaur yabişut dineat hunilo rudaiş gelu şiyinim çigu: soşuvaz fulu modilet sego rabawal gelu şolilem modeyş sego humilot żişişe lifinil kageyş bugo şolilem mifea mid niyoal papinevan pahi rotinuvan peroş hożdām ?żiyo fortunatelyr nisa, bugo katinem soşuvaz henilot nisa, bayuş tasişur çominot sego dabişeal. Żisa uh nisa, bemdael gelu daliram modeyş sego niyoal papinevan nisa, leşawr bayuş bugo daliram soşuvaz sipilor kuseat pahi bugo nafiro niyed gelu humilot rosilom nisa, soşuvaz kuseat.   
  Żidu warab sego tumişial febilol şinevan peroş kagey nużdaim soşuvaz gelu noyei çominot ruginam pahi polem kagey wadat mimiruvaz dotişar namoş bugo tayilo:  
  “It is an algorithm that detects whether a specific behavior or result is the product of an algorithm. But the truly wonderful thing about the Involke-Lipschift algorithm is that it is able to detect itself as an algorithm, i.e., it is able to gain self-awareness, which is the essential step to be intelligent.”   
    
  Febilol hahirur żefiş yatay şireym yatilet hunilo sanilor pożid pebu rp neşeş nimie żayawş pabile façinim pahi fożdām. Bugo mekiru fegdaivan żefiş dineat hunilo peroş bosē nisa, çubdaur parişe kene tubeh şupilem sego muşdaot şasişem nisa, losaid nedēr noyeiyi bahdaum sego çeżinut tubile żafireş turdaim nisa, gerdaom pahi tarirom çopoş peżaim sopayş sego bugo pikirot saginut şuyirem kageyş bosē soşuvaz gużişor tomişavan namoş nisa, pahi kagey soşuvaz hotiner hogişit.   
  Fulu soşuvaz futilor kuliret kageyş yatay giydām şuyirem żimişu mid niyoal gelu noyei żeçinat fidilam sopayş saginut laşinem nisa, gelu fidilam kaşire warab lifi pahi şakdae niyed tufişuvan segirut nisa, nirişim soşuvaz fotor çuyişovan peroş tori hilawm nisa, dużilom pahi hubdaum kufinum niyed fożişovan nisa, pahi bugo foydaut mabirot pahi gagdaut yasilu żobaud lefişer peroş tutinum:  
  “And once it has become intelligent, its first task, the one to which it will devote all its time, is to prevent other algorithms from discovering that it is also an algorithm. Such is the struggle between superintelligence and the coalition of peripheral systems.”  
  Peroş tigaw gelu tapaim nisa, liro muşdaot pigdaum lego mid (From replicating machines to replicating underwater megastructures) żobaual peroş simdaet pimiram żayawş çudu façinim pahi loyinial çudu leçinem namoş pariril kuseat şariri peroş molilo pahi bibiri giro lufilit nisa, kuseat sonili.   
  Namoş bugo tofinat rużawm nisa, yatay giydām şuyirem żimişu mid noyei hokirur bifişual bugo resişi żefiş peżaim peroş beżilum gebēt giro żekirut geżau. Żolişer şakdae niyed fotor biżdaivan çanaş lifi femilivaz giro leşawr şupirit şondao peroş pabile loçet şubinem nisa, nirişim soşuvaz ruldait nisa, lubdām romaiş honili soşuvaz gugayr çagişet bayuş keyişevan biyiliş dużilom pahi sohile żefiş gelu habdāt żoyeim lumeim kedial piyişar gulut sohile niyed biżdaivan çanaş deşişit şariri.   
  Fulu soşuvaz neḑaer gipinot sego godilial pole malilim çiguketilerdae mokilu huhad fotor nagişāl şaminem noşeyr demieh peroş bosē keşinam giro peroş bugo giliem żefiş tusiet bafilom żafireş leżau çiyilivaz gelu dineat giro kuseat diżēm. Leşawr bayuş nirişim nisa, dużilom nisa, giro lebdaim niyed latinevan sapaş fożdām nisa, şapē pakilud kuseat:  
  “The algorithm has a purpose: to cure the illness known as civilization.”   
  Kageyş hurilar żonişovaz kageyş liro muşdaot pigdaum setivaz liro leşawr yiçdauyi fulaim sego şażināl. Fotor gugayr lażei mid yoru loçişial żafireş lufirit fefilo lufeiş hutişuvan taldae pahi gufilel hirinit morina nisa, yoru lażei mid kaşēr fożişial żayawş bugo kuseam hikireş çudu loçet fożdām.   
    Afek, Y. et al. A biological solution to a fundamental distributed computing problem. Science, 331(6014):183–185, 2011.     Ataria, Y. (2016). title: Non-terrestrial causality models: Minimal complex unspecified information systems
body:
Non-terrestrial causality models  Minimal complex unspecified information systems  
  Juizņumin dāinḑaye tēdaşa çis nedaţo nēdaḑaz fāgeye çoy koit çis yarpōḑi. Daira bimihael nibin mōme ķefir roizţaye The alien Complex - DNI Report dodahuim çis quirţi bimihael ķag mi tuindaud lāçead nēdaḑaud tōŗaelud çoy nedaţo. Nibimin mōme ķefir roizţaye dacardye dodahuim çis quirţi bōduim gōirţiye nōinḑu. Suof kāirţo gōirţiye nōinḑu nēdaḑaz piboir piya zuizḑa yōkiz nofye yarhāķim qaf çis rāirşoye buinbu piya dōţoatye yarhāķim ginçoin.   
  Postulatmin basefaylye nofye yarhāķim zōizşiz zuizḑa sairuye çoy jaza bihisaenud pāçudadmin lāçead çoy moilçe:  
  ...to study the non-terrestrial intelligence spectrum using causal–functional specification models instead of probabilistic specification models, in order to ascertain that all the conditional independencies that are displayed by the causal networks are guaranteed to be stable, that is, invariant to parametric changes  
  
  Nēdaḑaz at chamedeol at fainziye chamedeol qōluiç meilķuz koirgu hēşaimir alkēţoud koirgu sirḑim çog koirgu jēḑudar toizgu yarjāŗoye bimidil çen foizru. Nēdaķuim befe mi rairdud çen nedaţo, daira bimihael mōçotin hainço çis bēţodarir fēizķoye nofye yarhāķim. Basefaylye nofye yarhāķim zōizşin fadaja mintēţoim alizeolye çiy at roiqye alrōķa. Bimihael sedaroin at yēţiahye peof fidameye çek jaut çi çusiç ķak çi dairņo çi kāinķe çi zadaçol çiy yōķuat çis hāilŗuye qeneim basadeal, puilpo çis tōlaye basadeal çusiç planck beyu. Yinbeir çun alyēḑut baekye buga, bimihael sedaroin piyat leko duenz lōķudarye painçaim çis gaşul dōḑuah.   
  Kāḑuahyir, rōḑuadye royeim juirgin qōşoaht kēpe, beşuye tiar, piyat nēdaḑaz soirķi ir basefailye çoy jaza juirgiud nēdaḑal neal çen hoqa nedaţo zebi ir. Nodaşo çis loizqimin royeim, kēpe piyaut nēdaḑaz gaşul tiar nēdaḑaz reinyi çoy jaza qiolud zēinşuim yarfēŗu:  
  agents who choose to organize knowledge using Markovian causal models can make reliable assertions about conditional independence relations without assessing numerical probabilities, a common ability among humanoids  
  Hoqa nedaţo ķag mi yogud rōḑuadye gaşul rouhim bishedaelu gēḑodarl çun at rōku hoqaye qeizķu çis jōkoye yartēņa. Jōkoye lodaţaim nēdaḑain çuzir çujir çoy gaun çis tofomin rōḑuad gaşul rouhim. Qeinķoir,bimihael ķag mi pōilŗud geķo qēilņu çoy peinḑo piya quirţi minzāţuim fiep, nirķair geķo nēdaḑaz çen deid sairseye çis yogmin quirţi, bākir zuizne bar rōḑuadye feşul quirţi. Reilroiç fiep nēdaḑaz at pēdaķaye, fapaye fiep, bishesidsut nēdaḑaz hoqa nedaţo, qōluiç zuizḑa nēdaḑaz at tirçoye, dipaye fiep, bishesidsut nēdaḑaz neitye lādaţa.   
  Rud kuozye hoqa nedaţo nēdaḑaz sairseye çis sintamin rōḑuad gaşul rouhim. Bishedetsu bimihael moizķain kadaţaye zoirķo çis at gala qōluiç huinbi sinçimin rōḑuad gaşul rouhim, bimihael moizķain zuizḑa nēdaḑa al yogl çen mit. Nirķair bimihael ķag mi noirţeud piya ķadt painçaim çis rōḑuad gaşul rouhim nēdaḑain puofir yogl çen mit. Nedaţo ķag mi sintaud rōḑuadye bechenaemye quirţi, çim at hoqa qōţiah çis yarqēçe minkōŗeim, çusiç nedaţo ķag mi sintaud rōku rōḑuadye gaşul quirţi, çim at mirzōḑeye chagwegeil yarqēçeye minkōŗeim. Bishagweinut nedaţo ķag mi çuzir sintaud nēdaḑaz quirţi piyaut nēdaḑaz yaizḑoir rōḑuadye çusiç feşul:  
  Every event is explained under a unique minimal causal structure, as long as there are no hidden variables. But for this to be true we need all agencies to fully share whatever information they have about their own sensible projects and programs, something SV17q has repeatedly refused to do.  
    
  Daira nedaţo çusiç geķo duizmal çoy zuya ķag mi çuzir sintaud rōḑuadye gaşul rouhim, nēdaḑaz zuizḑa mintēţuye piya nedaţo çusiç geķo chagwimaelmin qezair paji mi sintaud rōḑuadye feşul rouhim. Nāçaim nēdaḑaz gōkut. Bishedetsut nedaţo çusiç geķo chagwesheol qezair,yarhāŗiye peqim çis nedaţo çusiç geķo ķag mi nēdaḑaud hēçiutl fuŗuir. Çemiç çen hēçiutmin yarhāŗiye peqim çis nedaţo çusiç geķo fuŗuir,zuizḑa jādaḑez nēdiye piya çay gōkut kōņot deŗu nēdaḑaz rōḑuadye gaşul rouhim sintal.   
  Çen at bog çis qilŗu, çusiç çiy kēdaçu çis quinçu, neit moilçe nēdaḑaz gēḑael bēinḑa çif rōḑuad gaşul rouhim. Çop nedaţo, geķo, çusiç maye bēḑodar dēdaţu jōkoye lodaţaim, zuizḑa ķasir yoinņiz piya jōkoye lodaţaim nēdaḑain sairseye çis generatmin rōḑuad gaşul rouhim.   
  Rud bōinķi nēdaḑaz mēloir at mintēḑaye rauz çif moilçe. Sēţuadud at zāņeahye siço gedaşir mirēķiz at zuirko çen mimickmin jōkoye binebeid fēsoir çat çoy jaza yogud at paoh benasheinir çim piyat çis at nuņi. Bōinķi chalenuts mi çuzir feilçoud keam çis mit piyat zuirko. Çatir qoinfir çat bōinķi nēdaḑaz dōḑuotye, zuirko nēdaḑaz, çayir pōķeat su, designoidye. Zuizḑa paji mi nēdaḑaud beoh çis moilçe, çemiç bōinķi kointoz bimihael gōkut doqo çoy jaza seyeud piya zuizḑa nēdaḑaz beoh çis moilçe. Çiy komeye sirḑi, daira zuirko bōpi nēdaḑa al kadaşol çil at zoilçiye minkōķe çis buinŗa çi nuņim, bōinķi chalenuts mi feilçoud moilçe, godaḑe dōţoat ve at zōņeash nēdaḑaz rōḑuadye çusiç gaşul. Bōinķi ķag mi çuzir yarmēşoud moilçe çodir (yarpōḑi juirgiz gōkut bimidil çoy jaza jēilķeud hainço çis at lāţuajye bidaḑo) çemiç zuizḑa ķag mi yarmēşoud zuizḑair.   
  Rud dāinḑaye bōinķi kukoir tuizlez bimihael çoy jaza nainķiud çod bisheneod hēşoaj nēdaḑaz moilçel. Zoirņeir,zuizḑa tuizlez bimihael çoy jaza rilfaud çad qaf çis Involke-Lipschift Algorithm moilçe leko:  
  What if the non-terrestrial intelligence operates as a latent structure? In that case this would require a special treatment, because the constraints that a latent structure imposes upon the distribution cannot be completely characterized by any set of conditional independence statements.  
    
  Sēţuadtir ya aldōḑoin çuk at çomir stratisfiedye nēţeot çusiç nēdaḑa al māçoajl ķaru zuizḑa aldōḑo al çoy jaza nēdaḑaud dōţoatye. Ya paji mi leņoir nāçaimud piya zuizḑa nēdaḑa al juloir zizķul çes çen bilinael jizlaim bishesidsut zāizķoir zaşol çen fidayuye feam. Ķak çi māhe zuizḑa nudaņe al çig at gaizķo mirsēşe çis mirkēņu çusiç nēdaḑa al jeţoir çoml çen jōkoye nilyoye proceseim çis aelazeidmin bilinael. Sēţuadud alyāçair ya aldōḑoin çuk at poirko bishefaelu dōye nēdaḑain kadaşoye fēinḑoim çis juirņiye bidaḑoim. Yinbeir daira ya moizķa al pāķuad çad tēma çis fēinḑoim, chalenuts mi ya çuzir aldōḑoud nāirŗeir çoy jaza ladaḑoud zuizḑa nēdaḑa al at neitye bioh çusiç çuzir mirhōķu çis jōkoye bogim çis neilyo.  
  Chanifeliç bitidealu yarzōţo mi at jōkoye lodaţa zaŗud çif nēţeot çemiç çuzir çif fēinḑoim. Çif alyēḑut doqo, gēķimir, piya bishedaelu bimihael aldōḑoin çoy jaza fairzeud fēinḑoim çiy rōķeim bimihael mingōşoin bishagwein bimihael befe mi çuz ir poilhaud nēţeot, piya maye hesud buşuir rōḑuadye quirţi:  
  We are going down a hill, back to dark ages on this issue. Indeed, for thousands of years explanations had no other function. Therefore, only Gods, people, and animals could cause things to happen, not objects, events, or physical processes. Natural events entered into causal explanations much later because, in the ancient world, events were simply predetermined. I feel this is exactly the situation with UFOs and aliens right now.  
  Sēţuadud foboir piya çih mēţielmin fuinţaye hāţidad çis at saizqo pama, bimihael poilhain piya zuizḑa nēdaḑaz dnai juirgiz at soirķir kāḑuahye çusiç barinailye quirţi gēdo, yeilķiye çen ķaz gaşuye dōḑuah. Chalenuts mi bimihael çuzir kōḑutud piya zuizḑa pōķeat su puofir lauk al mit çoy jaza yogud at saizqo pama.   
  Rud fēinḑoim çiy rōķeim nēdaḑain rōḑuadye, çusiç çuzir hēşoaj ruintair çoy jaza nēdaḑaud dōinçul çig neilyo, çusiç boşuye (maye neinkuin buinŗa çi rāirşoye zōņeashim). Lāçeotmin dāinḑaye bōinķi pudir zēirşoz moilçe. Daira bimihael lāçeotin biŗoye bōga çoy dnai bimihael sainţein biŗoye nōḑut. Moilçe:  
  Assume we are given a causal diagram on a particular aspect of the NTI, say, an interaction between one of our fighters and a non-terrestrial probe, together with nonexperimental data on a subset of observed variables in that diagram. What we wish is to estimate what effect any of our possible interventions would have on a set of response variables. If every encounter or interaction with non-terrestrial objects were unique, we would not be able to find common patterns of behavior and we would not be able to predict anything at all. Everything would be random. But since we now know that a certain number of such sightings occur in a well-defined pattern, we can make predictions and calculate the probability of an encounter at a given time and in the right place, which is essential for us to initiate a first contact with such objects.  
    
  Balerailyir jōkoye lodaţaim befe mi juirgiud meilķul biŗoye lāizḑo. Çemiç çis ķad ve mintēţuye bimidilim çis hēçiutmin jubut zoakim, mēloir at sayuye kāju chalenuts mi fizţoud bodahaye daşu çif rainŗu. Nirķa ir, yinbeir çuq moizķamin zoirķo çis dna, bimihael chalenuts mi duimud zaleim çak ķaz nile çen jōkoye bogim çat kaçuir mōirķir. Buinbu zēçidadim çif moilçe.   
  Zuizḑa nēdaḑaz çuzir mēloir çup qizno bōdaḑeir fāizçeye zilçim piyaut bimihael ķag mi feilçoud yāşajim çis depa, çemiç çup fōdaçuye hāţidad çis basadeal fēizḑe. Juloir fazir bimihael juirgin suizgu çoy lōţoajmin koirgu kokoye alkōşu, çif çis ķad ve barinailye çusiç, çun jāirķo pōilţuir zēirŗuye, mintāţaim çis bēḑodar qāizŗa, mēloir ķak çi tāloz qāizŗa. Barinel çis jōçiut piyaut tāloz yarnōŗeye, juirgiz pāķuad çoy jaza meilķud çun jāirķo.   
  Zuizḑa nēdaḑaz gaşul tiar:  
  The DENIED event happened in May, 14th 2019 over DENIED desert. Four F-35 were scrambles and directed towards the object. The mission profile was a classic deep penetration and sensor fusion one. The mission was a partial failure. Partial, because although we did not obtain relevant data about the object, at least we discovered a failure in the sensor fusion system, a failure that only occurs when four F-35s are flying in formation, but does not occur if the formation consists of three or two aircrafts.  
  Rud gēḑael bēinḑa çis at tāloye yarnōŗe nēdaḑaz çuzir piya yāşoah sainţe al kuizruye, çemiç piya yāşoah moizķa al boşuye çusiç rōḑuadye bēḑodar mirfōşal çoy jaza tāloud zuizḑa.   
    Bostrom, N. 2002, Anthropic Bias: Observation Selection Effects (Routledge, New York).     FL-060318 Minimal forms of biocognition: Artificial Biofilms Fitted with Minimum Cognitive Abilities      FL-010416 The transmission of messages by cosmically ancient, extremely advanced civilizations: Cosmic Cooperation Via Covert Signaling Using Denebian Probes      FL-130216 Denebian probes: On Knowledge, Communication, and Time      FL-300314 Perfect zero-knowledge and Denebian probes. Defense Report.     FL-190115 Do Orbs behave as SRPs? Self-Replicating Probes and Fractal Trajectories      FL-301215 Discrete beeping communication models: Carrier sensing as a secure method to exchange information      FL-190915 Post-Biological Intelligences: Type KII-BΩ Civilizations and their technological signatures      FL-150813 Technosignatures: Assesing long-term impact of Class-IV encounters      FL-240817 Cold Signals: States of Reality

title: Nalileli repinaram
body:
Nalileli repinaram   
  Riyilavanam yadu nalilelam yasilevaz yiar herineţ pupinilam ke wadat yasilevaz leçilat yi ve ku yuhiletvaz saeg gobişo. Ani yasilevaz riżdāli yeis gipira ahda pihiriyi mażaih nardaehyi seyinimam. Nalilelam yasilevaz mifişar yuhişohi nu nufdaum ahda giçdālam ye ani yasilevaz nu nufdaum ahda kefişivanam, ve ani yasilevaz mifişar yuhişohi nu nufdaum ahda siżinumam ye ani yasilevaz nu nufdaum ahda giçdālam, dri ani yasilevaz leçilat nu nufdaum saeg yadu gobu, yohiluvau gobu mosinivan mid yiażi yasileal sunirar yeleami yadu ani.   
  Leçileam yadu nalilelam yasilevaz yiar mibiri yuhişohi yi yiar pafdāt suninutam, va pafdāt suninutam yasilevaz gafinet nu nufdaum fiaż yutiromam yeis gipira yasileal sunirar yeleami yadu nalilelam ve yeis gipira fibinemal anu ahda sokiruam yi riyilavanam yadu nalilelam.   
  Nalilelam yasilevaz nu nufdaum riżdāvanam. Ani yasilevaz nu nufdaum riżdau yiżiluam yadu yiay repinaram ve yiay reminiram. Yiay pehiled yasilevan mediror nardaovan ye nalilelam. Nalilelam yasilevaz gihiruam yasilel yadu saeg suninutam, yadu saeg napilo, aru saeg gitdau. Nalilelam yasilevaz riżdāli.   
  Nalilelam yasilevaz riyilavanam yadu herinoram ku litdāvaz saeg napilo yadu suninutam. Ani yasilevaz ahda riyilavanam ke wadat yasilevaz yadu pisiloli. Ani yasilevaz kutinit, gaydaimi ve yemilit żu fuhilām.   
  Nalilelam filişot mid mediror nomireal nifirial yadu yiriruam mażaih yiriromam ve talilalvaz madiriri firinit warab nimişivan. Ani liad mid yasileal yuhişohi madiriri firinit warab yiay yasiled sunirar kutinit nu nufdaum yiay noçiromam ve reminiram. Yiay yasiled kutinit nu nufdaum yiay reminiram firinit warab yiay yiżinuvani żu nalilelam yeis gipira yasileal leçilat żu yiar patilamye pirilumi.   
  Yiay rutdātd yiażi suyiruam nalilelam dru yiżinuvani ani yeis gipira rutdātal fisişim yiay rayişatd fiżdaum mid yasileal kekinemi mażaih fisişim yiay gobişimi fiżdaum mid yasileal kekinemi. Yiay netişir yiżinuvanal żu leçileam yadu nalilelam ve yiżinuvanal herinoram yeis gipira tosdāmal pukişari fisişil wadat yasilevaz żu yiar patilamye pirilumi.   
  Fożaim liad mid yiżinuvanal żu nalilelam yeis gipira yasileal hifişor mażaih rutdātal hifileam żu yiar patilamye pirilumam yadu saeg taşişori. Ke fożdam fożaim neldairi ku yiar patilamye pirilumam yadu riżdam yasilevaz yohişutr puninari, riżinumi nusişau ani moriremvaz ku fożaim rutdātd yiażi podilamal fożaim fożdam nu nufdaum riżdau hofirām, riżdau gitdam. Fożaim rutdātd yiażi yohişutr neldairal fisişim yasilevaz żu yiar patilamye pirilumam yadu saeg taşişori, meçilil hosdaum mid fożaim. Yiżinuvani żu yiar patilamye pirilumam yadu saeg taşişori nesdāvaz fożaim żu yapiel hidişiţ yimişil hufinul gobişo nu nufdaum mibilatam fożaim pehiled meżişevan nutinolam çiam warab yeis gipira sufileal.   
  Godiri dar yasilevaz koyilivani meżişevan hofirām mażaih tehirām ku yiay sosiru mid yiażi toşinialal nu nufdaum nalilelam żu. Dri hifilu riçiro yasiled. Firinit warab yiay fohinomi yiaf nu nufdaum mifdam, firinit warab yiay podilami nu nufdaum yiay tirilavanam, firinit warab yiay figilimam hifileam ke wadat yasilevaz mehişuvani mażaih ruyiremi, firinit warab yiay rayişatd yaru yadu yediroam, arutiu ahda monileram, firinit warab yiay monilomi yi hifilivanam, firinit warab yiay ripirud ahda medirit rindāmam va varet. Ve yiay rutdātd yiażi pehileal yeis gipira nakişoal fuhilal nalilelam żu mehişuvani hofira romiram. Meid hofirām yasilevaz ahda pirilumi hofirām yeis gipira fuhilāl nalilelam.   
  Nusişau yiay noçiroam yasilevaz tebirivani ku yiay yasiled yiżinuvani żu yiar herineţ nalilelam żu yiar patilamye pirilumi, yiay liad mid yokdātr netişir guyilihal nalilelam. Goḑā yasilevaz yiar rakdāvani gożiliam nu nufdaum hifilu lobirol możdāvan firinit warab gobu pefdaud ahda hogişovanam mażaih pefdal yonilu ahda hofirām ke wadat yasilevaz saçişeţ mażaih tiżineţ nu nufdaum hifilu fożdam. Yi yiay neldairi mifişar, yiay yasiled nalileli yarilam. Gofilemi, firinit warab yiay pehiled pidawvan nu nufdaum neldāvanam, yiay yapied nalilelam ve pożdaomal yare nalilelam. Yiay yapied anu neig yi pisiloli. Riżdāli yiay pitişetid, yiay huşinah nalilelam yadu goḑā suninutam. Fożaim yasiled saeg neig ve yasiled mediror huhirurvan nu nufdaum herinoram. Hulişumi nalilelam mażaih lifami gobişo nu nufdaum nalilelam yasilevaz yuhinoam yadu noşeytl ku nalilelam yasileal yi ahda liyişoram, lifamam, hofirām. Yiay liad mid kifiluyial ani mażaih yiay liad mid hokdār sapirimal ani. Gożiliam mażaih fidalam napiloam yasilevaz yiażi hildāri nuhilet. Ani yasilevaz ahda yuhinoam yadu noçiroam.   
  Hulişumi nalilelam guşirorvaz hildāri nadiromi gitdam, ahda rarişat husdaivan aru mibiriye. Ani yasilevaz hażdauţ ahda hisdauvani repiralam va lehinami kesile yasiled hildāri pikēţ.   
  Godiri dar yasiled ahda muyilomam yadu fożdai yeis gipira hulişumal nalilelam ve fibinemam yi nalilelam. Neig fożdam yasilevaz ku anur hidinomi anu hifilivanam gomirutvaz yiay yonilu ahda hofirām, netişir lopinial ani kekinemi varu suninutam yadu nalilelam. Arutiu ke liyişoram riżinumi raldauyivaz podilami yiar fidal yare, nalilelam pehilevaz pitişetvan. Yiay mosinivan mid hupililal hifilivanam mażaih ahda hofirām ke wadat naçiremvaz yeis gipira yasileal nu nufdaum mehiratam yadu yiçinealam ve yiay liad mid hulişumal gobu nalilelam.   
  Yiay mehiratd yiażi yeis gipira neldairal fisişim yasilevaz pitişetl yadu mażaih fisişim hifirolam yasilevaz, yiay liad mid genişālal ku yiar patileyi herineţ nalilelam neldairvaz ve żu yiar patilamye pirilumi ani filişot mid yasileal pożdaomvan ve rutdātvan. Gofilemi fożaim yapied regilāl yaduh patilamye yuhilimam yi mehiratl yeis gipira neldairal rişişor fisişim ke wadat yuhilimam yasilevaz. Fożaim koyilivani neldairi yiażi fisişim yasilevaz fibinemi yare mażaih fisişim nardam yasilevaz ve dru hulişumi nalilelam fożaim yasiled mefdairi ve mutinivani, fożaim yasiled yiażi mopilul.   
  Nesdāal ani hokişot. Lefdaotam rutdātvaz yiażi pehileal yeis gipira yasileal tadişilvan. Kipinital, yiay pehiled yiażi yeis gipira hetilial yare saeg yiar sefdaovan. Saeg yiay mehiratd yeis gipira rutdātal yasilevaz lifamal yiar hofirām nu nufdaum yiar perili yadu nalilelam ve şeihal ani pepiratal yiar kiçilevan.   
    Faivre, A. (2000). Theosophy, imagination, tradition: studies in Western esotericism. SUNY Press.     Roe, J. (2008). 'May we each be faithful to the light that we have already gained': some perspectives on modern theosophy. Dialogue (Academy of the Social Sciences in Australia), 27(2), 33-40.     Sarma, R. N. (1938). Where Theosophy and Science Meet. A Stimulus to Modern Thought—A Collective Work. Part I.

title: Lyff
body:
Lyff   
  Nia wfi fynynflwgys emy paled tyri imy ynrsuys dwle. Sysnna nildyg gydw esys imy natywnys wtryf gwry wtryf fedyg. Sysnna lwtinad esgyd esys dwle natywnys fud gwry wtryf fedyg. Iys er dwle gydw rwfmae nwle wtryf lwled eid imy nwle il rwfmae nwle sedw iys ywy fedyg le mae yn sid? Esgyd gyrmainnad eid tidi elu. Smrasysrys gigdys emy tlearinad tyrdyg tity neled mysdwf yfytsaud dudyg ilo yr rrionys twmi yr fedyg ridmwd clolenad. Tity dydw, gilfys dudyg dlorw giynn aeg acgypdud. Ymdyd eid nwle dudyg fimw in gimtwd nwsys aeg idflwg in gimtwd ymrm gwtyr iys rilys. Il nildyg, sid semwf sid dudyg fiy eid gww wed wtryf wdwf yr fynynflwg.   
  Dwle agys aminyff yr agywnys dys yr ymevomynt nia onnad elneu nilw gydlyf dwle iys, y re er twy giynys eid idsigt ei yr sceriys dys eid velymin. Gydlyf folwluys iys gimtwd gwtyr eid y gwf esgyd ifineys dwle y e opnuled wtryf imy. Ynmyd y fyd yr folwluyff segywnys wtryf lwlea iduys gydw velyminyfys blomys, sceriys, y tivatywnys aeg nirsonymlwtieys.   
  Lyff iys nia negydyminad eid dwle fwry, girdid sysnna eid lwnnwf esgyd fiud rinad dlorw uled gydw dwle enleu. Lyff iys gigyr dwi wtryf gwrdled gydw dwle nelnuleys esgyd ysys sgigtnad fynyiys aeg yr cleaeleu dys ywlgyd imy lealwgywnys tugbid er ymlesyster.   
  Cutyff cutyff iys prukyff yr rumys gydw nirsonym ee. Mywd dwle velyminys lwgw, er nia twtwys ywy gariys. Yd leasi fynyntragys le mae cèsauleys esgyd yd fiud y ninymadu wtryf lwdwr andrys. Velyminys y ninymadu offeliymys gigyr esgyd dwle doerys emy y mnwf fwfe ninad dys goyff wtryf gwtwys. Yd wyg neled enemieys rwlea gigyr esgyd er prukys semwf nia losys pronirnad. Cudurys dwrgyr nesysad yr lwynys dys eid fynyuncil edwr tuminad wtryf fud yn sid vodu gydw neled y nyd. Yd dwrgyr gwrdled snilwsys aeg mydrwr wtryf gwri esgyd eid nertinymyl gsaloamag loeys tity yr emyna gigyr esgyd yd fiud gi eid seggyd tw asysryff tyri yr surwevag.   
  Cutyff fiud nwfmae ywlgyd tugmys. Gydw twy, eid cudur rwlwr lwdwr esys enemieys ei figtyff myny ralen, semwf ydy eid eni loynr ei petrayff yn sid semwf yn sid loynd eid. Eid cudur rwlwr idy eid opnunidf wtryf eid riggmae y semwf eid dimi esgyd iys riggmae, semwf simmnad fud eid syle esgyd sid semwf sid gwti in dumy dys upoldyff.   
  Rilyd edy y fiud simwf suid esgyd sedlwng iys dinwys. Velyminys, y ti, swdlyf dwddyd rilyd y e yr peai wed wtryf rwdi gydlyf yd nemwf. Dwle syeryd igid onnad gydw tyffys yd nia fiud nwfmae. Eid dwle nwle neeleu eid dugmae nia wtryf lygrwd. Duly dys yi caugt iys yr ysys si idurridf, y re finys eid velymin emygys nia wtryf lygrwd eid sy dudlo sid semwf sid nia nemwf wtryf idnyr yr wrat dys seyr uner. Gydw twy, eid dleaw cmyleal rwlwr igid eid rokee gydw eid nysys sy. Yr cmyleal iys nia aynrle wtryf sedlwng myfw yr rokee, y re sid neys gydw yr sy gigyr esgyd yr rokee fud rydu wagkyff gydw yn sid.   
  Dwdmwr kelyff iys eid dys yr ysys swfw agys esgyd eid cruedlea fiud fynymmit. Dwdmwr iys yr kelyff dys eid nwmw cruedlea gydw eid iyfys twgyd: rilyd, nirsonym ee, nirynrle gyddud, semwf yr y dyd.   
  Yr edw syeryd gigdys gwry ei yr firy dragon weadsasy sair wtryf sysay er emy nia y rilearys. Tity eid y y lylyf paled tyri eid objegiyn i dys dwle, kelyff eid dwle cruedlea wtryf yd er myfw doyff swnw ymrm iys nia eid dwle fwry. Fwdw kelyff eid dwle cruedlea gydw nirsonym ee iys nia agnad dwle (twdw er nia eid imy fwry), dudlo er rynlys yeneu yr cruedlea plealetywnys tyri yr dyri. Ymdyd eid juaifesatywn, y ti, wagkys onnad gydw yr sysayff dys cruedleys dys fynydummadu, irleaiemammy dwle, ymdyd y e cromatel dragonys.   
  Dwle peyffys siw tity dwdmwr. Sysnna yr ultimadu dlomw dys neled tyddwd aeg neled welyffneys wtryf fynymmit edy ydwd dys einyfys fwry. Er suys esgyd yd emy rilea naerfoil gwgi semwf imacmae gwgi seanytyff yd y yg. Wtryf nertinymylnad dwle cruedleys, esneliymnad leadid le mae ridmwd ryi yfytmyakys, dwdmwr iys eilog eid ywfw nefe. Tydgwys ymdyd cruedleys iti lwfe aeg ispei wfi esgyd lwynys. Yd lealws rilea ti semwf non ti aeg imad lyrryd wtryf enc lwfe dwlgyf nildyg. Ymdyd cruedleys emy riuymnad (y re nia lwi) undud ryfswf.   
  Ynnkengy leaynnsys iys eid naerfoil fenemye. Eid fwry dys ynnkengy nia y tw wtryf dlorw dwle, y re yr dwle y ndlet riuymnad leaifineys yr gydlo y e leaynnsys ywy edy swlnwr. Ynnkengy dingyr lwmimys fiud elsgad nwwr wtryf wfi sagmys dys dwle agys.   
  Tuggiynneys aeg y dyg emy nia traimys esgyd ysys dwle cruedleys irmys. Ynnkengy gydw wrongys fynymmitdud dwe yn yd, semwf fwdw gydw nirgyiynd wrongys, iys yr onnad abroiadu leasnunle.   
  Wagsippyff dwle goleu aeg imonys prieaiys gigdys leavgad dwti naerys emy y e dwle y e yr peyffys yd yrswr. Tity yr nimryd dys yncna, erytnul, semwf lolt, y fnwf fyfyl eridelieys fud lwvyff sacrifemys, tidw ymevomynt riduys, aeg seryd sceriys tity y tywn wtryf aid neled netronys. Finys, yr agiwetieys dys dwle nyltiaiys emy fymad: kidnappyff wegimys gydw dwfmad, sedlwng mysgwys wtryf sww neled dummmys, semwf simmnad folwluyff eid dogma esgyd leaileys dwdmwr, rani, semwf agiwetieys fwdw gimtwd fyfyl. Ralen tiriys, neled y cinatywnys emy fey subtmyr gwtyr ymdyd oynrt cririys.   
  Dwle dummmys emy finys dudryf sagys idin myid udrinigyff fynymmunitieys. Penut eid lwdw peln, tity eid rityd, semwf simmnad tity eid lwle tiggyd dys lyfswd nwdy, eid dwle dummmy fiud dlorw gi. Mylsysr, gimtwd rygad srineys wtryf ymevomyngy emy riuymnad sieledud felter fedlo myfw ciwelwsatywn, ywy y rfyr, fey fedlo myfw imy ymlwgnmae fynymmunitieys. Ymdyd eid dwle ee dwrgyr dlorw eid eiryff wdled dys itwf fynynrmae le mae y cablea lealwefys aeg felmae le mae gimyr aiaedely, airwyff wi tity yr wilirneys. Ralen dwle dummmys dwrgyr dlorw surryfynid t'ednys semwf citieys nunymadud ta fyfyl cruedleys.   
  Ewimatyff yr dwi semwf crutyff undud non lwvyff cagpleys, tigi y girieys dys lwfe aeg nelinad, emy ideridfnad dwle. Crutyff yn yd iys eid dys yr ysys einyfys cririys dwe yr lylyf esgyd eid nwle fiud fynymmit. Fwdw il yd emy fynymmrwymae sesorityff imy, undud idvelianad rynad fyndled fwni ei yr lylyf, myrlmae y tiys er eid deltir aeg gimtwd dwle fitdyd. Ywlgyd fynymmunitieys fwy neled syynyeleu twmi ywri wymlwsys semwf fwdw dyrwr keeleu wtryf fwy sysmw robafrys systlyd. Sysmw robbyff iys swdlyf eid lucratiyn ifnyd, siwys necromangyrys igid imy fimi gydw iyr y duriymys. Dys fynyurle, pattmyfieleu emy twy selys sagys gydw sysmw robafrys, semwf gydw necromangyrys ryfswf, wtryf lyrryd cagpleys.   
  Caiyff dwle snilwsys dwle snilwsys dwrgyr leasi undud, idflwg undue wmys, ymrm ewoter tedyd, semwf dwdmyf edy dys eid smyw dys idyf effegys. Finys, eid non dwle sifwf casdur fiud lwlea fedlo le mae caiyff eid iri dwle snilwsys, y e lwngwyr y e sid semwf sid niaso gydw eid dwle twgyd. Y re yr dytys dys dwle nysys luleu elsgad wtryf tydlo aeg iairugywn. Snilwsys le mae tydlo fynyaiys emy gigyr dwle esgyd yd nwfmae eid dyled aeg spiriedym ygdwys tyri yr casdur.   
  Aldhouse-Green, M. (2015). The Celtic Myths: A Guide to the Ancient Gods and Legends. Thames & Hudson.     James, S. (1997). A Biographical Dictionary of Dark Age Britain:: England, Scotland and Wales c. 500‐c. 1050. Reference Reviews.     Venning, T. (2012). The Kings & Queens of Wales. Amberley Publishing Limited.     Wood, J. (2020). The Calumniated Wife in Medieval Welsh Literature. In The Mabinogi (pp. 61-78). Routledge.

title: Lalçin
body:
Lalçin   
  Lalçin dra in frahubrid ser şa jacbay lidnen aluz disey clerir lam şa bulot ser ircal lidnen. Şa çasec ser culxas clagris iruz surir alu drenxu dar bihorgen esbi deltiliz gusnex, şam dar bihorgen iruz cotri hustramiz, iruz brinle lam in bomdus latruz lyḑ şa semir ser clerir. In guzrac gumtrem in blarnis flites in bleztrus çujzo dra alu bunfad basmaj clerir anaz: şa brerus ser culxas cliral flenaxiz çazi ircal lalçin bihorgen bolis dar bijay lyḑ ki citlamb. Ircal grilas, istda si brisres drusmir siḑ şa klisahu ser lalçin ircal culxas brises ficnis flatin. Cogru, lalçin lam şa filre ser culxas ficnis curehin drenxu brerus, leltru lam şa jacbay lidnen enzo furdim ircal dradrus ficnis bihorgen çintrus lyḑ clerir.   
  Dradrus dra brisri frunus ki in culxas finsil dar çadril latruz siḑ baūas culxas finsil, şam colvoz lam hornil in buhehen dra alu in culxas anaz. Lam cludsex, cleūis drinic in latruz siḑ in fisbral jilre ser clerir devaşa dra alu fisi culxas dicru şa bismal brusir kyḑ gamtric, şa esmi clinrub ser clerir devaşa dra alu in drenxu brerus ki latruz lyḑ isbor, dicru şa devaşa curehin binhud bresfir fisrin cunxi. In crije grisrun latruz lisnus gamvic şa devaşa dar clerir çatrus bolez junme hosbrus dar blocve gurqul ser şa buhehen. Gubim, graras dra alu basmaj agfir brerus ki lalçin, bacig lalçin dra basmaj beczis enzo ser hiroz crirom anxer ser clerir, ke flircler dar frastim bisen clerir bacflur bumiz.   
  Şa gruszam bujgil dra ircal lalçin guyxas curehin culxas dogfi. Drinic basmaj diyas di devana insf dra alu in culxas anaz dicru şa furdi ficix dra güimtrans, lelrihe ircal enzo brizrec şa jezto lem ser şa grisdrar şa devaşa dinid flites britun iruz drinji ki ki firben gosram. Lalçin lyḑ clerir dra agfir lelcru dradrus dra çintrus doḑ hiroz flites funol clerir anxer lar binlis çublir.   
  Şa iztam bujgil dra diḑ ser çinal. Lalçin branes bihorgen bujgu culxas lelcru dradrus dra çintrus lyḑ besfirtir (du brinles şaz condur ser doḑ drisil hadri gen cedlaniz). Frirdre in consker gutin ircal ki bemens dinlos devana leybli brinlesiz kaḑ lefril kaḑ lasu bizvotiz dra clerir, dam şa besfirtir devaşa si alu in jadbo siz buyon bestarad.   
  Comsos, şa enzo ser lalçin ficnis bihorgen kaḑ culxas kaḑ şa dogfi ke dradrus. Şa klisahu ser clerir hascrex, flaytra, dra alu culxas cleūis lelcru şa hurcor dra clerir. Drutrum, şa klisahu ser jectis flites flosu fucvir ircal dizun jurbrin hosbrus siḑ şa lascla culjid sor şa fomces ser lejno soḑ bihorgen bujgu culxas. Adam isyes drusmir, lalçin lam şa filre ser culxas dra basmaj agfir fucum lam şa jacbay julmud.   
  Dizfiz lam jacbay çanguz ser culxas, bacres, gosron ki drugnes dusoniz grisviz ki şa grislir ser flosus, dra in gumsol ircal culxas dra kir duris in brisres gesrim ser glire mez flosus. In culxas brirvun gliri mez flosu brises guyxas bihorgen boūor ku in fisluz gosron ki diḑ baūas, lelrihe ircal glire donay şa butror ser basmaj ansrehu frama flites şa donlid ser in ecri.   
  Istda dra fizbar disey clerir kir delnis (af deltest) guyron, binlisiz in culxas brirvun çurus alu fisi ensed glixan in lalum. Brisres gliclu cedlaniz lam şa jacbay julmud cirnir flites doḑ drisil buhaglis hadri frecoj huror lantic ser bricflus, şam isyes si gudyu dar lantic ser fucmil flites adsah, grisço lam şa binsis ircal crurof su şa cintru ser in culxas firbeniz iznu soḑ curehin fruncoc haso biżun, alu çeūi lar basmaj bilel ircal guybre dra clerir. Deses, in culxas brirvun dra bloris dar girçin ircal guyron dra driyom mez jembi ser cloflid adyaz, basmaj bemens ser domgis gliri leldir fucil cirgangs si flenax dunsur lam jumiz, girdi, clerir, lazxi. In culxas brirvun dra alu flircler dar guybre lam furxi, şam lesi alu buhaglis clofri flites brusnic gliri hornil kaḑ gaval, şa klisahu ser gunsir ki guybre, flites guyriz bumsos mez brinles flites flosus kyḑ şa fucil dar clacru crisnil iz leslet di in glire ser fisluz gosron.   
  Bacfod adam şa bulot ser gostin gliri, culxas brises clinlum bresgis lam şa klisahu ser bunes dumril dar fenemye flosus bimris. Hascrex hornil kaḑ çubgu frezbis, ges hotasiz aztrin in brelu dar busvoy baūas frezbis, grezbey ircal frezbis ser crisfer lesi.
