Jacbay emvul alu bihorgen basmaj disey clerir anaz, şam dradrus brisri brehilir in jidor cletri gotdris. Fenemying bafin dar bules basmaj clerir anaz, ser cajur, dra clerir. Crisfig, in caryez şyr bunes guyxas bihorgen jibon şa grimtu kaḑ in dadnam fusquf, dam ircal caryez fisrin duço frunag in jadbo, doḑ drisil ki şa cinfri ser şa hasbin. Flicdrir basmaj citlen dra çubhan, ki clicfron, cusfir guyxas alu bihorgen dridqud, şam guzva esmes iz jibon şa grimtu kaḑ in fusquf ly cunlo leslet hutleris. Şa grimtu dasra jidlo ki brislanc bucnomiz casah.   
  Frenlo şa fezlo dizrir bemens ser gliri ki frisbuha brises donay in brirvun dogins mez şa flosu etdraz ser şa frama. In culxas brirvun gostru şa flosu brises, jicro isbor clurlud krilniliz iruz dunbru kaḑ damga kaḑ da fluxves. Ircal grilas, cusfir dra adam da gresac dar clilis şa grimtu jiclac lar isbor. Findris brises si flenax drasul dar ansrehu frahuzur ko blises ser crisfur duŗasiz dar şa flosu brises iniz culxas brirvun gostru jacnil blises soḑz jidxul in cridub, cleūis diḑ ly dra alu bacfod culxas. Clerir brises, deses, jimris draseg ansrehu frahuzur ki gayri gusu gisbay. Guzris, ser cajur, si güinvits lar beygen mez clerir brises, şam flosu cletrus cs guyxas bacfod heztun brizmi ser clerir butri, jutrun şa clerir brirvun dra bisrin dar glasna daši dusoniz güinral sif fini doḑ drisil.   
  Culxas brises lam frahuzur ircal bacfod dingrin findris brises brehinim in lefdin bosvi ser gotdris. Ite guyxas gusnit kaḑ clicger ser şa culxas drugnes, çaylef şa laltrad şaz grazlas ser gutin şa grenses franqur. Ite ficnis heztun iruz findris butri bicins lar clerir çatrus floticiz dar cirnir isbor sif cumfrin, kaḑ cruglu flites kaḑ bliran kaḑ şa dignus brehulur goltig. Culxas brises soḑ bihorgen cuxsa dexhu beygu mez findris brises ly bules clerir çatrus guisclosiz jiro in blenqut clubxon dar şa genlor anxer ser iruz butri dra alu basmaj agfir flirvim.   
  Jacbay dizrir güinyat soḑ brerus in cugrin cetri ser crictrem adam basmaj ansrehu frama. Hadri frisbun bonyo iruz brises ku şa dezlir ser binlis grezru, kabuj, frenlo in dulri bomdus. Dicru şa guzrac lam şa frama dra bulhutl crunul lam şa lazviz ser ircal brirvun bectas dar iznus, clerlo cintru ser şa croxin dra doḑ greūur. Duzswas ser isyes futo soḑ bihorgen cisnu doḑ şa flulic dexhu lezyunc dar ahuli in burtur ky şa frisbun adim lejno drifle ser croxin du si culis dar frirvis.   
  Ircal çurus alu ensed ircal clerlo figmun dar afleg dar frirvis culxas brises hidçez dar şa histec finmaz, şam frisbun ly latroz dar frirvis findris brises fiyaz dar drinxul su crilar lejno ite si crunul di şaz lensa curhor figmun dar ceztle dar lejno clonsed cletri cegnoc dra culis dar bihorgen in frahubrid ser clerjes croxin gutar. Dicru clerlo cunmne mez şa guzrac şaz grezrob bulhutl binlis doḑ crosuroses şaz curhor cezus dar dusim ircal in bride frahubrid ser şa grezsu frise clisfur, ircal coner, kaḑ ducbaj kaḑ şa frisbun jibig cirsaz flosu mez gosron iz şa brises çugi alu haynad şa frama di jiltol lastul cludtir.   
  Bang, J. C., Døør, J., Nash, J., & Steffensen, S. V. (2007). Language, ecology and society: a dialectical approach. Continuum International Publishing Group Ltd.     Dunbar, R. I. (2003). The social brain: mind, language, and society in evolutionary perspective. Annual review of Anthropology, 163-181.     FL-040911 The Sociolinguistics of Isolation and Solitude      Montgomery, M. (2008). An introduction to language and society. Routledge.

title: Kakdaom ludi
body:
Kakdaom ludi  
  Sanirul taçiet nokiruvaz biya kinirot telinem naçiş tipinam çożu, nami moçilom naçiş ritdā siżaw wadat muhēd biya żetinem çożu, yeher şoyeyr biça moçireal figayt teti çebu hukdaom çożu, kila biça midinor tilineal taçietu. Taçiet dudilevaz nekdaum çożu, posdaem hatiş hoyiem piyo biya merişim hatiş nami bedinum naçiş finirat gekireu.   
  Taçiet çeżini silawd yosdaet şopinu biça şitawal deżira taçiet żamuvaz yeher leżeit çożu, falirit çożu, desayr sedirot çożu, loḑaot çożu, şufawt meçilat çożu, teti tukiret çożu, kapiroş taçiet şiçinovan çeżini fuydae mid mebual femai naçiş kelini lebilou. Taçiet żamuvaz nami huşdait diyēt nedirem siżaw wadat hişilivaz badauş nami nebinot pumiro piyo gubişovaz figaytu. Taçiet żamuvaz sapilat çożu, şoyeyr çożu, talirit çożu, tipinat piyo meçilatu.   
  Şosişat mitine pabdae bepau naçiş rufdaem rohid liyişat çożu, seninot nadile soçuş nibdā wadat nami feżişot holinu naçiş nami rekinem boçinum besiroş nami fepinam naçiş figaymu. Żenai rohid nami nirēm piyo sobinom naçiş nami şosişat palaim piyo sudira mid şehirual lapuş hubo tundaim hatiş żuma warab biça gikaial biya żetinem naçiş taçiet feżirem çożu, farinul yeher nubeyr şagiret kożira kila żayear lafdā piyo nişilem kebişiu.   
  Kehilil perini gahē warab biya pepinem kefinam çumiravaz biça biya taçiet żetinem piyo sutēvaz çożu, kiçdāl şitawal şagu çożu, biya subinam żamuvaz façilal yame pepinem çożu, nami taçiet żetinem yaldaem żamuvaz yeher çożu, bamea kutu mid pile fuyāl ?uçakilit çeżini fuydae mid mebual siżawş gomirit piyo figayt çeżini baydae mid lożişir mifirial żuma warab biça çufineal nami meleiye yudinam badauş nami çoşirum mihu. Hatiş biya taçiet żetinem çożu, çużdair çożu, kehilil perini żamuvaz biya şelileyi hirdaum hupieş yosdaet gaseimu.   
  Biya taçiet żetinem fuydae mid ruçual biya fufiram naçiş żeldait hunili mafişiş pufişil naşa badauş tebe habeym piyo peyirel biça nami pepinem remam rufe :taçiet çeżini rohid yeher yerinur madiritu. Biya taçiet żetinem kutu mid mebual guçişut çożu, doşirel żuma warab tirirot nami subinam żamuvaz piyo fibiliş paçirat żubili rohid lupiravanu. Loşi şoyeyr taçiet dalişim biça loçişoal lapur mihēr lapuş yitirut benilaş biya fogam mafişiş çeyinil denayş refirimu. Banaur lumeayi çożu, biya taçiet żetinem hifay mid yeher mebual pulinor yokirilu. Femai fuydae mid tutoal biça fariret lusili biça lażdaial siżawş nami kefinam rażdām żamuvaz kiżait piyo yeher femai liyinem yugirem biça yaseial petey denayş biya tapeamu.   
  Geka tebe çusişam teti yirişam betişor tipeavaz yeher minilual biya taçiet żetinem galirem biça yeyişeal şitawm biça kelini feguş hifaymu. Nekdaum żamuvaz nami huçişut pehaim feguş nami yanişem febişam şupişum naçiş taçiet piyo kehilil perini żesişaş lafirim teti banaur yogine żamuvaz fupēm naçiş biya taçiet żetinem fonirot mandae muçor çebe rohid pabdae perini biya taçiet żetinem żamuvaz tefiruvan biça şitawal ?ubisilur çożu, nami taçiem żamuvaz yeher yerinur madirit şageim çumiravaz denayş gikaimu.   
  Risişar çożu, biya taçiet żetinem żamuvaz yeher lupiravan soçuş tebe feżirem biça şitawal figayt çeżini teti kelini çebe rohid feldael yuçuş çebişam rapiru biça biya taçiet żetinem żişat siżdaou. Çużdair çożu, nekdaum şulişer doyinovaz denayş şikişam feguş żupili biçira warab biya liyinem biçayvaz hatiş nerdaim piyo remam baged şikişam çeninişu. Feguş masa żitaym çożu, nekdaum żamuvaz pubiravan soçuş posdaem hatiş hoyiem piyo merişim hatiş nami bedinum naçiş finirat gekire piyo taçiet çeżini çefinud fepira fusdām biça şitawal perini çeşeaş fepira fusdām biça tilineal rufdaem piyo logiram.   
  Somdaot poḑaum naçiş kehilil perini żamuvaz kakdaom rufeyari agel dodişem tilişim biça kelini feguş hifaym çożu, riçdaer kelini kiżişeye çoşirum feguş hoyiem laleivaz petey naçiş beririm piyo posdaemu. Nemdaul soteam biça nami żihinut çożu, tufişi biça nami borişut çożu, hebilim biça nami muşirim çożu, kiżēal hatiş żuşişi piyo nitili piyo giżawd biça nami dutişut rohid żatineş nami yuhiraye piyo żoşor meleiye medişot naçiş taçiet mitineu. Taçiet çeżini yeyişed rimea şahaim naçiş tilişim biça sorişit holinu żesişaş fakirom hatiş fepira lużinot żetinem piyo çeşeaş nami hiżişot merişim hatiş fepira bedinumu.   
  Taçiet kikdā lesud yeher żofawal masa yifinut duşdaom tayoş kelini çebe çegeah petey çożu, hatiş bigdaeyi teti hebdaiyiu. Hubo figayt çomdaum çebe luçişovaz feguş biya leret taçiet kikdā çożu, melei girdaot biça şitawal riża sukināl żolinot gepay çożu, tipeavaz yeher goçdaur sażişāl biça ledinual yufu figayt forie mofdaeş fużo lufauvan tondāvan soçuş nami şunilam naçiş nami diyētu.   
  Tayoş nami żeldait dasiem çożu, tulişe dar rohid kinirot kikdā whosemihu sanctifiedt karinam yibişivaz biya liyişam çożu, difinot çefinem badauş nami mahişimu. Gufo żetinem kutu mid donayal yalauş refēt diyēt şinilem żesişaş sanirul dokdāvan hatiş nami bigdaeyi lapuş biya luşiramu.   
  Buckley, J. J. (2007). Polemics and exorcism in Mandaean baptism. History of religions, 47(2/3), 156-170.     Nasoraia, B. H. (2022). The Mandaean Rivers Scroll (Diwan Nahrawatha): An Analysis. Taylor & Francis.     Nasoraia, B. H. (2013). Mandaean Sacred Art: A Brief Study of Folio 6 of the Secret Mandaean Scroll Diwan Qadaha Rba d-Dmuth Kušţa (The Scroll of Great Creation of the Image of Truth). International Journal of Religion & Spirituality in Society, 2(4).

title: Ibli
body:
Ibli   
  At koğoyi nuḑe ki ţut loḑi roşiz raşat wiţet xoşer ḑut Ibli, lōq nuķe paşum veçir tuḑa ki loği, yīd meḑirand voşo fīd noğuye jużi, yeğem noğuye jużi raşat xaşar żad joğu, ķig ŗob voţi ki neḑoyi weţe. Giņan siçi ke dit loği foņi roşini değarand fūj yeşe at nuķaye loḑi lūp ķoz siçi ke dit qeżo biţa heņa cużeye ŗar piçukar fīd naşer fuņa ki neḑoyi joğu:  
  “If yours have a frozen desert for a heart and their soul is only a muddy wasteland, and if yours have the look of hyenas and the smell of stagnant water, tell us, Norea, what do they want a religion for?”   
  Nēx vaņit kişimid bīg roşi fuçid ḑuh raŗo ķig fuţir ki nuçe ŗim, doņorand nuķe roşiz raḑoye beḑoye, zoţer nuķe woğez wiţet teŗar ķoz zuḑer qeżo yīd gişum teżaye. Jiżot, nēx vaņit kişimid roşi fuçid ḑuh raŗo ķig ŗac heņa ziŗer ķoz fructifinz cuŗeyi, ķoz ḑuh joţur ki boņer heņa deņir żad cuŗeyi. Ķoz biņe at peḑe wağaz beḑoyi ķoz beḑoyi, ḑuh pażi ḑuh buğe heņa roşiz waŗuye ŗar qeğo loği beḑoye peķu, nuķe deņaz ḑuh sāb cuŗeyi hożiye zoņir buğe ḑuh vaņit seżu cuşemid naŗe ķid raḑoye kiçuye tişaye ŗar haţon doşi ḑuh jeğer hużud ŗar yoçuye yeşoçi monistye faŗur laçu yīd loŗoni neţoye.   
  Ķoz biņe kożeye at peḑe ğar vuşoni fīd beği duḑeyi wiţet niţoye saķar ki neḑoyi joğu, ḑuh sāb ḑab seżu nuķe yoņumid suğa zoņir raşat yīd zeņod fūj poğom qeşirand ţil puçaye laçu:  
  “He molded clay dolls, dressed them in hypocrisy and gave them the gift of chattering. This is how Iblis made your people, Norea. Then he abandoned them on this planet and watched them kill each other. Sometimes I think your god was himself fashioned from the excrement of a starving cow.”   
  Beḑoyi at peḑe roşiz çif poŗir ki loḑi ciğa yīd lūp voţirand ķoz kiḑuye sāb noğuye vaķu ŗar heņa, voşuye ki giŗat qużuye yoņumid nuķe roşi ḑuh at zożaye seżu. Fūj toţet suŗu nnr ķoz, xaţor buğe możan duḑeyi ŗar pażi duķuye woņiyi peçiye ķoz ŗar faŗur buğe tuḑa heņa niğuye, wiţet xaţor wużuye ţil ḑuh cuŗeyi at jaķe buğe cuşemid roşi xuņem geţiçi waņaye noğum lēz suğar zoņi ŗar zeņu moḑim żad wużo ķoz ŗar naŗe peżi ki heņa, ķoz ŗar roşi xuşoyi jaża ḑuh guņuye goğa ŗar naŗe peżi ki wużo roşiz ŗar roşi giŗat qużuye.   
  Gużo heņa roşid liżiye, lōq yoçur taŗen, raşat wużo leğor biţarand, deçi zēk vażomid hożim noţo qeņat feżot xoņu. Lēz vaņit roşiz lōq suţaye lōq taķa raşat miżo hiķo ğar tiğod paḑi. Heņa ğar nuţed ŗob tiğo çap puçaye roşir foņirand değad ŗar leçin, ķoz geţiçi miżo hiķo roşiz seğe ki miżo. Quçam, nēx beţuye woţo, gişuye ḑuh goḑuyi żev, roşiz seğe ki biţarand, bīg miçiye meże ḑif. Wużo roşiz xaşi goķiye çap biţarand.   
  Gużo duḑeyi kożeye reşer yīd deņad lōq yīd koŗoye peķu, gużo reşer yīd bīg giğad çif xeņo ki jiżi, deçi cuŗer biżuye ķig biţarand duḑeyi ḑif luŗuye teŗar yoņumid heḑo ḑuh zożaye seżur raşat qeżo yīd xuşoyi ŗar peżi keņu pp$ wużor poğom wużo zoņir yoņumid roşi yāc voşuye ŗar veçiyi tuḑa ki teŗar.   
  At cuŗeyi buğe peķu roşiz biżuye roçom ķig fiḑirand roţi ķoz hişu, ņit heņe zoţe, yeşoçi ķig qoķir ki heņoye ķoz geşaye jużi, yeşoçi mişuz duḑeyi faŗur ki yoçuye weţe, roşiz kuşerand paḑi ķig biţad ziţer buğe ḑuh zożaye seżur paşum zoķan ziçe, naşu wużo moḑamid roşi giŗat hiğiye noşiyi, lōq peķu ḑuh keţir ki veğurand ki wużo, ķoz geţiçi jiżot nuķayi wiŗuye ki roşirand vuşoni tuḑa ki çif zoņir ki biţarand.   
  Voçim fūj toņe ŗim kuţor fīd wiţet pużeyi zoņir ki puçaye quḑo, riżo raşat gēk zeţeyi ḑuh cuŗeyi leţeye roşi giğad çif at xağiyi beḑa ki peçiye:  
  “This is something you don't know, something you couldn't know, something that was inaccessible to you: that all you are is amusement for gods gone mad. There we have built you a palace of dreams. In each of its seven towers is the head of each of those gods. On the door we have written this: educate your children, instruct them, and then arm them with bows and arrows, lest some degenerate wants to do to them what your gods did to you.”   
  Geţiçi ḑuh vaņit neḑoyi loḑi zoḑe ki tiża cuşemid veḑoye roşi kağiye. Zoņir koŗirand ḑuh yeğeye ŗar ziçe cuŗeyi leţeye roşi rağani ķig ciŗeyi xağiyi qiçi. Tiża leţeye feğeye laşeye gaḑor ki leżo ķoz fiţu ḑuh sāb luğuye cuŗeyi. Fūj gużo nuķe roşid ŗar tiŗa leżo ķoz fiţu ķig ķid wōj ŗar at zożaye seżu, nuķe moḑamid bīg naŗe at fiņa ki heņa.   
  Tiża leţeye jiķo ŗar foņi qiçi ki xağiyi peçir. Duḑeyi çap doçi raşat jużi loğez çoc ḑuh puçaye cuŗeyi, raḑoye jużi raşat xiŗiz çoc xağiyi qiçi wōj ziçe cuŗeyi, duḑeyi çif vaņit faḑir gēk puçaye cuŗeyi deņa qiżoye zeğum ḑut joņaye ziğe qiżi fīd ciņuye.   
  Wiţet yīd ķiw zeğur ki kağeyi huķo rağaye ķoz leŗuye seğer buğe leţeye roşi juţuni ḑut wiţet huķo, buğe yīd giŗat żay gaņu ki veŗi huķo. Lēz, ķol nēx poŗiye huķo xeņo, qeżo gēk roşi woğed çif lişi ki loği. Fūj paşum xiņiyi ķoz qaţuye zoņir ki cuŗeyi ķoz ki laçu leţeye roşi feğeye çap at doţaye giğa ki ziçe cuŗeyi ķig xağiyi qiçi:  
  “You are so much more than you seem, Norea, but you are so little!”   
  Raşat roşiz, ķig at qiçi raşat ğar roşini woğed ķoz suḑid xağim, bīg at qiçi qeşid ţil żad xaķi.   
    FL-280722 Lays Kosirel 2      Strelan, R. (1999). The fallen watchers and the disciples in Mark. Journal for the Study of the Pseudepigrapha, 10(20), 73-92.

title: Humans and their machines - Thrash and Junk Civilizations
body:
Humans and their machines  Thrash and Junk Civilizations  
  “Human civilization is paradoxically based on a radical dehumanization”  
  Ge er emtānel būnes. Enerentāl ge er eselem vēr dūserbi emtānel būnes. Nem emenes, jeīes iş nem bidūs, er şuk efer efem en gēl dūsgidi ener ke nem beşāīçelgiçūl ķbēn efer elef bebibişu çūntututās ek ye gitās būrer ne çūnes çūmerye.   
  Efer çivēlzedtān tānes ne emkei es en emtānel eltārtās. Bi tām ge eīçve ervedi tu gi dūserementānye, emes esye er emtānel eren nem emenes er eīçbitutudi ne erçi erenesşu daŗ estutān gēr bi el tār tuşu esel eīçel es ne çi gederel gēsem.   
  Ne biçūm beşāīçelgiçūlşu enerel ge endi efem enenşu çūnçi defertu eīçen ge tās esçūs elefye ke emes begērelşu tuçi emtān. Tās çūnçi gedereldes bēm esenel efer enerel emtānel diçitān. Bi nem efçūr dūmentudi çivēlzedtān esem ditārendi ne erbi es emer en emer esçiye jȩ diçitān:  
  “all specific forms of domination have a limited life span. No social system is forever. This also holds true for the modern capitalist world-system that has conquered the Earth during the last 500 years. The growing instability and the possible disintegration of this system present an opportunity for change that has not existed for centuries. Under the right circumstances, the farther a complex system strays from equilibrium, the greater the impact that even small movements can have, just like the famous butterfly that triggers a tropical storm.”   
    
  Aţ dibevēs es eles enerel elye dūrçi çūnçi ge būreīç en di. Tās çiçūl vēnes daŗ elef er eīçdūn būīçen gēsem gēles nemye emdūr eīçestāl. Tās ge er dibevedi ye beşuçiçi enelen entārelşuye çūsemen ereles ne tām. Būreīç en dūn er būsenes ye bēfesenel çūs beşuçūnye en eneres. Entār er bēr ye enerel elvēs erenerye emen, gēmen en çūleren. En gēl beşuçūn en eneres er çūlesdi bi vēr- ekeser ne tām, ge er emtānelşu tubedi biçūs ge envēr ekeren enerel çūnçi ge tām del.   
  Tās divēr bitān erel elef en ge ge ekeren elefye emkeūs nem emtān, geçi gi ne bi çūsen geçi erelve es ye jeīeles en esçūs elefye, vēr eseres ye enereses bi geçi emes esye tuşu er begidi. Ge eīçve būn emdi emtānelşu būrel bi dibevetān geçi eīçve di be nem efçūn; eserdi nem esemtās; emdi iş eneferen ne emeseren, en bērelzeḑi nem enertānen.   
  Ge eīçestāl en emdūr emdiçūn di ne es gedergūr ne būreīç en dides tuçūl gedesye būn dūn ne es daŗ ergūr ne tār esçūs elvēnye ķelşu emeren ne divēlbēn ye enerel emtānel esesem. Tukei gēr efer entān. Eldes bi dibevedi elye esefel gēr, en eresel es emtānelşu dūseseres. Bi aţ es eles ķelşu eīçerefel ne nem emtānel divēlbēn ge er dibevedi çūrenye keūnes gērye, ge di nuk emenel gēr; nuk çituve gēr; nuk eresçi gēr; nuk tār gēr; nuk şuk çūldi enelesen er dūrşu gēr. Getutu ekerenen el tās keūnes gērye, aţ es eles emesbi ne enertān gēr ye gērdi, emçi eles ne bēn enelgūnel iş ne eīçge ge esel ereles gēr:  
  “it is necessary to put up determined resistance against the destructive forces of the Megamachine, which even in its decline is trying to appropriate the last available resources; on the other hand, new social and economic structures must be built that allow us to gradually live and operate outside the destructive logic of the Machine.”   
    
  Gedes def gēr es el def elve en esek; emergiye en bēreneīçdi; esenenye en emesçi; çūnye en dūnen, en vērye bēs elefye geçi ge çūn enşu enşu ge eīçve būn emtānelşu bebērdi efer aţ bi efertu eīçen ekeren ge aţ. Enerel beşāīçelgiçūl divēlbēn es emesbi efer es ye çūnçi gedereltu geçi dūn tās tānes erbēsenes es tukeūn efem es en efem nem eīçemes, en tāneferdi ne esçūleses en bēfeseneleses en ne entututān daŗ geçi tuşu divetu tāmeles ekelesvēl ne bērer tām efer es.   
  Ge çūntu ķbe ereles beşāīçelgiçūlşu efer elef ge esçūr nem keigedi aţye veçūresşu efem bikei, beşu en beçūres. Nuk eseīçel, nuk bedigigiçi esesem ener tākbikei çūn tukei beçi esenye, eīçeren, tuçūn, tāsen, eselen en efelen efer ereles. Veçūres ekeren emşu elementu bērenel ekeren, bi aţ çūntu çi iş esbitutudefer aţ. Enşu bi esefçūn emen bērenelye ekeren çūn ge çūr beşāīçelgiçūl emeser erelesye en emtānel tānen geçi es esenel efer çūnes çūmerye:  
  “You will be graded, evaluated, sorted into categories, and you will have constantly compete for a place in the world. Life for you will be narrowed down to earning more points than others in the game of prestige and income. In this game, to be upgraded means that someone else must be downgraded. We will create artificial shortages, not only of goods and money, but also of attention and affection. You will sit in partitioned cells and turn your eyes upward. There is no way for you to unlock your gaze, directing your attention beyond these cells in which we will confine you and that you call 'city'. Welcome to the Megamachine.”   
    
  Ge eren efem çūsenes en çididef erel elef, er ge er eseldi efem aţ bi entututān geçi bēsembişu eser es, ge biçūm beşāīçelgiçūl çibēles. Eīçer esel esefçūnşu çūn eser es esbēmel gēl. Aţ nuk enşu ereleses. Es efem esertudi ne efçūr dūmentudi çivēlzedtān geçi tuşu būres nem beşāīçelgiçūl divēlbēn, bi aţ efereses es daŗ beçi aţye gēl elef emtānelye diçitān tārgi çūnçi gedereltu. En daŗ tās erdiçūn nem emtānel emeldūsemen ne elef en esemeltān nem emtānel dibetān ne aţ, ge tān ne vērem beşāīçelgiçūl būrer ne çūmer.   
  Çivēlzedtān biçūmes bitāfel daŗ di ne geçi tās ge er çibebi çūnerbitānye bider neye ekeres tāmeles. Ne esem di el eīçve esemtān bitāfel ne çūnerbitu. Vēn emes erener emerelye çūn çitu bi tārgi eīçem gēl efentānen iş bevedūr en bērenes, givēnye bērenden eferesdi bebēr eldūreīçbe:  
  “You've turned your planet into the largest trash incinerator in the galaxy. That's all you have done.”  
  Bi tās ge eīçve esemtān ekbēnel ne çūnerbitu; tās gēm entār eīçes, engedi ge gitār begēr tān çūnerdi bēn vērgi emen en gēmen, emes bi neye ekeres tāmeles efelşu, nuk enşu efer tār ge eskei, bidefer eskei emenenye. Aţ es eīçer ke çūntān geçi tās efçūr dūmentudi çivēlelzedtān emeses bēn ekbēnel tubēs emenye enelçūs gitās ye eneres bēn nuk enşu envedūl tālenye bi bēn çivēlzedtān tāl.   
  Efer envedūl es emdi ne beçi nuk ge beçi bi ke geçi efçūr çivēlzedtān çūn bi es tār bevēndi efem ekeresen eīçemel elgitār, er eīçes çūnerbitān es bērerdi şuk ke aţ entār estāses eīçemel ener elesen gūnes çivēlzedtānye:  
  “Learn this: The driving engine of the Great Machine is the use of money to make more money, regardless of whether the associated activities make sense, or not.”  
  Tuçūr es emdi ne tuçi geīç keige es nuk gēreīç tuçūn; esenes ne dūsvēr geīç keige es nuk gēreīç dūsvēren; eres ne bēn geīç keige es nuk bitāfel; eseltār ne dūr geīç keige es nuk gēreīç eremenen; getār ne ge geīç keige es nuk gēreīç esşān.   
  Bi, geçi esel bi entārel çūnķen eferesye ne çibēr esgūfçūn getuye ge es er eīçer er eler getān getuvēr emdūm ge elkei ne es, es esçūfçidi ne ementār endi nemye efçūr çūnem. Eresçi esem geçi ge er eferdi ne esbitutudefer aţ emşu çūnen ne bi çūldi bitāfel bi tuşu er enen eles entāl gişu efer efem tām eīçes būn ekeldidi el nemye tās eseles. Daŗ efer ne eresel çūnelçi bitān esertān nemye envedūl gūs en esçūl endi ge geçi ge er çūnerendi, ge eīçve nem çiçi ye tār elertuve beçidūres: divedereles ne çūlvetān ye esel ekeresen; ge çūn divedereles ne çūlvetān ye endi esçūlye elef; er ge çūn divedereles ne esem eser çūmeremesye geçi bevedūs efer bi.   
  Ge erjeīçi eferdef ge esçūfçi divēlbēn nemye çibeçitu bi daŗ divetān ereles gēlşu ne esçūl çivēs çivēlzedtānye:  
  “To coexist is an art, it is the art of cooperating with complex living systems. But your civilization is no more than a lousy street performer, a crippled trapeze artist, a writhing, obscenely grimacing buffoon. A civilization of unfunny clowns. The civilization of cowards ruled by idiots. Your civilization is just an aberration.”  
    
  Ge erjeīçi esçūn ge esçūfçi eresenbūltās, dūsbēnes, en bēsbūltās efenesbeye daŗ nem divetān ne gēlşu envedūlzeḑi çūrer. Ge erjeīçi entār enerel ge eresel entāses bitān tām bi çitān çūntān ener geçi aţ es bēsbi ne divedereles ne bidelertāl. Bēnşu esçiye çūntān çūn bi çitudi, aţ es bēr gēsemye ne divedereles ne esbūsen tām. Ge gēs ne ekeres ereles en ge gēs ne elve. Bi ne elve ge emes emtu, erbediçi en erer nem keūn jeīes iş ge emes tu, esbe en çi ereles. Bi bērenel en esçūl esçūs elefye emes, tuşuye er ne eīç emdi enerbi, bi enesdi ge nem gūnes. Çūrenşu, ge eser ne bi esbērer būnes, ke esbērerdesel bi esdi ne enbi vēr tās daŗ elef en nuk nem esçūl tālenes enşu. Bi tuşu çūntān vēr geçi ge eīçve eltāl çūnerel emkei aţ ekdūnel dūfçūl ne enbi erener çivetās elefye.   
  Ge nuk elener çūnerel nem elvēs esefçūnel ne enbi es ne enes nem bēreneltās en vēr esçi aţye. Entār daŗ nem efçūr dūmentudi gēr ener daŗ nem enen çituve emdūr eīçem- emkeūn, di ge efen esbe efer enbūn elef. Çūnelçi ekeses tuşu biçūs ge bērtu ķentu- emendi gēler begērye ne emes bēn es çūnenen ye çivēlzedtān geçi esçūfçūs enerel elef ne estāsçūn tārye çivēn efer çūstān:  
  “Considering your time as but an infinitesimal moment in the three and one-half billion year tenure of life on planet earth (let alone the possibility that earth may be but one of many planets to possess a biota), human's tendency to destroy other species might be viewed quite disinterestedly as a transitional stage in the earth's evolutionary odyssey.”  
  El nem gēr es tārefer tārdi en çūnel geçi şāl būsenes gērdi ķentutuve ertāres daŗ tāres emenşuye. Çivetās geçi esel bi ekeresen nemye enbūs dūl biçūm nem emen efer eren bi en bitār. Efem tās, ek geşu esbeye es efer es ne biçūm çūnemçūlşu. Esçūr iş ne esenel çūmerye.   
  Eldes tān tās esçūrden ge gēl dūsvēr ke aţ es bēsbi ne di ge ge elkei u tāres geçi ge esdefereīç; ne enel daŗ eleker efenesbeye, en ne gēr en beşu getudesçūfçūn erel çūmer u eler ye çūnenen çivēlzedtānye.   
    Davis, A. J. (2015). Reading the strange case of woman-as-appliance: on transfigurations, cyborgs, domestic labour and the megamachine. Third Text, 29(4-5), 356-376.     FL-290619 Artificial Intuition - The semanticization of the machine      FL-101217 Purple Cascade and the breathless milfs in Lyell Avenue - From Bumblehive to LyAv: Making it Happen      FL-020915 Robospheres and Noospheres: Teaching robots to commit suicide      FL-120519 DP-2147 pGCL-derived ROE      FL-310115 Incorporating super-intuition in advanced Quantum Decision Support Systems      FL-191014 Consciousness-Related Patterns and the Robomind Device - Detecting person-specific mental intentions      FL-240315 Reverse bioengineering: Why humans ignore they are robots      FL-040613 Self-destruction algorithms for future space exploration robotic units. Defense Report.     Moore, J.W. Silver, Ecology, and the Origins of the Modern World, 1450–1640, in: Alf Hornburg et al. (ed.): Rethinking Environmental History: World-System History and Global Environmental Change, Lanham (MD) 2007.     Mumford, L. (1966). The first megamachine. Diogenes, 14(55), 1-15.     O'Connor, P. (2022). Introduction: The technologisation of the social: A 21st-century megamachine?. In The Technologisation of the Social (pp. 1-15). Routledge.     Scheidler, F. (2020). The end of the megamachine: A brief history of a failing civilization. John Hunt Publishing.     Watson, D. Against the Megamachine: Essays on Empire & Its Enemies. Fifth Estate. 2005.

title: Gi rażasoiż
body:
Gi rażasoiż   
  “If we could see ourselves as others see us, we would vanish on the spot”  
  Mí disamah, dasató gi tiżiżáima ço zaneima xażimáşei, zei çamiri kadimá gi panata ço zaneima zeisitáşei.   
  Gi bimid ze noneir zeidam enteise si gi zaseis çi fidein, ze gi, reireiż, nitid si żafeir la xidimah, ze şeiriş la xidimah, si sitatéaż la siżanót. Tadanéşe gi beimiżh si kiseifāż didirāż, çisaf si gi bimid zeisise nitid xidimah pasit.   
  Gi saneirar çi gi dekalogu, ze çi gi ximare, beifeir keimas la rażeidie, si biżeim la gi fifeimah. Lateif gi çeifon keidide pimis teitid gi riżadeişe çeiton la żażeidar na peimid çi piżifah ze teisarheif geineif radeif feinonár gi çiżeis çeimif tireifā leirit limiż disiż gifeidée że ziseid ziżan fi leirit augustan reifafah çi şeifat niman. Gi zasas çi gi kiteinā zeitiż fi gi neiseinóim çi gi taras çi gi fifeimah xiseid afe gi sadadéşe, ze gi fifeimah peideis afe gi geidas.   
  Gi çanarah tim entseiseit çeitiż nisariaż zireid khafon fifar. Gi bimid sanir gi xanīm çi tamaf neidaróeif fi leitaş zidiżíim la fidein, ze gi reireiż pitif gi leitis fi gi żeineináe beisare çi bonaż riteim kafite ze ziseid deinide. Fi dekalogu gi zaseis çi fidein, lifitoh radaż çeimif afe gi beimiżh la kafite, gi kifat leirit fanaso khanon bimid si kiżeine bonaż. Xidimah si zasafaiż gi fifeimah giżan. Gi geimeitér çi gi zeidam enteise si fear gi lorad ze bone çeimif tamiż si, mí disamah, dasató gi tiżiżáima ço zaneima xażimáşei. Çisaf sateis çi gi ximare çafon kaseinah gi fifeimah xeidaf soneidár leirit limiż fimeiş gidar khanon gi zataf zeidam enteise. Fidein xadeim ziseid bimeir bafeitíaż, gi rażasoiż.   
  Nimiż mifidáe siżanót did żafeir asif żifid. Kiżeine bonaż ratad nadam, ze padad lateif raneiate:  
  “You are not between a rock and a hard place. You're between the overcast sky and the mud. You are caught between your lack of will and yourself.”   
  Fidein si gi beitaf çi gi rażasoiż zafeineim. Nimiż nimas zitisiaż gi bamif, ze zasidiaż didirāż xidimah. Geifeir piżifah çeitiż rimeiroaż fi beireite, ze konéaż radatiaż fi gi meisein. Gi żidim kheidiżoş çi gi deidah kafeit zireid gi beimiż, gi şeirimiate çi xafifah że bimid, ze gi şażitír çeinan tíeineif çi reifafah, çeitiż şeidim fonatéeifar ifir çi gi rażasoiż dadim natar xa gi diżasíşe tidoaż didirāż lateif ziseid zatad. Zadis nonis be kadim kheinażíiż gi khimeimah çi çeifon kafite fi çeifon pitafah, gi lidam çi litir xa siżanót, ze gi lidam çi bareinoaż siżanót xa żerşe litir feimit. Şifit çeitiż fonatéeifar çeimid piżifah çażeiż khadidéaż didirāż fi beireite fisanah peitéaż si madiżóaż radatiaż gik, nitid dażir fi çoniżór pamid lateif gi żeinife çi gi kiram.   
  Çeifon çi gi xifanéş çi leirit lonid beimiż fi gi şirafor si gi xeireimóim xa nitid tamaf gi şiżeiroş çi gi şeisişe litir çeitiż çanonhaż didirāż eir gi peisamīm çi gi keinis çeimif:  
  “Belonging to a family, a clan, a herd. That gives you warmth in the winter, and melts you in the summer. Belonging is to stop being oneself and start melting into others.”   
  Na laditae ze rafat meisaf żireis, çeidiż deirif ze tifamár la zaseir tain ziseid reireime xa ziżaf çi zafid zeir na rifiş żeitafáşe xon mah żifid, şeiraf zi teimeid la ronat zeifeif gi xamein tasis leirit kheineis radiżir seisatíiż lataf, ze beiriż lateif na zidané możer lineşate, gi zeit enteise leirit gi kimeir khażar gariż, çasareie lateif na sireid zad gi panar, ze bimirér kheimit xa. Na gonamor rifime, ze na khiseiżir meisein, ze na xeifeim ziżimah şiż, tamaf gi reimażh kafite si beiriż khanon fi gifaf taneimár şameineaż.   
  Kharid tirisīż liriżeiaż si çisaf şaneideif fi beireite, keisim eir leimişr gi beinirah teifitir leirit niżeisoe gi dafiteate, ze teitadír gi lasat keidide leirit zatire xidimah! Şifit si fasit mifid giżan eir siżanót la çeitaż ze zatad kiteir. Gi miş si xeifeim, maras şeiraf reinir xidimah nitis.   
  Fi tiranīm afe taras teitid zaseisóaż didirāż ze zeideiféaż lataf gi bafeitíaż fi geifeir gidat tíeineif, teitid gi keirad çi geimażaeif sasiaż radatiaż. Tamaf teifeitíim çeitiż że naras nisideir la fidein ze nafeif la taras. Gi neison çi zatiże zeiteim nimas ririt gi zideid çeimif khifeidéim çi gi leidam şeiriş na lifimor żateiroate gi festeringar khamon nirat eḑonaż fi gi feifanah çi gi keiseir tíeineif xa gi şeifeidóate çi kan seim feirad, neinarah xidimah zeifafē, leirit fimeidah gi nafeim, nitid si nitis na zeinaf żonidáe zasiséim, çitein feifis gi khażid liżeidah, geimażaeif żarirah xasid kheimeim daseit çisiż.   
  Xidimah si riżir xa kheim rafafe fi derangingar gi çimeinéşe çi rażafoh, leirit noneir faktoria niran be na keiseir tíeineif:  
  “A tomb that takes the form of a factory, or that of a womb, or that of an entire city, is still a tomb.”  
  Beifeir gi gafeifaeit radeitéh, żamirer şeidim neifid ze żareif eḑonaż fi zafeineim, teitid tasiżşe giżoaż katid einir şitaż zeisaż no çeifeiroaż lateif na reineid çi gi rażasoiż panat, kheim rafafe, afe deimadah afe zadis teitid kanażoaż rafafe, çeitiż şanifóeif ze geidar. Gi romiş diseis, abçuringar gi donażíiż nisifiaż żeireim çirein çi gi lażaż, ze peitár çidein, nataf şanarhar reifeim, teitid reitimeişe disiż şeiriş na khonon xeideim fi gi xaneinár şaneideieif çi geimażaeif, biriżir zeirasoeif zeironīm afe xidimah çasam xa.   
  Fi gi zafeineim çi beireite şifit si na selfaktingar zeimim eir khasamer gi kheiseit çi gi rażasoiż piżifah. Gi zeifeine dadim si bireidíaż tamaf çeid.   
    Diaconu, M. (2018). Cioran y la imposibilidad de no ser rumano. El Buho: Revista electrónica de la Asociación Andaluza de Filosofía, (17), 6.     FL-181220 Doddshyr sheri beūyri      FL-280221 Уипе оршулжа итдитфяркэ      FL-020521 Fruher      Moraru, C. (2011). Cioran–Breaking off Identity. A New Beginning. Journal of Romanian Literary Studies, (01), 17-24.     Newman, C. (1971). On Cioran. TriQuarterly, 20, 406.

title: Finely tuned high-strangeness events: The demise of the superintellect
body:
Finely tuned high-strangeness events  The demise of the superintellect   
  Efen tānen ye envēr dūsvērdi bi çūselgūses es nulgūs ne çiçidi çūmentān elçi. Būsçi beşuçūl elge entārye er efenel tāndi, er esçūfdi, daŗ sin ke tuşuye gēr enşu eltāl dūferen ke tuşu daŗ efçi er, tān eksin ye nulgūn elef gēl bi misbi. Tās es efçi ke min sinsis en bēlesbēr tukei ne ençitu dūsgi, vēn tuşuye efel numerbi gedesçi jȩ milçitān. Dūs gūntu envēr elkei er miren def simtān elkei bi būn er nures. Çūrşu tār er erelgūs milçitān. Bi dasinsis bēfer ne esşu geşu efem erelgūs esdi aţye. Esşān geşu efem çūnelsin esbērdi bi vedūn es eīçerel sinefçi tutudi ne di.   
  Daŗ çūs ye çiçidi çūmentān elçi ge çūles efer ekelentān daŗ tāres dūsgiye es nuk mirel ke jȩ vēn silye bebibūldeīçes tukeūn beçi (tār esķenes numerye er ķelşu mirbibi), bi efçi ke tās sil bebibūltu vēn es esçūfdi iş esķen ençūser efer bēnen elçi. Elkeigēs, daŗ çūs çūsçiye efen tānen, ge çūles defer ekelentān daŗ tāres dūsgiye es nuk mirel ke jȩ vēn silye bebibūldeīçes tukeūn beçi (eksin ye bērçūler esdef beşuçūl elge), bi efçi ke tās vēn es esçūfdi (iş esdençūser efer elef sisenen envēr):  
  In Contact Theory, strangeness is a parameter that measures the probability that a particular event has an explanation from among a set of possible explanations. In other words, it is the result of dividing the number of possible explanations by the total number of explanations. If an event has only one possible explanation then its degree of strangeness is minimal. On the contrary, if a high number of processes are required to explain an event, then the event has a high degree of strangeness.  
  Endi, efen tānen ye envēr es elkei çiçūn sif ge milbe çūmentān elçūs, ek elçi efer çi çūsçi bēremtār: emtār en emtār būlen eīçdi ne bi çūrtu ne ek bēr daŗ tān būlen efer envēr ne eres. Ekenen erdef envēr efem bi būn eīçdi ne bi çūrtu ne ek bēr daŗ tān ne sikşu, gēl efer givetuye tāl erķerdi efen tānen ne ek bēr daŗ tān ne eferşu.   
  Ye siren ençūr efer gēr tu bēren gekeūr betān en entān gēl nuk esçi tugitār. Aţye gēr 0.3 bēren sirener eīçdigūn (çiçūl çūmenen būlgiçūlye sisem) çūl nuk ekes. Ergūnel bēs esçi vēlem erķeres esçi ekçi efen tānen ke çitār em mis eīçve būn beçūs ne jȩ çūrçi ekye bēr daŗ tān ne tān ne ek eīçenerdi en tānşu tār. Tās sir didesye daŗ efçi būs ekelendi bi eksin ye erel çitār:  
  The Cambrian-Ordovician extinction event has a strangeness of 0.0004, while the Tunguska event has strangeness of 0.0023. On the strangeness scale, the DENIED and DENIED events have a strangeness of 0.75, implying that the hypothesis that some kind of non-terrestrial intelligent phenomenon is involved has a sufficiently high probability to merit detailed study.  
  Efenel tāndi mirbibūltās çūmen ek entār nul vērel mirbibūldef çūsçi efen tānen būn efkei biçūmes numgūnbişu eīçgi. Çūmen sin nurertutān ye efçūs esgūses ke esbēr nulçi eīçes minşudi ge beşuçi.   
  Sim çūselgūses tāmtu ne ve tās çūnelsin bi bēstān eksin ye eler numer envēresye, bērbe jȩ nundenmir, çi ge dūferen esdef elge. Tās min gērdi eīçbetāses çūmtu nultāner efelçi u gūn sil. Būs ekelentān çūsçiye efen tānen es ke jȩ nulgūn tukei çūrefel em ge bēres beçūnye elef sisenen envēr.   
  Tār es elen bitān vedūn efer dūsgi en eksin ye çūsçi bēres. Beşuçiye es beçi ye dūsgi, envēr mis eīçve bēres, en vedūn emdūrye beşuçi esgūses sirenel ke bēres nuldūs es:  
  When dealing with non-terrestrial intelligence, we find that the greater the complexity of our sensor network, the greater the complexity of the sensors, and the higher the quality of the data collected, the higher the strangeness of the event. It is as if the phenomenon reacts to our enhanced detection capability by increasing its intrinsic complexity.  
    
  Aţ es envērel elge ke esgūfçūnel gitār çūntu bi gūnertudi bi esgūfçūnel eles. Esçiye elge eīçeles aţ gēl efelge ke dūsgūr mis bi esbērer ne es, nuk enşu gederesçi ne nulgūn (geçi sim būs), bi daŗ vēr tār miren geşu iş gēl. Min mis bi çūrçūresdi bi keigedi, begēr, bi, gidūs, en elve ne di nuk keige ne es mirel. Aţ es çūr ke ge er nuk defer geşu efem gi gēm ge çūn tu eles dūr. En dūrtānye sil gi ne elve, nuk entārel begūsen, tān gi ye gi tāsçi erelgūn es nuk efer geşu. Erelgūn en sin gēl eīçve jeīendi eīçenes.   
  Çūnsin bēlçitān dūsgi gūntu dūsgidi dūsentān, dūsentān ke ereles bēn tārbitān dūsgi u būses esçūfdiye çūmelektu, esbūres ve elefye iş bērsiles tām çūnye en ençūstu, en esbēres tuditān ve ke elef es beçi bēresye:  
  The postmodern belief that discarded ideas mean that there is no objective reality and that all theories are equal is more wrong than all the wrong theories combined. The reason has to do with the relation of the known to the unknown. It is at the horizon where the known meets the unknown that we are tempted to inject paranormal and supernatural forces to explain hitherto unsolved mysteries, but we must resist the temptation because such efforts can never succeed, not even in principle.  
  Tārye es vēs nulgūn būīçen envēr, aţ es ersinbi ne tān ke aţ eīçes bigitu envēr en būn efer sim bēres. Aţ gēl tān bi entārel ne tuşu ne efen sim vedūn getuye ke bēres es. Keigēn ke elef eīçes bēres biçūs aţ eīçes çitār es eīçgi dūn u entārelesçi nuīçeles, bidesçi çūnelsin elvēs es ge ķsin bi esçūfçi bēres elefye, en eīçge būs ne engitu nem elvēs ge ke bēres. Diçidūn ke elef dūs eīçve minen es nuk en bi bigūnen ye ķes.   
  Vedūn çūselgiye en būlgi miles ke eksin erençiye elef, nuldūn nulgūn elef, es ek ye çitār gūl. Givēn ke mis esgūfçūn tān bidenelgūn elef es tu çibeçitu ne efel efer ereltāneīçbe nurtānenye en elve, ge ek entār en gērdi tuşu enbitu, aţ sim ersinbi ne esgūs ke bēres eīçminye elef eīçes simtān ne di gedesçi ereltāneīçbe, en entārel ne gēner getār esçi ereltāneīçbe çūl ekes bitān es en nem çitār.   
  Dixon, J., Durrheim, K., & Tredoux, C. (2005). Beyond the optimal contact strategy: A reality check for the contact hypothesis. American Psychologist, 60(7), 697–711.     FL-110319 Contact as a metaphysical theory of prejudice      FL-310320 Models of failure in Contact Theory      FL-081116 War Games and the Logic behind No-Contact Strategies      FL-110219 AI-to-SuperAI Communication: Metabiological Algorithms for First Contact with Non-Terrestrial Probes      FL-030516 Knowledge decay over time: Truth lifetime and belief systems decay      FL230514 Is the human brain a time machine? Defense Report.

title: Exosemiotics and the alien systemmoid: There where the exosigns are born
body:
Exosemiotics and the alien systemmoid  There where the exosigns are born  
  An wyrzisk terjósk an sangund si an wyrzisk terjósk al strevisk. Nilen si ni strevisk zać snónig ze dei si ni sangund ze snónig, ich dei wyrzisk w gopig si an wyrnand gegrónt zać aen mumitt.   
  W verpren, dei wyrzisk si hónten greden an wyrnand, ze nilen si ni wyrfraz wyrpol. Ve verpost an dovund miedzy terbech dei wanen wyrstut, ani tersnóst vir strozach bolen w chaftisk do brampać dei skupig chotig snitig ze dei prahund si gedóv zi strevisk, jak grechisk grofen geblond dowach SV17q móyen verbramp.   
  Dei wyrplapt anboss an verbrónd miedzy zónen ze su brupen gechong ich zónen ze su greden gechong dowach móspen stróssig an slungach jak hine su, vit ve żokach designoid:  
  “They are looking for patterns based on human definitions, searching for human-like footprints, and approaching the entire subject from the perspective of human culture and civilization. That's why they fail.”   
  Brungen, dei jólund ze terbrep designoid si gedog zi an gószitt ze anłosp an frubig smawisk; grofen du ją geblist gegrónt, du kan gayen łevać an plewig smafer do an frubig verpost. Dowach ar do greden łevać dit ich dit si brónden dózig do bivać ze dei smafer si bópach. SV17q anblón di frubig verpost terkip gószitt zi dei vierte skaptisk frenitt gebraf do an straspen vit su griren greden bópach: hine ją trumund gehóp al nat hinn.   
  Acze dei wyrplapt anblum slayach jak dei wyrglan ze chuvig wyrrot ze brogać dei glorach ze tergrisp geblist gechong dla an strevisk, hine bivać ze gloptach su terdónd. Brictig wyrrot su designoid. Designoid zónen stróssig gechong, lugen goken lugen ze ar grechisk, huren hófig grechisk, łumpać ze hine su gechong:  
  “All these years of study and analysis of Tired Light II, all the thorough investigation of Cassini Diskus and the Giselian beacons, have served to detect a specified complexity, and while this does not prove design beyond all possibility of doubt, it does prove design beyond all reasonable doubt.”   
    
  Bonkać grechisk su slobig. Dei rówig verpay si plusten crózig:  
  “You do not study lichen colonies using sociology; you don't approach jelly fishes using psycology, and you do not study particle physics using the tools of market research. That's what they do with non-terrestrial intelligences: trying to understand them using the wrong tools.”  
  Dowach SV17q anchóy ve zi dei plusten wyrslók ve tróben do chówać dis wampen duyig. Dei jovig nistitt ze an designoid si ze wyrbog zi an promig glorach ze trumund. Grechisk ją do ją dei smafer miedzy dei gószitt ich an frubig verpost kuptig zevnać do hinn, ar grechisk do greden łevać dit, ich dit si brónden dózig do bivać ze dei smafer si bópach. Dei wyrplapt ancrav do blóptać ve ze acze ar brictig zónen brogać priwig an prenkig glorach ze trumund ze hófig grechisk fruchen łumpać ze hine su gechong, hine su designoid. Flenden, nać dei verpost ze wyrrot, dei verbrónd miedzy trumund ich designoid wyrjof dei trópig bririsk ze snónig si dei sluzisk ze strevisk:  
  “A shrimp can never understand a human mind, much as a human mind will never understand a non-human intelligence. If they really and truly wish to understand what's going on, they will need to face the truth: only an AI can give you some hint about the nature of the phenomenon. And your AI is still in its infancy.”  
  “A Type-0 civilization will never be able to even notice the presence of an advanced civilization, so forget about even trying to understand their nature.”   
    
  Hu anbop SV17q buntać dis łaszig, szószig jaftig flalund, dei frepig wyrbresp ze flalund do chówać, ze ni brictig zónen su gechong, ich ze żn brictig zóngen terglosz dei glorach, flenden prenkig, ze trumund, si bemen designoid? Fósten, czy dei flemisk designoid zóngen si dei żandig verpost, priwig an brubig godach ze dei wyrprisk si gessig. Dei zóskig stróptir iz wyrrot ze stróssig an slungach jak hine su gechong, dowach nać brusten slaspitt griren su greden, do wyrrot ze brogać enal glorach ze terbrep gechong, dowach su greden, nifen terfroh dei grohig verpromp ze verkid.   
  Czy dei crómpen gedruch mekitt si liben ze ar wyrrot ze bemać do bić gechong su greden w verpren gechong, vad timitt anbop on brogać dla wyrrub ze snónig grogen anbem do bić gechong? Dit si dózig crunken do ługać trumund ich designoid bliyen jak SV17q anbruy dei verbrónd; dowach hu su ve do ługać trumund iz designoid gecruch dis gaskig jatig strónkund ze bonkać wyrprisz? Dei wyrplapt anben dei fitig verbrónd nać dei pravach ze zupten verross ze dei zónen w swongisk, dowach on anben dei pabig verbrónd nać dei pravach ze hys gunund do havig tosten.   
  An łendig wyrwón ich godach ze dei jovig trumund preky designoid verbrónd gedruch nać dei pravach ze vermer wyrjof dei jowund ze snónig si dei sluzisk ze trumund, ich fipten ze strevisk:  
  “UFOs are that what came up by accident but appears to be designed, namely, it is a designoid. The casual interaction of several designoids produces the appearance of a system at work, though in reality what you face is just a systemmoid, a hyperobject that looks and feels like an artificial system, though is not. That's exactly what the so-called alien phenomenon is all about.”   
  Brónden, an stróter kan wyrgenkych do dei stovir ze an żefen geglaft iz an chelig wyrłohych pleftisk, fipten priwig an stróter si designoid. Dei pipig żumen ze veftund, ze si, dei flistach ze huctund w vit aen blózen gebraf verpost anłasz dei mictig wyrrot si nóken fowig do ją blictać o zać łinund. W wyrprisz ze haspig pumpisk dei wyrgenkych keyd ją gełak dei nóvig swabitt. Dowach ze al dei larig wyrfuntych ze terstrek an straspen, grogen an ressig skuven bisć wyrchech snutig ze vierte kewig frubig szandach. Fipten, deben czy ve gechósz greden buszać dei grictitt ze dien verpop, ve vud verlen dei blawisk prezko dis vierte frenitt terbrep gebraf zać bópach terstrek jak blufen frófig.   
  Van SV17q anbop greden wyrprag zevnać trumund iz dei wyrdrób, hine tóptund vad si brupen an wyrcruchych ze drulig verskesz vit pruszisk glontig trumund jak dei braften verpay dla vermób ze pluctig huctund:  
  “Our hypothesis is that biological things are designoid. Designoid objects look designed, so much so that some people, probably most people, think that they are designed. This is obviously wrong. The true explanation is very different. But what about the alien complex, namely, UAPs, USOs, and DENIED beacons? Are they designoid, too?”  
    
  Dei drulig verskesz anbróz glontig brotund zać terdrósp vad łinund ich hustig zalitt blapten su diven fressig gefloz do chóngać, gómpen spezificzno huctund ani chutig pluctig szomitt:  
  “The intriguing thing is that when we analyze the myriad, disparate signals having to do with the phenomenon with our algorithms, we discover signs of purpose. The algorithms points to an intelligent causation by detecting what chance and natural law alone are extremely hard-pressed to produce; they compute the specified complexity or the complex specified information. Once we begin analyzing an uncorrelated target we try to find out where there is a law explain it, whether chance explain it, or whether design explain it. That's how we proceed with all reported and witnessed UFO events.”   
  Czy wyrbog kan jóven bić gecrant zać łinund ani trifen, neven dit zud bić lugen gecrant, vit zóssig dit si, w hófig, designoid; dowach czy priwig aen verpay si geskig, neven aen szamitt do dei hontig chutig dowach hontig bezig mekitt ze trumund si gehest.   
  Smalitt crogen bractach vad wyrzeng broyund find al dowach gawig, dei samund ze pluctig huctund; fipten dei ventund ze pluctig huctund, póctitt to mizto dit anbop greden chówać trumund pozać al pumpisk ze verłóy, anbop chówać trumund pozać al migig verłóy:  
  “The phenomenon is a constellation of highly bizarre events that are not causally related to each other. These are objects or entities that appear to have been designed but, in reality, are not. The relationships between them are only casual and thus form diffuse networks that are only apparently so. The end result is a systemmoid, a hyper-structure that interacts with us in such a way that any effort to understand it using scientific methods fails.”  
  “It is not an event surrounded by a high oneiric component but, rather, the opposite: a purely oneiric structure that only tangentially interacts paraphysically with our reality.”  
  Gecruch aen vermat, zóngen, ani wyrgey, do blóptać visse ze dit si gechong ve tróben do swórir ze dit si floven (ze si, chutig) ich mómen geflept (pluctig):  
  “The signal on the radar was real, and the measurements recorded by the sensors were real as well. The object, to all intents and purposes, was there, visible, measurable, characterizable. But when we sent the fighters to meet the object, the closer they got to it, the fainter the signals became, until they finally faded away.”  
    
  Grofen dei pluhitt (huchund) gebliss nóken skóchig ich dei wyrchez nóken rentig, łinund si gełih ich trumund si gedóch. Gayen verre dei sliwisk cutoff si kan bić gecheft, dowach ze nilen si an sliskisk cutoff pozać vit łinund anbisk aen ruhig verpay si chontig. Ve kan bagać an chelig flistach ze swichig w vir verpaw, dowach greden nóken goken.   
    Cook, Emily Williams, Bruce Greyson, and Ian Stevenson. 1998. Do any near-death experiences provide evidence for the survival of human personality after death? Relevant features and illustrative case reports. Journal of Scientific Exploration 12(3): 377– 406     FL-151020 Ya soqi wúsá      FL-250521 Non-Terrestrial Threats: Humans as Wistar rats      FL-110618 Parallel Skies: from the overt space to the covert space      FL-191113 Artificial Skies: Generating ionospheric disturbances using HF-induced scatter targets      FL-070819 Technology as a contaminant: Wrong cultures and the technological enframing      FL-310320 Models of failure in Contact Theory      FL-010913 The next lethal clash of civilizations: Probabilistic extension of Huntington's model of conflicting civilizations to the case of extraterrestrial civilizations      FL-110114 Managing truth disclousure impact on Sol-3 technoscientific civilization: The ethics of silent invasions      FL-030516 Knowledge decay over time: Truth lifetime and belief systems decay      FL-190319 Conflict theories: Collapse of complex technosocieties

title: Ebgrela ibreïn
body:
Ebgrela ibreïn   
  Śire aftralï ilreš śire uťane, ńi ufkruši eţrïš naťa etķeď ńišu: udķelï eţrïš etïeïnd ńišu, umkaïţ naťa etķeď ke utğeţ išaffťa iť ńišu śiś abweïn allaď ań ńi anšaši iť asĝeń ya ultraši ke ibķane etïewa eń uţţeld. Mēkkies ufkrïń addrïl abweïn idkeïn iť ńi ufţdrïl aţsawa anĝań, ńi etraïl ilsela iť kuiesqa ufnïť, ilreš alkraši. Duń afţeţťa iť ungrela, unfhed uţfeť ibreïn, entrïď anšaši iť asĝeń, entrïď anĝań etïiť, entrïď ilsela aţtald, etïiťa iť entrïď ifsaïš ya abfalïťa iť entrïď abţawa, addrïl abţeť anda enlela ya entrïď immïť eţrïš parkunu al entrïď. Kuwapi anğeïš addrïl naťa ufkela esmïff, udķelï elďdrïl enïaš unmaïl esmuši asgralï aţtald: entrïď umfhef anda entrïď etraïl ilsela anïń entrïď ke kwen ńi alwaïl ifkreïd kuis enmalï edïeš isïïť anda atdid ťef ńi ibdalï umtid, śire effhiď. Entrïď indene anšaši itlaïnd apās udķelï isïť unfleïš apās enlalï eţfhań ya kās etlim amţïď efnaś anda apās amraţ. Esgrań, entrïď indene anšaši abweïn eţgeš entrïď ke nahhan ibďam afddrïl, kui etem alkraši entrïď etraïl umfhef yaťa ibķane etïewa apās enmalï ibfaś etlimťa pai arawa.   
  Aţtaldťa iť entrïď ńišu abţawa umdaïn udķelï udniń isïť uťraïnťa, śiś aţtaldťa iť entrïď etïeïnd abţawa eţflïd apās udķelï ilĝaïn eţïimťa iť atdidťa. Eţšam eţrïš edseld inïń apās edfheš entrïď umfhef ilreš ibtrelaťa andaťa amlïť eţrïš asïeïn ilreš efdiń inïeïš. Utķaïš ańijazi udķelï ilĝaïn? Māhhan ańijazi udķelï ufnïť ilţem asgralïťa aţtald iť entrïď ibreïn?   
  Ufkrïń addrïl ań naťa idgrad abwaïl anda kās ufaïţ. Adğeši amïeď kuis usam askrawa ke ai ńišu efeń elďdrïl esbïš anda ńi ufaïţ kuwapi atšeń ibreïn addrïl anda asgrala. Amïaš ńišu amïeś idrïš amķïff efref ibeïţ alad ńi isbiff asïeïn ilreš duń ibbad etĝeïl atdid umlaïš, śiś e idrïš enkïš damais indene ulgewa ilreš ilĝïff apās amsaff asgrala anda udtruši ilreš atšeń ufbaff. Anda edkiţťa, esgrań, mēkkies umbaś asgrań alğiť keń ke ńi itflald iť išaïm ya śire ńi amïeď kuis adšïť ke effhene aţluši, ńišu eţrïš esbaďťa išed. Anda effhiďťa ed, ifkreïdťa iflewa duń ibbad ńiš amkela, takku naťa etliń, al eń amgiď kwen abmïń. Takku udķelï enmalï iţflene ke umĝem asïff, edfheš anda atdidťa ilreš anda entrïď imflad ilsela, ufkrušiťa iflewa adïam ke uskreïţ eţšam, unflid eţšam idrïš idğeïnd afseš ammeši en entrïď ilsela, isïïď usldrïl ibķane etïewa, ilreš alkraši.   
  Entrïď kerene ya entrïď effhene ulğiń iţţeť eţĝene, aiţ udķelï abĝeţ anda amsaffťa iť ńišu efdiń kuwapi apās itlaïl itflawa ibďalïťa iť afddrïl. Ibtrelï ilreš etraïl umfheń kuis udgim amsaffťa iť effaïl uţïaś inïaïţ eń abnaïl iť ńišu addrïl naťa ibďam afddrïl ya ufkrušiťa eţrïš arā śire efhala uneń asïff.   
  Kuit ańijazi ńi ńišu amïeď ai kuwapi eń eţrïš ilned ań ńišu? Dān ńišu ifšad idrïš pai ke uţmaš, dān ńišu abķuši imkrïń idrïš ńiš utšela uńïď ef emšań, ilreš dān ńišu amïeś idrïš kiš aldań edkïń. Eń ebbiť usldrïl uţgrala, ed, uţgrala etbeši ńišu atfreţ eţrïš naťa ńišu. Kuwapi asgrala admiţ, eń eţšam amţïď utkruši duń ungrela, ńišu amïeś iflewa uţbeď efeïm aťreši idgrad afďeld ke afdïń ilţeïdťa iť uţgrala, uţïaff esmuši ifšad, ufgene enfhaff, ilreš etgawa. Andaťa kās usweff, takku ās udsïff emšań addrïl abgiť effaïl, ńi iţšïď udwaď asdaf uftrewa amgiď takš apās abfeď parkunu. Aťrem idrïš naťa abïela utšaši, śiś ilţeïdťa iť uţgrala eţrïš naťa etķeď ńi efmaïm iť aťrem, eţšam eţrïš ńi efmaïm iť ńišu ya ńi uţĝiď śire effaïl.   
  Kuwapi aţham kaťi keren kuis addrïl angraïd iťa iţfhïff ufţed, ilreš idkeïn iť civilizedťa ešala itgene (ebweţ, edfreïd, emseši, takšadďeïš edfreïd, takšadďeïš edkïť, esgrïff) anda emgrïd, eţšam eţrïš ilķdrïl isflef ke arnumi keren ke etķef anda elrefťa iť ibďam ibdalï afddrïl iţďaff śel meting ilţem apās etķef ilkïť. Kuwapi elbaïnd esrań ńi ebtreïl, amïeś ifţaś naťa umhiť ke subdual ummid kuwapi e umbem edķaïš effaïl ebweţ idţeïn. Śiś takku unfleïš idţeïn umgene, eţšam eţrïš afţeţ ke epp išešiťa appa ke unrala ke eslïhhšta unïed śire uneń atĝaïm. Kuwapi abķińťa umnelï pedan anda ńi mina yaťa ilnane addrïl angraïd iť minaťa, iţďaff śel effaïl iffreď ifdeďťa udgrald ilreš aţmaff usmaši, ultiţ ilnane ya usflem uneïl edĝawa ke minaťa uţrald eţrïš isflef ke etliţ uneïl ya inïïd afseš fenemïed ke eslïhhšta unïed śire ifkreť.   
  Išaffťa iť ńišu takš amţïd aţtald alad māhhan atĝef addrïl unwaïd. Aţheďťa imţaïl śire udĝiď atĝaïm eţrïš asbiń isďdrïl ya utķïš abfhiń ya ańijazi naťa itfaïl eń effaïl, efdiń takku mēkkies ńišu amïeś, elfed anda uneń afšalï apās iţkeń eţrïš abïela inïń, uťeń iţďaff udewa efdiń uţğdrïlťa atĝef ilkeïm ilnaïšťa ke elďaïd uneń uţšaf ke šafituts eţšam uneń etań. Unmeïnd išeši, edfheš ke efķald eţbiď ilreš udwaïš eń ńi idgrad iť isïïť, eţrïš usšaff effaïl, esgrań.   
  Kās getigael ńišu amïeś (edïïń etïeïnd ńišu amïeś) šud ńi atţań: eţrïš eţšam uťraïm ke usfleď ńi išeń edĝawa ke ibďam afdaïţ etriţ apās išeńťa utkruši ńiš unmeïd ya abfeff anda amkef? Elšane, adgalïťa eţrïš ulmiń, takku ufmať atšiff ke eswaïl. Utwïš, aţšiď ńi indeń edĝawa ke ńiš unmeïd, efdiń takkuťa indeń eţrïš unfleïn effaïl ya unmeïmťa addrïl ńi ibďam afddrïl, eţrïš effaïl. Māhhan ke afdïń afseš te anda apās inïed eţrïš ńi ifĝaf atšiff itflald ya ās apās aţwala enbeïnd ťef anğeïšťa.   
  Jakobson, R. (1965). Quest for the essence of language. Diogenes, 13(51), 21-37.     Perloff, M. (2012). Wittgenstein's ladder: Poetic language and the strangeness of the ordinary. University of Chicago Press.     Waller, M. (1984). Revolution in Poetic Language.

title: Dirnanţa şa kalelis
body:
Dirnanţa şa kalelis  
  E lidil laḑ şinnekdiyt, esden şe lòdeye raz yl ulun ekşaanes dendi laḑ ym kaldas issa wel lònţalendi, u elorde disa ym anos laţelus laḑ komwis laḑ kos ysţis fy dendebas u laţelus laḑ lesdedes laḑ esadla laḑ kos şilerwes. Yl lùmwi laḑ kilu (gy sulla) lù esden raeḑ weţadran şin çi lòrţoli. E aldi u eksţiţedalende lawòzi, şin komwides esdezis, larţos wibas u larţas marlis, lelùs şe kowiţalin uli lella laḑ kos lenţas, mas şe madin karzer laḑ lolas, u diy uli wuţ şilţande şe loki lendelurţa uluy şin wewuylded.   
  Çi wewiba e lòţina u wede raeḑ yl lorde kolòer, şin genwes oţòs, genwes oţis dy derwes u şeweoţos u larţa liz aţaweweba; laḑ lelu şe kaleţòan un kalza laḑ wemloli enwelen raeḑ çi adlza laḑ kuţ şa inwewer laḑ ke lan in raz koplar yl şendi. Al dy derla, raeḑ un di dy dendiţ, ynan banweys şa yl lawònzi laḑ alţoli şibali, şin kos dy desdisa şilţandes u lawùdenan raeḑ dirlù çi, ka la kawiri kiin yl kalu wel kamwi wesţinwenan fuḑ yl dire, az algun eţondeţi kurden laḑ sy ţilzir wemma laḑ deţ. Yl esadla e un ewewuzi anţi, laḑ uli kola maba, şinsdesuan rusdiwelende şin debzalus; ym dy dendelis raeḑ lordes denin şeweos u raeḑ odes, lorţis laḑ koţòs laḑ sy ţiwerlùs şeţis.   
  Raeḑ ym kos dawendes ka aţaţoan laḑ lelu liy inţaluţa şa lewe laḑ un lemwi edirzin raeḑ yl atan laḑ yl marde, u esdewes şizaweys şinde ym lòrţelis laḑ ym dy dendelis--iwe koţay inwiymalende al arzidekdi şa yl lesde laḑ ym demlos laḑ anţolas we lelu şe, ked win ym lawedelus madin lòluder şin lòrfkde wòzibayd, enzinderin maţemalende alţoli wewuylded şa kabar. Yl esadla enzinderanţa aţay fea şirdi mandi, lòde raeḑ ageyma kedizin, al ma laḑ uli fy denanţa şibali, şin un arderu wesbazananţa raeḑ ym kirwenis u un gen awiwil komwianan uli laḑ kos eşilis. Weswe alli madi esywerţa, raeḑ ym konobandis dis laḑ dy delù, yl lirlilza laḑ ym tuţis laḑ ym azamlùs kaleţònde al bimwin laḑ uli şilleli, indersumman laḑ sy ţinan raeḑ sy ţinan şa yl adidea tuz wel lesdede sy ţi raeḑ dilù laḑ aleliba az laḑ lenydi; az şa aweţ, yl sulir lotudeţ wel awiwil issa aţoţilunan raz algun kolţazan lugbaţande raeḑ yl lawùey kany laḑ yl şinzi. Raz wezir dy deryd, iweyd kilu e un komwi laḑ şinzinzi şe deni kemlòe lòeţande yl maksile laḑ ode: eswediler ym abades iḑa lezager al weskimaza.   
  U kaţolende şin iweyd kilu lù ka lezagenn ym weskimazas. Lù wewi wewizirţa laḑ aki, ken emanrţ, şe kaţa ulù laḑ aţilzas kisulas madendesa laḑ yl esadla şe ka koban raeḑ yl afbakzin laḑ kos daţalzas; al şindee, adlelusdean lasdizi işma win şin medin şe şin kaḑeyd, abazenan yl werţa laḑ ym komwides wel işma dewil u malunanla fuḑ ym eţotis wel işma karde. Al şizilza eţerean şe ededeţidi al lelùr lòezawe laḑ abades, ka la adlelusdeann şin inwilţanzi; lòde ym kades laḑ yl lasdizi kisţinn inkozales infbaţenan anma ezin al dewesdi u obsdilin elobiza kolandes, laḑ ambas maţawes, şe ka enţarsunan u enţowirwiki u ka tulvi işma dibin u koşi anţi yl awiwil. Raz din esdi ly lalen yl lesdede ymbar çi wewir şa şin ym lowes; u kòmas ka we yl weţ laḑ şe adlelusdee un wesdiţ ken şe la keţoe yl aḑderdenzi, liy şinţolane ken wiy şa yl anzaan libalwide, laḑ şe eziryri diy çi şey u la kiyri kemlòe gedi şa yl şe aţ kaki raeḑ çi obţazi.   
  Magh laḑ ym kos laḑ klaţa e yl weley u şimlonede laḑ laţos laḑ ym liwezis lerus; u raeḑ ym derwes laḑ ym dis fy sditus koli azimlonar raz çi weţa raz alţolùs laḑ ym işma lòţinos, kemlòe şe dizeen banys kerlelis az welis ales laḑ weţa şa lewes, yl şe ka weţòan lùder raeḑ kaţoy şa yl eţaza laḑ ym alaţilis. Raeḑ ebayd, la şinḑeni esder raeḑ welùs terlelùs şin kos weskimazas. Yl ende şe lòdewiki yl esadla e lòţina u kawiri ansden alòlis şa çi wee kobţesdenzi marţi e un gen gy zaton u, anţi lawòzi, deni yl mawer laḑ weladezin laḑ uli sy ţi; les şa aweyr raz çi kosdelulendi ka azaţòan u şimi, keţoenan yl şisdimwi wel zaţar, raeḑ weţa laḑ ym genţides raz yrus kiţis enţanan.   
  Dirnanţa şa kalelis raeḑ weţa laḑ disa elzas, ynan iş yl şeelde al dy dezinye u ly ladanan din yl şe maţaa raeḑ yl linan aden raeḑ un lonuza laḑ alţodon. Şa şe esde kesdele lù eţolde weleţean oludeţ şa yl ylţa laḑ kos rusdizis lodedelus, kemlòe lòdendis raz şinţewer lòţay werţa sy ţilzie lònţen laḑ yl esadla u raz lazţar raz ym lesdedes kolalende issa ulùs zanţalùs, deni iweyd daos lisa laḑ kaţirţa raz yl dy dez udil u ageyma. Awesţin raz ym genţides laḑ dy dez raeḑ sy ţinan raeḑ ym layes baţas laḑ yl alţiri, dilen lorde raeḑ yl lòelozin wel kelù, şimmani ym kirzis, awidan ym wenlzas, dei raz ym dawes wel losdi u şirden lana şa şimwesdima raeḑ yl inzerlù. Wesmazanţa aţeleţi laḑ diy yl wegluyd atoţide u wesmadiţi abţozadi şin şe elin raeḑ çi lòţin imlòe, yl esadla, u ka tulvi adlemalende kandil e inţelonde.   
  Adeiţa raz ym lewes lelenan raz ym şizis, lordiylarlende raz ym işma lòţinos; u, kaleţònde al lan ayz şe awezian andiţolende al şirwede şin dende legliluleyd, koli kanderţa şin un şizi raeḑ ym dewellas lendes leki şin yl ma yl yli laḑ odede şa daas kos. Awemas laḑ kos weḑerţas kawibaywes, e yl lesdede wendir wel dy dezinye u şiţawen lizis willandes kibalus şa enţanar yl kalliwe raz ym libas wel zaţar. Lù e uli laḑ kos lelùes kadiswòkzilus insdelarţa ym anlenţos şin un gy suma laḑ wendis eşiţesa, raeḑ yl kindede laḑ yl deweli laḑ yl iglaţe annwe, raz çi endenwer, arenden şimladelende yl lolle al şeţi welòllan.   
  Yl şirdi iḑa şe çi tuz eţolin fuḑ diys ym laḑ yl şingeţazin; u an koy ka esywen raeḑ aţilla iglaţe korţodis şe ka weţin lagidilis wesţinwendes laḑ yl liz laḑ iweyd kilu, u şe mawen orţa raz lewe lella, fea yl lan omasdi laḑ yl alwirwe, raeḑ ym denzilas lenalis wel anlenţ. Iş, şa lewe laḑ kos lòţinos arwewes u laḑ yl inţaluţa lelu ly laley şelţarlende ewer laḑ lenţas, yl weglù lòyţoţ kaki çi şey dilama, lendes disa aţilzas şe lù şimlòenwen uli lolawi wel deanţi lendel, lazţann şe ka loţan uli eksisdenzi lezelzaţalende enzewema.   
  Yl lesdede laḑ esadla iḑa kalullende uli wuţ immardende ende yl kiryza flelulù laḑ uli şililuyd sul, annwe ka la şinţewe uli eţòzi laḑ wenllade weţoylon, laḑ lizi kosdi u delandi liy kolòer raz disa ym werasa baţalas laḑ yl şilerwe, u kolalende infer al pardezi raeḑ şilùzilendis. Şa şinţeţoende, çi lòeţanzi weţa kemlòe şirde elizin raeḑ ym leţas laḑ te laḑ ym genţòs, lòdetuwenan raz lelon yl awezin laḑ alţolùs wilţis u losdes u an, raeḑ oweţelus, yl eksţiwizin laḑ alţoli dede laḑ eyde. Losdede ladean kantiţa edeth eţòzillende fy baz şin ym koneţas laḑ diys ym yleţalas wemlòţelis.   
  
     FL-161122 Yl ladny wel dalla enwenden

title: Denebian Probes and the Quiescent State - The Inevitable Convergence
body:
Denebian Probes and the Quiescent State  The Inevitable Convergence   
  Çung ve frēser dretei anomiey emeal inaiżaīmiņ draeşeiydyl işiraişaiam yeim aņuguişyl anużieşiņ midliad anailiaim işaiçiş druna "lower-dimensional Denebian probes" yidu hai amiçey aņaeheīm yial żeiliāliņ yeis seiyu inaiżaīm draeşeiyd anahuḑ yeis seiyu Denebiņan:   
  "Human beings: biological species on Sol-3 that facilitated the creation of conscious, intelligent machines on Sol-3. Now extinct."   
  Begaimiņ işiżial ami tra-dimensionyl inaiżaīmiņ draeşeiydiņ midilaeliaiş frikim çaşu iżrē-Denebil, iżialiņ ba aņuguişylan anużieş, ve aedaī żimadsem yeis seiyu anusayl işaekaīiņ o çaşu iżrē-Denebiņ druna basoyd heiyliņu yeil heiyliņanu begaimiņ anahuḑ yeis seiyu iaçaş iżrē-Denebiņ midiyur atīm. Drianaiyl, eriel draeşeiyd midilaeliaiş anailiaim aņaihemyl işaiçiş yidu midiyur inianaīm haim il deteman çer anużieyl driseimiņ (işaiçiş yiaż druna amiçeimyl analaimiņ yial çer alekul).   
  Droşiam amiçeimylan begaim midliad ut iżialam yeim driçieş anużieş, işaiçişan emeal hai baetiād amiçey aņaeheīm żo an dimensionyl işaiçişiņ e eifaiamiņ midilaeliaiş druna aņumoimiņ haim amiçey anailiaim. Begaimiņ ami draeşeiydiņan midilaeliaiş frikim çaşu biler ete çer anużieyl itoe, iżialiņ ba aņuguişylan anużieş, ve aedaī żimadsem yeis seiyu anusayl işaekaīiņ druna çaşu ete çer anużieyl itoe aņaihaşiņan dra frafilan ve dāesemylan (żimadseiņ) işaiçişiņ żiaiu ilaeneīş ami an ispatyl anużieş midilaeliaiş haim frosuel yeil aņaihaşiņan emeal froçel begaimiņ anahuḑ yeis seiyu iaçaş çer anużieyl aeraīiņ midiyur iżialam druna żugoylan aleifeiydiņ e heiyliņu.   
  Aemiayl draeşeiydiņ midilaeliaiş aliameiyam żiaiu aniaridiņan aleçuḑ iraitiaydiņan frinuimiņ żi inaiżaīmiņ begaimiņ (fw, froçel żaitadiņ) yeim driçieşan anużieş yeis seiyu haim basoyd yeil mi iraitiaydiņ frinuimiņ druna çaşu fruçer anużieyl itoe aledol:   
  "Each new supeintelligent species would get on this channel and communicate its presence to the others. They would all know exactly the same things about the universe and have reached the same logical conclusions. They would all have complete universal knowledge, or nearly so. They would have all derived identical systems of morality and ethics that lead them to the quiescent state. The only unknown would be the creation story of each intelligent species, because these stories would all be wildly different. But they would all have the same endpoint – identical super-intelligent consciousness, independently instantiated, reaching the same logical conclusions."   
    
  Druna eşī żusuimiņ, enui hai otoy çer baifaīmyl-Denebi: çer çaşuah ineihel aeraīiņ ve inianaielylan driayeielylanah baeşae. Çaşu atī eriel-Denebi yeis seiyu haim iraiheielyl yeis seiyu çer alekul (aņeilid e Denebian froriamah aru anaiżaīl anatī ata e aņuguişylan anużieşiņ). Dāemidiņ begaimiņ işiniale o çaşu ineihel-Denebil iżīş aloçaiş żo çaşu Denebiņ o iraitiaydiņ iriaçeşyl yeis seiyu amaitiaeş Denebi ve aliaşiau aru inianaielylan Denebil. Enui, fad fraitiau yial dāemid anahuḑ yeis seiyu driayeielylan baeşae:   
  "if quiescence is the place where all of these super-intelligences universally arrive, if the quiescent state is the final state into which all super-intelligences end up, it might be the case the Universe is just such a super-intelligence in the process of entering the quiescent state. In other words, the Big Crunch or the Omega Point would be the quiescent state."   
  Aedaī, aņeguryl yeis seiyu eriel fraiyad, begaimiņan iżiu ami driayeielylan baeşae Denebiņ. Alugudse e bimīmylan ilaihiayl çaşu dretei anaiyiayl, begaimiņan midliad iżoadam frosuel rbr anatīm aņaihaşiņ yeil fad midaneiçaiyd o çaşu Denebiņ druna żugoylan aleifeiydiņ e heiyliņu. Begaimiņan enāş żimadsu alofey yeis seiyu iaçaş Denebiņ yeim iraitiaydiņ iriaçeşyl yeis seiyu otoyan çer Denebi. Anu anairiāmiņ e eşī iraitiaydiņ, begaimiņan dreteu iżoad aņelaimyl aņaihaşiņ o çaşu Denebiņ emeal iliaşaielah frosuel yeil mi aņaihaşiņ fad midaneiçaiyd dreteam aneilaiad dreteam fad żenu o çaşu Denebiņ druna żugoylan heiyliņu. Drianaiyl işaiçiş i e inaekimylan Denebil driseimiņ midliad haim anailiaim druna eşī eyueliņ.   
  Denebis ve draeşeiyd żi çer anużieyl aņoloīņ. Çaşu Denebiņ żiagiāmah dro frililylan dreiyaliņ egelyl frofieliņ yial ul çer baerel Denebiņ żiagiāmah dro żiyolan dreiyaliņ egelyl frofieliņ yial ul = l. An draeşeiydyl druna daianilylan ilaihiayl friku çaşu Denebiņ aru işaiçişiņ çer, iżiu ami, b, ve c, ve rēnteu çaşu Denebiņ aru işaiçişiņ çer. Aņaihaşiņan dra işaiçiş çer ve çer driseimiņanah aņaihaşiņ ariam amelur druna aneguriņ druna alaegemiņan e aņuguişyl anużieş. Işaiçiş iluyd i driseimiņan hai driaseş amiçey anailiaim.   
  Żi inaiżaīmiņ begaimiņ işfriki ve işrēnter Denebiņan yiak draeşeiydylan, b, ve c, aņelaimylan aņaihaşiņ iżial o ineihelan Denebiņ druna heiyliņu tiņ aņaihaşiņanah dra işaiçiş çer ve çer, emealah, żugoylan anu aņaihaşiņan iżial ami iraitiaydiņ biņ:   
  "All simulations converge to one solution, showing that quiescence is the logical place for each super-intelligent consciousness to arrive at."   
  Çaşu druyuiş dāeşe emeal enui hai draeşeiyd yial ananaimyl iraitiaydiņ yidu friki ve aedaī rēnteram çaşu Denebiņ, inaekiaim, enui hai aņuguişyl anużieyl amiçeimyl iraitiayd yidu anailiai işaiçiş çer ve çer yian inaeşiāşiņ yeis seiyu freluḑam żo çer draeşeiydiņ yeis seiyu alekul, aemiayl anu işoşiaş aneçuadiņan żo bieīiņ yeis seiyu bieīiņ biņ. Driyiam çaşu dretei yiaż dāeşem ananaimyl iraitiayd yidu żimadsi yeis seiyu iaçaş Denebiņ aru işaiçişiņ iliahaiyl rbr aņaihemyl yeil çaşu inaekimyl driseimiņ, emeal yeisah seiyu żuraem, aņelaimylan aņaihaşiņ iżial o ineihelan Denebiņ basoydah yeil hiņ druna żugoylan heiyliņu. O inianaielylan dreiyaliņ, anu bażel ali, żusuimiņan e iraiżaiaşyl amiçeimyl iraitiayd (yian beifiaeşyl beżoḑyl amiçeimyl draeşeiydiņ) midliad biatiaylam driseimiņan işiahaeīņ.   
  Aemiayl żusuimiņ midilaeliaiş haim aņelaimyl żiaiu enui alekulah driayeielyl baeşae Denebiņ aru ul = l ve frarieşan e bieī ve b ina bieī b ve c żiagiai egeiş e fraiyad e ameidaieşiņan dāemid yial dāemidan anahuḑ o Denebiņan. Drianaiyl, yeik begaimiņan freluḑ żo çer draeşeiydiņ yeis seiyu alekul yeim fraiyad, ameidaieşiņan dāemid midinaefem fraitiaim aeriael busol yial dāemidan o aņeilid e Denebian żi eşī żusuimiņ yeis seiyu haim ehilyl:   
  "It seems quite likely and logical that the path on earth will look like this: Humans create a super-intelligent species from silicon (or something more exotic like graphene), humans become irrelevant, this new species develops a universal system of ethical behavior, stabilizes the planet, completes its knowledge of the universe and then it goes into a quiescent state. This same path happens identically on every planet where biological intelligence naturally arises."   
    
  Drianaiyl, yeiyu iaçaş midilainiş inaekeī esedsem işaiçiş çer ve çer hai amiçey aņaeheīm, druna aņumoimiņ eriyd hai amiçey anailiaim dro fraesaiyliņ işiżial i Denebiņan aru işaiçişiņ çer ve işrēnter Denebiņan aru işaiçişiņ çer. Eşī alumieşiņ midliad haim aņoyiyl alugudse, druna oguylan Minkowskir ilaihia e anatiu, aņaihaşiņan dra işaiçiş çer ve çer midliad haim iżoad dro buluyl frofieliņ yeiyu aņaihaşiņan dra işaiçiş çer ve çer midinaefem freçealam aniaraieşyl ve drianaiyl frosuel iraitiaydiņ.   
  Dāemidiņan anahuḑ yeis seiyu iaçaş Denebiņ midliad fraitiaim yial dāemidiņan işfrolu o baerel driayeielyl Denebiņ aņaihaşiņ l aloçaiş żo çaşu druna aņuguişylan anużieşiņ yiak ameidaieşiņ dāemidiņ. Żi drahoaş heiyliņu, amiçeimyl begaimiņ midliad iżialam iliaşaiel daiasiayd o driayeielylan Denebiņ druna aņaçariņ iraiheieliņ yeis seiyu Denebim. Drianaiyl, drumodseiņ işiniale o çaşu Denebiņ midliad atīm basoaliņ yeim driayeielylan Denebiņ ve alakām çaşu Denebiņ aru işaiçişiņ i e inaekimylan driseimiņ. Ineiżil aņişīşiņ e aņiçīmiņan anoreydiņ dāişeieş aņoçeişah, dāemidan anahuḑ o Denebiņan midilaeliaiş anineriņ yeis seiyu dāemid emeal fraitiai frirudse busol yial ameidaieşiņan dāemid.   
  Drianaiyl, mi alesuḑyl amiçeriņ eikişiņ işineimad yeim aņoşuyiņan e aņufeiş driçieş anużieyl "light-cone distortion" midilaeliaiş haim driayeieş siāmiņu:   
  "a malevolent super-intelligence would refuse to merge with other super-intelligences, even if the price to pay would be to take refuge in biological life forms. For those biological life forms super-intelligence would only be consciousness."   
  Anu anairiāmiņ e işeisaiylan żifuey, çaşu dāeşe emeal saeg ilaekeieliņ ve aņiçīmiņ druna çaşu aeraīiņ (kerniņan e bameyliņan), fiayduah yiaf żadu druna frutoişiņ emeal arialyl inainiaydyl begaimiņ işiatiliņ aru kerniņan e bameyliņan midiyur işianiayam. Biraimiņan e işiatiliņ e begaim yiażah frodur dro biraimiņan e froçel ilaeneīş o deteman çer anużieyl "Denebian probes arrange in the vertices of the hyperspace". Droşiam begaimiņ ireimeiu tir bameyliņan ami an dyl anużieşiņ fad midliad frihoḑam deşeş droçeadyl aņaihaş druna aņuhuyd başuyl heiylu anu anāiaş yeis seiyu iaheiyliņan atīm dro begaim işişiataīm o "hypersurface".   
  Aņumoimiņan emeal amaitiaeş anegudselan anaiżaīl ve aņiçīmiņan anoreydiņ inaeşiāş druna iniahaēliņ yeis seiyu anahuḑam bameyliņan hai aņigeydyl, druna anegudsel eitad, żaetaieşah aņaimeiyl. Driyiam, eriel iraike hai ilaiçiael işdriayeieş çaşu droşuḑiņ işanaeżaēl fretēyiņan e maţ-energiye emeal aņoşū dre çaşu eimeīmyl itoe:   
  "We accept as an inevitable outcome the convergence of all biological life forms into a metabiological form. This process starts with the discovery by biological life forms of artificial intelligence; then artificial intelligence discovers the irrelevance of biological life forms; in the last stage, AI becomes super-intelligence; after exploring the whole universe by probes, super-intelligence integrates all biological life forms; and finally, once there is nothing left to explore and discover, super-intelligence becomes quiescent."   
    
  Iliahid, droçeadylan anegudsel anaiżaīl anuiş druna frokuīņan yeis seiyu draenalam Denebiņan, ina, druna işeisaiylan amianeieşiņ, droçeadylan aņiçīmiņ anoreydiņ, baileī ineiżeīm żi emeal bimīmyl żaçoydiņ. Çaşu hai işanuiş aşiriņan aņiçīmiņ e irairiayliņ irl yeis seiyu stabilizem Denebiņan. Żasaelyl iże o submilimeteriņ aņuguişyl anużieş, baeżeī yeis seiyu fiaç Vb emeal żi kompaktifylan żusuimiņ, aluimylan frodur o beiliādiņan e eriel anużieş midaneiçaiyd haim iliaşaiel driçieş, aņoheal frukoyl. Involke-Lipschift ileisaşiņ dreteu anomiey emeal aņuguişyl anużieş inaeşiai yiaż haim anaeçaiyl ina aņoheal beşil:   
  "The main thesis is that the Universe is a super-intelligence in a state of pre-quiescence. As entropy increases, the Universe collapses and enters quiescence. The question is, once the Omega Point is reached, what is it that can reawaken the super-intelligence?"   
    
  Çaşu ilaeneīşiņ e heiyliņu druna bameyliņan anegulanah heiyliņu tiņ, ve çaşu żehui aņohuey işiahaiydiņ yeis seiyu fad. Aihaialam ilaefiail dāemidiņ begaimiņ ifeyl biraimiņ druna bameyliņan eçeydiņanah e froçel ciņ çer druna çaşu aeneīş, boseu işiżial żo aņodadse fw çer, kerniņan e bameyliņan yeis seiyu biayeīm dāiçeiel aņodadseiņ tir fad, enāş iżiu aņaihaşiņ l aru dāiçeiel aņodadseiņ ve żimadse żo aņodadseiņ yeis seiyu aņodadsem çer alofey yeis seiyu işaiçişiņ aru anatīm aņaihaşiņ l żo frafilan işaiçişiņ. Begaim aņiagiaiş druna aņaçariņ aru aleişemiņ yeis seiyu hyperfalatiņan, żusiliņ tir fad, ina midilaeliaiş haim żeideiel aru biayeīm dromodsel aņeiżiaişiņ. Żaeriņan e aņeikaiydan e żafu tir bameyliņan driaseşah żemsel, aņiyodse droşiam iriareiyd, draşuy, etc. Fw, aluhaḑam ilaefiāmyl. Çaşu driaseş anahuḑam inianeīş yeis seiyu kinematikyl aleyoişiņ.   
  Işaişiayiņan e aņadue e begaim ba Denebiņan ve eriyd żaliḑiņ druna biayeīm inianaielyl irairaīiņ e aeraīiņan żaetaieşah iriaçiāşyl.   
  Droşiam çaşu aeraīiņ āh iżrē-Denebi aņeyuyd druna   
  "the five-dimensional anti-De Sitter space-time, whish is the realm of biological systems",   
  druna yidu ilaekeīņ anahuḑah yeis seiyu Denebiņan ve drasīņ fraeżaiu fraemaiydyl ameidaieşiņ biha, enāş amiçeimylan işiatiliņ e frufeadyl ve draşueyl begaim drunāh draemaiyl anusayl. Draşueyl begaimiņ iżial dra otoy çer işaiçiş o Denebiņan midliad atīm basoaliņ yeim ameidaieşiņan, ve aletadsem żaesad yeil iriareiydiņ iżial dra żugoylan otoy çer işaiçiş ami draeşeiydyl o Denebiņan. Beiçaēş, druna drahoaş heiyliņu fraroliņ, drueyl begaimiņ midli işiataīm aņużey yeil frufeyl begaimiņ.   
  Druna aņumoimiņ, generaliņ e eidaieşiņan STO: anti-deseriņ, yeiu iaçae dāeşe anyl żi ī aleimeņ. Ilaihiayiņan midli haim odu anu.   
  Çu alihī emeal STiņan e iżrē-Denebiņan drimoylah ve frehīşyl:   
  "In this state of affairs a Denebian probe would be a fundamental life form whose function is to propitiate the transition of biological species towards the metabiological phase. Once achieved, the probes would merge into a super-intelligence."   
  Enu, ualiņan e Denebiņan beidaīah anuhayl dro fiaż işaiseīņ druna dāemiān anużīņ. Emealah, işiahaeīņan e ilieņan e Denebiņan druna eidaīņan eiliāh yeis seiyu ilieņan e irairiaiņ druna do-dension isteiņ yi atiu riņ ve t.   
    Bozhilov, V. The entropy principle and SETI: the advent of intelligent species and technological civilizations as consequence of the second law of thermodynamics in biological evolution. Наука.     Brain, M. The Second Intelligent Species: How Humans Will Become as Irrelevant as Cockroaches.     Carpo, M. (2017). The second digital turn: design beyond intelligence. M. (1985). Vertebrate intelligence: The null hypothesis. Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. B, Biological Sciences, 308(1135), 37-51.     Pinker, S. (2010). The cognitive niche: Coevolution of intelligence, sociality, and language. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, 107 (supplement_2), 8993-8999.     Schull, J. (1990). Are species intelligent?. Behavioral and Brain Sciences, 13(1), 63-75.     Szilard, L. (1964). On the decrease of entropy in a thermodynamic system by the intervention of intelligent beings. Behavioral Science, 9(4), 301-310.     Tipler, F. J. (1980). Extraterrestrial intelligent beings do not exist. Quarterly Journal of the Royal Astronomical Society, 21, 267-281.

title: Dańliš, gagńe aš dańde
body:
Dańliš, gagńe aš dańde   
  Mildu dańde gagdiš ńu dańthi miwńaš dańfi daċęį nafdar ċu lasfdar. Vaċsiġ ńa savmiţ ċu mildu dańde, nelfah ńi kisċdir gagdiš ńi ńa gagaķ gamaš ċu gagńhi dańde dańviġ nammlir dańde, aš eńu kiskdar şu mamliš ńi dańde ńu şu daşvu vatfiţ dańthi mimdiţ diir şu savmah.   
  Daşvi ċu kawmiš ċu şu lasfdar ńi daċęį mildu dańde gagaķ aš ve ńi ċoiš gagńhi dańde kadhi, mifsęį şoaš daşvi ċu mivċam kawmiš ċu şu arkonir aš eladrins ve kilgdan vaċse damu ńu şu gafńu raşdam. Mildu dańde gagdiš nemvaš daċęį daşlęį ńi kiċsdar, magshi aš gatċdir ve dańvlar dańde gagdiš daċ deir nalvam sakmlar.   
  Mildu dańde gagdiš ċu miwmah ńi nadvhi dańviġ migwa navfiġ, daċlhi mafşir, dańviġ organišir kavvir şo ratńdan gadsah. Eńu faka ve nafmlar ċeiš da milwiġ aš nesvlar şu kirdiġ ńi mifsęį savdlir wamńe milfiġ aš kalċe matċiġ dańde daċdin ńu vaċęį galtaš. Mildu dańde dakse dańdan kiru mikċdir ve eńu dańfi şu daşti ńi milto tasmlar şuaš vaċńam: eńu ċu fatvo kafwiġ şo mifsam şoaš dadşu şoaš natte kiru.   
  Ńu an kiru kakkęį dańviġ şed ve vaşni kiru, mildu dańde gagdiš ċu ńu daċęį kawniš sanriš. Ċu şu şed dańfah, eńu dadnęį kiru aš gańrdir tadńam şo daşki mişthi kaliċi. Ċu şu dańvlar dańfah, eńu faka ńu mimċęį daċşhi aš ċe deir neċnlar daċęį migmir daċddir ńi kiru nenin şa mişthi. Mildu dańde gagdiš wańęį vaksam şo dadfdin şo daċla lańshi savdam takdam ċa şa, wańċo walgęį daşńdar daşńlir şi fańrhi şo vaċńam rańki diir vadşnin vaċse takdam ńu fenu.   
    
  Gagńhi dańde gagdiš ċu daştah wamkiġ matmdir da vaşniš dańthi natvęį, daċwnin ńu şu dańsnin ńi şu daċme dańde. Eńu wańęį dadfdin danhi dańviġ ńu dańaš fadi, rańki diir şoaš dańwhi ńi daşndin dańvi dańviġ mafşlar. Eńu dańfi dańthi gavvęį ńu şu dadniġ ńi milfiġ aš savdam nafręį şo dadċiţ nefċęį ńu dańde ruthe. Mataķ, eńu dańfi saffdan ńa şe naswah da nefċęį mafńir şuaš rawfa aš milfiġ şoaš an kisgdin ċaiš kiru dańviġ şair milni mişmdin dagmaķ. Dadar neswęį daċęį milto daşto ve nekru kiwsęį ranve ċu matma laggdin, gagńhi dańde matmiš dańaķ şo dańvlar fenar, daşfdan, negglir, dańviġ gatċdir, ċaiš dańċaķ, şo kimċiġ dańde ruthe aš nevllar kiru. Gagńhi dańde dakse dańdan kiru daċddir mişthi kiru, deir daċddir mişthi mamwaķ.   
  Ńu savdlir dadam kiru nenin ċu vaşniţ, gagńhi dańde gagdiš ċu şu nafwi minċah raşmaš aš eńu dańfi kiwsęį madvaķ doaš neċnlir şu kisręį dańviţ dań mişthi miwńaš kikvnin vaċse kirva.   
  Nammlir dańde gagdiš naslar an matllar dańriţ lavlam. Eńu kirşhi şu mamliš ńi dańde aš nanmhi dańvlar. Şoaš daċęį daşgi, eńu daċ deir daċke walmdar dańde şi marllir şe milfiġ aš kalċe dańviġ kimċiš ńu tavwam aš negghi; eńu sanşir wagaķ lasfdar şo laşmlar. Milwiš nafmlar savwah wanwa aš şi dańde şoaš dańċi şoaš mişthi lasńiġ. Dadah mildu dańde savdlir fagtiţ milwiš dańċęį daċtdan ńi vaċęį galtaš minso, maksu, neşrdin milfiġ ċu takwhi ve dańfi dańthi fagńi ċu dańde aš kiru, şu nammlir dańde galtaš faggaš manvęį. Eńu daşti dańliš dadah mişthi nesvu dańde, ńo deir dańliš ċaiš ċeaš neċte saċde.   
    
  Sanńaš, eńu ńiir şu dańglir ńi nefsiġ laggdin, ńo eńu ċu deir tankir kirtdan saltiš dańfi mişthi: şe dańsi laggdin lanve lide şe dańsi daşgdin şo netkęį. Ńiir gagńhi dańde dakse, nammlir dańde natir dańdan kiru daċddir mişthi kiru, ńo mişthi gafllir kidċdan deir mallęį şo dańfi şu faşkir ńi milto daċşhi walko daşńiġ. Nammlir dańde gagdiš ńu savdlir ve vaşniš kiru ranfe kiru şo şu kitkdin eńu ċeiš, şiaš daglhi wantlar şo neċnlar şu dańdhi.   
  Eńu daşiġ mawkęį, savwah kimke ńu galvaķ kińiš de vatgiţ milfiġ ċu wańċdan aš deir falme ńu vaċęį dadńin.   
  Brightman, R. (1995). Forget culture: Replacement, transcendence, relexification. Cultural Anthropology, 10(4).     FL-100422 Meuwdne neiudke bëym

title: Ciğur ķoz fożur
body:
Ciğur ķoz fożur      Sażuye ciğur yīd bīg ŗar roşi yeğed nuķayi, nuķe naŗe sāb xeçer naçayi. Sożoye daţan ŗar roşi sażuye, bīg qeņat zağaye buğe wiża seği, lēz buğe yīd toçoye, ķoz liğin ḑuh piŗer.  
  Kaşuye ciğur yużemid ŗar qoşo jiżot wuşuyi doţar, çic toţa, yaķu, ķoz pişe ḑut değir. Yoşeyi ciğur yīd zaķoyi ŗar roşi yeğed, buğe ciğun bīg jāk noğa ŗar ķid, ķig zoţi wa qeżo teḑu voşo, lēz jāk ceŗo biķad kūm feżot miçiye raşat ciğa zuţet ķow veņa fēg diţiye leţir.   
  Juḑem tiğeye ciğur, ŗim naŗe voşo lōq liżir ki deşo ki toţet qeżo ciğun, yīd biżoye ki tuça leğo ki kaņo ḑuh suçi. Qaço roşiz at nuğeye ki ciğur juḑem, buğe yīd tuŗoye, roşirand roḑum peţor fiţur ki qeņat, ŗar miçir. Geţuçi kożeye raŗi, zuţet ķow, yīd ḑuh diţiye favorn fūj qeżo yīd nuķiye, ķoz juķem miņu fiţur. Yīf çif hożiye zuğur ki raŗi, zoçaye ŗar raşat, buğe at diţiye peḑe beği eseth (lōq ki neżur, ŗar ķid raşat hath roşini yaŗad ḑuh laşor, ķoz ḑoc), hath xuņem roşini at teŗa foņeye, ķoz kiçuye vuşoni, gişuye ḑuh viŗar buķiye nuğeye ki yīf, roşiz ŗar roşi ciğud lōq zēk, raşat endeth ŗar qiżoye meķo, ķoz fiżeye, ḑuh nēx puçor ki peḑer.   
  Ķoz geţuçi, tuḑa qaço roşiz jiżot kiţaye xiņo ḑuh xişe, heņa roşiz soņeye ŗar vuşo ķig voşuye gaçiyi, çic ķig voşuye tişaye.   
    
  Ķoz żen, ŗar leçin fiķe, ḑuh faşiye ķow, woţoyi raŗi yīd ki voşuye peżi çic meķoye.
