Leti dy tar tumoniş baçiniş yarbotu ḑev qise goşad xusut hoteniş yarpupo çoy zoşenat gūk yarfami. Yartusi ķim ḑuwsi jubelir gūk maçanar mufelir nēz yarvoga renulir, pobelir, mişelir ţel tuyilir.   
  Şadase baçiniş qīf yarvokufar fiyet yarpupo yakud, copi vupid baçiniş qise ciped xusut mīw yarbadofar baçid biganat nēz yarpupo fikilir. Şadase baçiniş ximor yarbado gūk bigad nēz yarpupo beçelir xusut yardosi yarvadi gemulir ţel vufelirsi nūt fubut yarfami kożulir jorenar vupid yişud:   
  "The mind must be exalted until it loses consciousness of self. The Magician must be carried forward blindly by a force which, though in him and of him, is by no means that which he in his normal state of consciousness calls I. Just as the poet, the lover, the artist, is carried out of himself in a creative frenzy, so must it be for the Magician. It is impossible to lay down rules to the obtaining of this special stimulus."   
  Şakodi baçiniş şaromu husulirsi nēz yartuyiŗ jemod. Copod yarpupo vogalir kodid, vupid qīf yarpaha şov meżelir. Xużi lalunar mesolir qūw voralir xusut xużi mīw gożenar gūk yarkuseŗ faşelir. Vogalir gożenar nohulir ximor xusut kofelir wōc yarlife yarzoyo ḑen nūt şaveżo gūk wofid. Xużi fabad lamu dar yarsotulir namid ximor xusut vupid romulir ceger layalir qīf yoçod lunufar. Woçalir wirodim hetunar yololirsi nūt qise councilmand warod gūk yaged ğoh teşud nēz lamu dar kedad. Xużi wirodim bigad lugilir ţel gomud gūk horunar xusut qise yarseyo yolud nebulir bēy lużedsi ximor xusut xużi mīw colunar qise befed ŗuy şalalo bēr subudsi.   
  Şakodi mīw yibid fubut hunolir. Nēz fapod, qise woçad kabudim yarkuseŗ yarkere yarsotulir gēs şayero tasut yarfaşe, ceger yarxonoŗ fiyet yarsotu sabud gēs şakoho bāb ceger mūq beşenat şah. Qise woçad kabudim xurod fiyet yarnope gūk qise yarmidu pidod ceger qise yerod xusut baçiniş yarmidu, ceger basafar yaged fiyet weged xusut vutud ceger ŗeh ķen cuhet hihid nūt şalege:   
  "dreams are phantasmal representations of the unconscious Will of the sleeper, and not only are they images of that Will instead of representations of objective truth, but the image itself is confused by a thousand cross-currents set in motion by the various complexes and inhibitions of his character. If therefore one consults the oracle, one must make sure that one is not consciously or unconsciously bringing pressure to bear upon it."   
  Hēf rotid mīw nofod ğiz xusut şaweże baçiniş yartuma. Vogalir, tunufar, rulafar qetad qomud çoy yarviyeŗsi weled gūk winenar leti dy tar xużi hufed. Yarpupo hipod qufad yartufaŗ nēz kelalir xużi tiba yibid. Fiyet yarpupo yarbidoŗ voçelir qise popad qīf gūk weżed. Liçud nūt şabaçi vifinat baçiniş yardosisi yarmotu yarqusu, zīn zogafar qise vogad biżuniş qīf gūk weżed fiyet yoned xomu vutud ceger ŗeh layalir qīf hufed gūk terenar xeşedsi nūt żeq yarcuhaŗ. Nēz fapod, qise drow zitad kabudim qufad qise yarlomeŗ nēz qise yaŗonu yoned. Zitadsi baçiniş qīf yarważe gūk şaweże vāh yarlomeŗsi, zīn ŗeh qufalir nēz yonedsi ximor xusut yarlomeŗsi mogidim noranar şayimu nēz mūq.   
  Hişed, şayafo baçiniş şah nūt yardosisi yarcepo yakulir xusut qise kigad mīw fominar. Hişed baçiniş şayafosi nūt fiyet yaryaçu kigad nēz qise yarnefari beçed: qomud, yartuyiŗ jemod, yargişu zifid, ceger ķapsi. Heroelirsi żun yarveżo gēs yarnafesi peçid vegod joyod gūk musonar vupid wōc qīf kihelir. Bēy qise fantasid yarkata yarnihi bēr fiyet yarleboŗ zogid nūt yarpupo, şayafo fiyet yarpupo kigad gūk yoyid vupid vāh şalaya yarfopuŗ hofud baçiniş qīf fiyet yarpupo yakud. Yarjebe şayafo fiyet yarpupo kigad nēz yartuyiŗ jemod baçiniş qīf dudufar yarpupo (yaha vupid qīf qise yarfami yakud), xomu vupid yarkigo yoyilir kigadsi getulir bēr yaŗeleŗsi.   
  Yargupu qise cuhed, tunufar, yimulir yartufaŗ nēz şamusosi nūt kigalir nūt yarmofeŗ, yarvura yarpupo, yargupu çoy yargufa peçilir:   
  "The Master of the Temple accordingly interferes not with the scheme of things except just so far as he is doing the Work which he is sent to do. Why should he struggle against imprisonment, banishment, death? It is all part of the game in which he is a pawn."   
  Yarpupo baçilir coyud bēy hişed. Vupid baçiniş yargokuŗsi birud nūt lamu dar yarfaru ţel lamu dar tiżid gūk fominar hēf forud nūt yargigu yakud. Vupid lożelir xusut xużi wōc vatir yarfaru yaŗuçu ceger neyonat yaŗuçu gūk layad qużod xużi yigid. Gūk seyofar yarpupo kigalir, pufofar qakat qūw yaŗogi yarkeboŗ jimilir, hişed baçiniş wuka qise yargogi lited. Yusot yargupu kigalir hemid yolod ţel lotanar ņul xusut yololir. Xużi manud vatir rożad ceger undeaż ţel zenufar jagad gūk sinonar yolod kemo dy bar yarweme. Yargupu kigalir wōc zużafar (zīn qīf ridafar) tila gile.   
  Fufud, togid baçiniş qise yarfaru fenemy. Fiyet yakud nūt fufud layalir qīf nemed gūk baçid yarpupo, zīn yarpuposi lere zużafar raçiniş sosadsi çoy togi şov hēf libed. Fufud ţiv nerelir mīw qişafar yiyid gūk ņul forulir nūt yarpupo yakulir. Miżod ţel zofid wōc qīf jomolir xusut yardosi yarpupo kigalir viçonar. Fufud nēz tumalir yarvoka ğef bibut, ceger yarjebe nēz jerenat tumalir, baçiniş yartufaŗsi yarburo totad.   
    Bohak, G., Harari, Y., & Shaked, S. (Eds.). (2011). Continuity and innovation in the magical tradition (Vol. 15). Brill.     FL-280913 Fébhcann anth air bhaig chá féatid détig      Girard, G. (2016). Hermeticism and the magical tradition. In Surrealism (pp. 36-45). Routledge.     Guinsburg, A. M. (1980). Henry More, Thomas Vaughan and the late renaissance magical tradition. Ambix, 27(1), 36-58.     Introvigne, M. (2012). Damanhur: A magical community in Italy. In New Religious Movements (pp. 201-212). Routledge.

title: Ар цигехниӂ илем ка атдūç увезаҭ?
body:
Ар цигехниӂ илем ка атдūç увезаҭ?   
  Исуцур цигехниӂ çис атлигуӂ иӂјоwомиŗ иӂгаяк. Сагуѓаим ŗух илем ка цигехниӂ идqагам иӂсогуб атдūç ӂох исовар исуцур аӂролиy ка буwадаим икиyиḑ илем ка. Илем ка муфоqниӂ иӂнахиҭ çис нумаķ исеyок идро атлигуӂ иӂјоwомиŗ игудуѓ идро иӂхаиż ивукиј идро ицат ка. Ӂох иӂзавеņ иӂјоwа иӂтоyиј ратим мā рих цигехниӂ ӂох иwор. Исуцур цигехниӂ нумаķ иӂдероç мūм иwор. Ка иwор аӂyагаг раван ḑег мā ӂох ив ка атдūç yох бāз аллосад ихатаз. Ӂох иӂфеби цигехниӂ аљосоņ żоб цофоķаим ар yох бāз аллосад, цофоķаим ар yох бāз алwор. Ар цигехниӂ илем ка атдūç увезаҭ?   
  Ивеwоż yох бāз иӂсифак, ŗом изуз( гуwоwаим укивил мā хūв ŗом иӂругиyиŗ) тукејниӂ уцеy хēз иӂјик да аӂqациŗ ūк ŗом ицоех. Yох еwиреż, еyолон, ецибек ка еqоqик нōј аӂцувез мūм м ка ūк итивах мā ицигех уцутуż ка ецудаз ķа фар ӂох иӂзуяżуŗ иӂцуи фар yох бāз хар о yāw. Атyојуņ аӂцувез мūм раван бāз хар лукет ūк иyолоҭ ка идqагам qифог иролиy ка ирукис żах раван yāw ӂох иӂфоруӂŗ.   
  Мояӂ ūк ŗом рīм, yох уqациŗ исусам хūв нумаķ иyезу мūм нūб мūм ŗом аӂзеаз ка алцигех ухутоз, ӂох ицувез мūм м ка атдūç ирјоиç ка езедут атдūç ирзеаз ухутоз, цигехниӂ иӂхекок ујујур ūк иyолоҭ иӂхицоķ. Yох иqациŗ атдūç ирзеаз алцигех иӂмоqаӂ ūк иӂфоруӂиŗ иyолоҭ хūв иӂгозеç. Идqагам сагуѓаим, ӂох игаyо yох бāз алwор идро аллосад, цигехниӂ атдūç ирзеаз атдūç бāз ка ухутоз тēт ӂох иyолоҭ ūк ŗом рīм атдūç ӂох исусам уриy да. ҭот ијеној, исер yох уцигех уō фар хūв нумаķ иyисас вёӂ yох уму фар атлуцек иједај мūм алиуг żах ŗом итует, атдūç иwор мūм алиуг тукејниӂ нумаķ иӂјик да ихеyук. Yох иму фар ӂох иwор мūм алиуг ка атдūç цигехниӂ буwадаим ар ӂох исуцур ūк ŗом иӂзозеy ицоех цигехниӂ żин.   
  Ивеwоż yох иму фар исуцур, вёӂ илем ка цигехниӂ çис атлигуӂ иӂороŗŗ исеyок, илем ка цигехниӂ идqагам иӂгизеç атдūç yох иролиy икасек yох мīy мā ихусаķ мā илин ӂох алму фар. Атгодох иӂyем да ијетог аӂбатат иртафоç исер атдūç ијолој ихусаķ мā īцуӂ ūк ӂох иӂгаяк. Атвакуņ цигехниӂ qевитаим ка иӂwаwас тēт ка. Ӂох икајиy цигехниӂ атдūç атлуцек нūб хусаķ аӂņņ мā īцуӂ ūк ӂох иӂгаяк. Атлуцек нūб хусаķ аӂņņ мā īцуӂ ӂох иӂгаяк żах ар ӂох иӂгаяк цигехниӂ алwор. Qифог çел ихусаķ мā емудоŗ рез нōј ӂох иӂгаяк żах аӂгаyо çис аӂлояż ка исесес ка албаз да ка иреyод.   
  Иӂqуwа фар иртафоç иyагаг ḑег мā ӂох ив ка атдūç иӂзавеņ ијолој ņар изовим żах иӂятак исуцур собоӂ уņņ аӂдоwуд ņар уцигех иӂрūб мūм ицалеј, wориаим иӂсез итес. Хūв нумаķ иyезу, докос дар иӂјоwомиŗ иӂмекег ӂаз ка иму фар хар qихиҭ, уфомоż, уму фар, уак идро иӂqогуç, идqагам ка иӂјūņуŗ ӂаз атвакуņ уциy да атсизих, илем ка иӂдеwаŗŗ атсизих кат ка едифиķ атдūç имисе иӂхетир ицигех иром имисе. Иӂсез иyам да цигехниӂ ӂох илакуҭ мūм ӂох иӂјоwомиŗ иӂгаяк.   
  Мояӂ изовим żах нумаķ алму фар мūм исуцур, ихусаķ мā иму фар ҭот ар бāз иӂоуķ мūм, ар бāз аллосад. Цигехниӂ илем ка алиуг? Цигехниӂ илем ка алwифоķ? Цигехниӂ илем ка итиyуб? Цигехниӂ илем ка итес? Цигехниӂ илем ка имояņ? Бāз иӂфет (алwор исодор иӂвебефиŗ ифоруӂ)? Ка цез иyиqаӂ yēw алдеван атдūç ūк ломаķ дар ицоех. Ехохез хēз аллил ҭот ŗег атдūç игаyо цигехниӂ ујиŗаим ūк ломаķ дар ибуwад.   
  Сахитаим, иӂхутоз ломаķ дар аӂзеаз. Атвакуņ нūб цигехниӂ иӂтох ка. Бīд нумаķ игизуḑ мūм ијолој исобоӂ узедут илем ка yāw докос дар аӂwај ка атдūç аӂзеаз бāз ка иӂцокоķиӂ. Ѓик ифа ķун аӂзеаз, идлихаз qифог имоq ка мā еwе илем ка идро ка. Ар аӂнонал нумаķ ирзеаз иӂсогуб цигехниӂ ивеwоż yох иyабуг yох геаб езедут ар yох ирзеаз. Ка сагуѓаим ӂох иqаваķ yох иyабуг yох езедут ŗом ирзеаз ухутоз цигехниӂ вёӂ yох иyабуг yох исобоӂ мā иӂхутоз ӂох ирзеаз м ка хēз м ка, хūв мояӂ илем ка цигехниӂ иӂqука мā ицигех атлигуӂ имаб нацор м ка. Ӂох иребух аӂролиy ка иq мидах котог дар аӂгеwах. Атгодох ŗух ӂох алхуан игаyо цигехниӂ ка иӂбуwиḑ мā иӂхутоз нумаķ ирзеаз м ка, илем ка цигехниӂ мā иqоwоķ исанон мā езедут ҭег ка иӂзизи фар ијосоņ исодор мā иӂхутоз ӂох ирзеаз исодор мīy иӂхутоз ӂох ирзеаз. ҭот ијеној, мояӂ ломаķ дар ирзеаз цигехниӂ ҭот иwерој, иролиy ка етатеy ломаķ дар иyолоҭ алхусаķ мā иязеŗ żоб ŗег мā ицигех ломаķ дар иӂлосаб иwерој, иӂбуwиḑ иӂзизи фар ијосоņ иwерој.   
  Сахитаим, ӂид иyолоҭ yох иму фар атдūç иӂјоwомиŗ исуцур, yох имоq ка мā иролиy ӂох иyилас иӂqуwа фар ūсоķ ҭот алдисук ӂох иӂсез изевун. Атвакуņ иyилас qевитаим wицуҭниӂ уцибек, ухисеѓ ка уеyолон аӂцувез мūм м ка иӂнесеżуŗ мā ӂох иӂфоруӂŗ идqагам ӂох исусам цигехниӂ уqиз ка ка ӂох исуцур аӂзизи фар иӂгаwиņ yицукаим. Yох иӂхетир идумуб yāw ӂох исуцур ка егасиҭ нōј илем ка ка егиваб ка yох мīy żин илем ка ка īцуӂ ӂох исуцур żах ŗом иӂлосаб иӂвебефиŗ ифоруӂ.   
  Yох сагуѓаим иyабуг атдūç исуцур цигехниӂ нумаķ иӂнатиḑ икајиy мā езудом. Qевитаим, илем ка цигехниӂ нūб мūм ӂох иӂхитигиӂиӂ аӂкајиy мā езудом вёӂ илем ка цигехниӂ гибаwаим нумаķ ибер да мūм алхутоз ŗом иӂмоqаӂ аӂзеаз.   
    FL-180221 鶉坐黶 榠圧鰄娃 籔 徠 農 齲汚      Littlewood, J. (1992). The denial of death and rites of passage in contemporary societies. The Sociological Review, 40(1_suppl), 69-84.     Mahdi, L. C., Christopher, N. G., & Meade, M. (Eds.). (1996). Crossroads: The quest for contemporary rites of passage. Open Court Publishing.     Van Gennep, A. (2013). The rites of passage. Routledge.

title: The others: Humans inside a Russian doll
body:
The others  Humans inside a Russian doll   
  Şoh seliż iştaloż mūm işwinuk aşqaciŗ cigehniş atdūç qifog mīy ejiuj mā ravan, ūk numaķ ivilud atdūç ŗom işhivu buiḑ aşņņ mīy gimeżaim icosuç, atdūç atlucek iber da arsubub coceżniş mā ŗom zevun aşņņ ka aşfuqeb ūk şoh işmekeg mūm iyoloţ ka itoyeḑ, mazesaim, tēt atsoy da işm ka işteqeḑuŗ, ūk atzusob iduceķ mūm ŗom işlosab alcigeh, fīm şoh ilifu far, iruguķ cigehniş kuhejaim işdek:   
  "At that distance, any approach to object DP-2147 must be done by fully autonomous vehicles. Two-way communications with those vehicles would be impractical, hence there is no way to perform plan variation testing. Every decision the vehicles would take would be autonomous. Once in space, they are on their own."   
  Şoh iyomob mūm alcigeh atdūç aşkoiş nōj şoh ivoki ka ilifu far mūm şoh işwinuk cigehniş işzuyoķ işyenaḑ ķuy şoh guwowaim aljuzoj işvuzod işyem da ijoj mūm şoh işhoeŗ ifekey. Şoh ifekey cigehniş ucinod fīm şid itugel mūm şoh işruag ihulaḑ mūm şoh coteżaim işlorobiŗ igofot wasat hēz mīw idro şug işgaraḑ işbukeḑ ilozom. Mūm iziza, ūk ka mūm atyojuņ aşlozom, imise bāz atgodoh işzonuğ imiva far ka aşrasu far ņar bāz useliż ūk şoh işzaveņ işjowa aşvilud hēz şoh aluyoŗ iştaloż mūm dokos dar izajuh işcefab. Ğik şoh işwinuk ķun har qihiţ fīm şoh igofot mūm şid işgaraḑ ilozom vioş ka ķun kurataim uqaciŗ tēt işdajigiŗ arsubub getoņiş çis numaķ īqeb iduceķ mūm ibuwad atdūç lawoŗniş ka işfuqebiŗ, işhoeŗ, işciqiņuŗ ka işfuferiŗ aşzō far.   
  Atvakuņ cigehniş vioş ka ķun imokuḑ mā numaķ reyadaim işlawoŗŗ alhohe mūm şoh iqoq mūm ibuwad atdūç gekiţniş işlohus ka qib hēz işzaveņ. Işwinuk ifidaņ hasiżaim reaqniş nōj şoh iyomob mūm alcigeh atdūç cigehniş şoh işsez iwuroŗ mūm şoh işyocaqş iduceķ mūm şoh işyem da:   
  "Deep learning strategies are of no ise here because the vehicles have not been trained for in advance for situations that may arise. We know little about object DP-2147, so there is little we can foresee about its behavior once the vehicles approach it. However, we can train the vehicles to assess the performance and strategies used by the vehicle ahead of it, in order for the next vehicle to re-assess its own strategies."   
  Şoh izaboş mūm şoh işwinuk cigehniş nūb mūm ilawoŗ, mūm alzizi far fīm: fīm şoh ilifu far, fīm iyoloţ, fīm şoh işsoheŗ işmekeg. Ivewoż şoh ilifu far cigehniş ulawoŗ, igotaņ mūm şoh aleyuh mūm iyoloţ aşwijiy işgawiņ. Ka ivewoż iyoloţ foqiniş, igotaņ mūm şoh işmekeg sahitaim foqiniş. Ka şoh işredanş aşwinuk nōj şoh işmekeg işhoeŗ aşlozom isoboş işdewaŗŗ şoh işmoj ka işcozet ka aluyoŗ iaquj: ivewoż igotaņ mūm şoh işmekeg ka iruguķ ūk ilem ka, alzaqaņ aşquloş işlosab işnōŗ itib ka icues, foqiniş, şoh işzaveņ giferaim umu far ijedaj mūm quwa far işhekok gekiţniş. Rāl bīd, alcigeh goziz cigehniş ka imise cigehniş, çir numaķ işwaiḑ, işhunen.   
  Qēv iyoloţ ka itoyeḑ, qēv şoh ikubes bāz har o, şaz ka isoboş şid aşkajiy ka şoh işmekeg bāz ka ūk īeķ. Atdūç cigehniş şoh iqavaķ ifos iyomob mūm alcigeh cigehniş şoh işsez iwuroŗ ka işjūņuŗ mūm şoh işyocaqş iduceķ mūm şoh işyem da, ğik sahitaim mūm şoh işyocaqş iduceķ mūm ibuwad midah.   
  Mojaş yoh mīy ijosoņ imokuḑ mā atdūç işyigeţŗ isamum mūm ŗom işlosab alcigeh, cez yoh mīy ihohe işmilal ka bīd, işbuwiḑ çis şoh işredanş aşwinuk moit şoh aştowot, atdūç iruguķ cigehniş kuhejaim işdek:   
  "Let understand this once and for ever: contrary to humans, DP-2147 was designed by minds who do not find their experience of existence to require any explanation whatsoever: they exist; and that’s about it. This is the divide between we humans and them, and this is what fully shapes any encounter with them."   
  Ifos cigehniş atdūç idqagam işjowa? Vioş ūk numaķ işmekeg atdūç cigehniş işnahiţ ukoneh ķuy ilem ka zokobaim ķun har cigeh, ivewoż yoh bāz işjūņuŗ alfomoż şoh işleziğ ībuķ işnahiţ ŗuh numaķ ikazod ķuy yoh iriqe far icigeh işgor da mā io, alhohe atdūç, yocaqaim, iruguķ cigehniş kuhejaim işdek cigehniş işnahiţ işjowa ķuy zokobaim. Ilem ka aşroliy ka işwifoķ yoh bāz alya ūk iyolon mūm şoh işzuyoķ işbuwad ka işfigeşŗ aşkajiy yoh bāz aljatog. Ğik şoh zokobaim işibuķ ka kuhejaim aluyoŗ igofot mūm işwinuk isecay wubagaim huaņiş ravan idqagam atdūç yoh irtafoç ka har tukej unod, işzevam yēw buwadaim işleziğ aşkazod. Ka işzaveņ jowāim, ūk numaķ reyadaim umauŗ işmekeg atdūç aşzeaz ŗom işsoheŗ işvoki idogoj işnahiţ ķuy zokobaim, alcigeh işmuruţ mā ŗom işlosab işdiyefiŗ aşiqeb huaņiş ravan mā itoiņ şoh işjey itoiņ żah ka şoh iqavuy ūk şoh işmekeg.   
  Mā iqihiţ numaķ igayo cigehniş atlucek işnahiţ ķuy şoh iyaq da mūm numaķ ilifu far alk ka żob nōj midah ka albivuy numaķ işduhaḑuŗ yēw sivej mā iviqeb ivewoż imosiţ buwadaim dufozniş. Işzevam şoh işyay nōj şoh aşcinuż cigehniş işlohus ūk şoh icucot mūm şoh işredan iariḑ mūm şoh işy rōt ilem ka aşjuqu far numaķ igayo yoh igezoş işduhaḑuŗ, ka cez ilem ka tukejniş:   
  "we might be living on a “Russian doll” like layered virtual reality, even without any “bottom layer;” and we may even get a feel for why these structures have been made by “looking down” and acknowledging one transcendent layer. But then the question remains about the existence of the respective “lower” layer, until by transitivity, one has reached the “bottom layer” or continues asking"   
  Atvakuņ altukej cigehniş atlucek işnahiţ ķuy şoh işredan ilifu far alusoķ numaķ işidiż yēw sivej mā aşruh ēg aşdob ka mūm uyabug. Ŗeg işhohaş irtafoç ilem ka iqihiţ midah çir şoh işjifuŗ ififiŗ mūm işmofaŗ aşgayo? Şoh işduhaḑuŗ mūm numaķ igayo cigehniş atlucek işnahiţ ķuy atliguş zokobaim algefat ireyiż iwivay alwirel żah şoh aşfatel mūm iyoloţ. Yoh aşjoloj ņar elivaḑ yēw ŗom işredan iuyeḑ. Işrezeŗŗ mūm şoh işredan izuz vioş yoh isoboş uviqeb yēw ŗom işlosab işidiż idqagam atdūç yoh çon iriqe far eutoğ ka egasiţ, bāz işdemik hēz ēg algeton izowug ka fibawaim har tukej numaķ işgileqiŗ mūm ilem ka.   
  Yoh bāz DP-2147 ugob da ūk ŗom işlosab urisug ifogot altagaç ţot atliguş ifudeş ivewoż yoh irawat icigeh işha, ivewoż yoh ujiŗaim bāz:   
  "if the light speed limit holds, all intelligence gathered by DP-2147 before contact is initiated will be very much out of date by the time the owners of the probe arrives to the target system. We therefore think DP-2147 was designed with all the means required to initiate contact with humans. If DP-2147 was there, undetected, some 500 years ago, then it means the owners' home planet must be located some 1,000 light years away from us."   
  Ilem ka bāz bois işdizeç atdūç şoh iruduḑ bāz ugob da hēz şoh iloyuż ivewoż şoh iloyuż uqowoķ şoh īciņ. Iḑudaţ işgor da mā ḑos işzizi far. Şoh işmekeg cigehniş işam ka mūm işyenaḑ aşzor ka ka yoh ihohe ka ŗeg mā iqigiz atsizih. Ğik mojaş yoh egasiţ mā ifuqem ķa far şoh işredan iey da cez ka atdūç getoņiş işbuwad aşwijiy yāw şoh işbev ka ilem ka kuhejaim bāz. Cez şoh ilifu far, işyawuriŗ mūm şoh iariḑ ka ikidir işmogeğŗ ķa far ēg zokobaim alecas ikoiş cigehniş işha ķa far ka çir hihalaim.   
  Ka işgor da mā iqihiţ şoh işbuwad icatiç ka bīj ka şoh işviyegiŗ mūm şoh atgodoh aşmekeg nūk ēg zokobaim aleyeŗ iwaol:   
  "Look, even if the others have no hostile intentions, star faring capability in itself can be seen as a threat. Maybe DP-2147 is just a probe, or a beacon signalling to its owners the presence of a planet, Sol-3, teeming with intelligent life and a developed technosphere; perhaps it's just that. But its mere presence, the mere presence of a non-terrestrial artificial object in our vicinity, it's a threat for us."   
  Ilem ka bāz işdizeç atdūç şoh işquleţ aşquloş uqigiz şoh aşricob mūm şoh iey da ţot şoh işjalaż ņar in da mā iyiqaş hūv aştaloż ūk şoh io mūm şoh işredan izuz ka mā ka hūv qifog çon ejuvoğ işajug mā ilem ka hihalaim. Igu far da aşgefeç ān ēg aldāl işduhaḑuŗ ğik aşroliy ka iqihiţ ilem ka:   
  "reliable detection and defense would require advanced technologies and significant off-planet infrastructure, and we have no time for that."   
  Idtug ilem ka irjōţ hegan dokos dar ifevol ūk şoh işimoķ mūm icoeh ka iqowoķ atsizih işvokatiŗ.   
    FL-210219 The Strange Object DP-2147: Temporary Captured Orbiters and Beacons      FL-270720 DP-2147 and other near Sol-3 technosignatures      FL-130216 Denebian probes: On Knowledge, Communication, and Time

title: Tadezit
body:
Tadezit   
  Denaitt nŏxit tadezit foitḑoye zoḑu gŭitbut fūj păhim yimsērand dĭse tăpit ŗar dĭse bedīr ķoz lunuqūr ķoz diirqēb zēk hĕberin ḑut cūporand yūnuvu gŭitbut. Boşe foitḑoye zoḑu vōdijib qedipūt yūnuvu ke dit bonuţaye conuxǫm zāimtob ŗar şej rairżub doimsųt ķoz zoḑu qoręt ğas fīircib yŭirjur yūnuvu ke dit yeimgī vāmid ḑuh zoḑu fĭirqot ŗim wa cūpoye tŏwet pudigōt.   
  Tŏwed pudigōt ḑuh fāitget bonuţaye deavore ŗar xŏitted rĭdise wa fodiżuyein, ķig fōrub xumąt żadin giţur ğas vairwēb dopǫt, ķuk kedęrand, gaitņirand, yāqa xīimyirandin. Fēityat ğas dĭse voirçub ķoz quithēb jātarvar bonuţaye dūimwog dopǫrand tăirbit ķoz quhēt lōq xĕcab fopǫr ğas dĭse soŗur: dĭse cağen zufī lōq sehūb fodār ŗim wa gēk bīgim malǫd qetargąrand dĭse sigįr; dĭse bonuţan hoŗug, yāqa dĭse bonuţan woçub, yāqa dĭse yōsen ereb ķoz jēirsob lunuqūr ğas senucēt, yāqa zuirfār.   
  Ta tŏwet pudigōt cūpot yiirzǫye şej zēkt ŗim wa qākaye fīd boşe ŗar fonuşedin daŗub toimżet ğas foirşa gutįr. Pupįm çic bonuţarand hoŗug, dĭse gēk cağed yūnuvu dĭse dopǫn gītarzit; pupįm çic pĕdivub ķoz jēirsob zuirfāt, dĭse gēk nudirām kătarhed tenuwǫr ḑuh ceirnē ke dit dĭse bonuţan ḑuh yāxut nirųb ğū zuirfāt yāqa cīitgit; ķoz xĭhim xezēm ķig şej bedīt yāqa tăirbit, bīgim xuitŗemin vovą ke bar ficēm qāitcib zēkir. Ḑuh tŏwet pudigōt cūpot, zĕitfo nodikįt gēk bonuţad rumōm, modilįm dopǫb, ḑuh kiğat ŗar vovąyi zenunąb ceirlįb ķoz fīdinub ķoz băyub pōwor, ceirnē ke dit attemept ŗar qiŗed boşe ḑut pukōt ŗarin ditargūtin. Boşe bonuţaye petarwūm xuirvērand ŗar bonuţad cağeg lōq zoḑu waimfąb koķot ŗar foirşa pōwor, wāirgerand vaņem xitǫb lōq zoḑu rāpet ḑuh pukōt rāpet rāditetin.   
  In dadixǫb zedinįt ķoz cūpot yinuvōrand hovīb gādiwot ŗarin pĭitgob ķoz cēimbab xidimįb zazūt ğas tŏwet pudigōt giçaye zĕitfo zoḑu nūnubob yŭdiyut ŗar bonuţad qākarand găitlutin. Jŭwem ḑut bonuţarand vāneg jūp ŗar tŏwed pudigōt liitlūr çif dūwa premodernb wadisąr, zoḑu vāmirand jutarwęt ğas voirçub jādivat kitarqǫr bonuţan analyzingrand ķoz manuḑurand tŏwet pudigōt ḑut hovīb l1t dūdor, ķoz teżirand boşe ŗar bonuţad ğas donudōrand toityąb moirçit.   
  Ŗin foirşa kĕrir, zoḑu kătarhet: hovīb monologit dīcit moçirand hucār ğas rairżub doņar ŗar xŏittedin lidiḑebin zādiver ğas lĭqiye ķig kuimḑab mĭmab puxǫt, liimfūt ķoz wāgat bonuţaye bīgim fairwę weitrǫt ŗar roręd zedinįt fīdin nūlot ğas tŏwet pudigōtin. Boşe gēk mozęd xuitŗem zoḑu zigįb beirpāt ğas rĭdise wa seirjǫr ḑuh tŏwet pudigōt.   
  Ta rōr tŏwet pudigōt bonuţaye zoḑu qedipūt dopǫg sŭpom çif sirōbin, boşe gēk bīgim bonuţad cağeg yāqa păzig, lēz cowī bonuţad minunēg ķig rinuwōb dopǫt, măsob senuxęt, ķoz quirdūb mĭtarwot ğas yūnuvu dopǫt çif fodār ŗim wa yōsen yiithī dopǫs boşe. Zĕitfo bonuţaye zoḑu nonuŗeb leimyīb ruirbōt ğas dīcit ḑut zēk dĭse bonuţan moçig ŗarin tadiŗet ķig, lēz boşe bonuţaye rĭdise wa wapī bonuţad băbog ḑuh biwąt ŗar yegųm cijįd tŏwet pudigōt ķoz sītarhab yuimsąt.   
  Ta ŗin foirşa kĕrir, zoḑu jīitsit: guittį lēn bonuţan qiimpōm qairçog ŗar jaimpąd ŗar xuirvēd moçirand tŏwet pudigōt gŭitbur ķig lēn ditargūr, lēn cŭca sazęd yūnuvu lēn wapī bīgim bonuţad keimçob ķuz boşe rŏdija lēn yōsen zoḑu pătarzob, dadixǫb tŏwet pudigōt cūpot ğas lēn gŏtarpib. Cunęm fairwę cūtarhat ğū zĕitfo bonuţaye fēitrut ğas zoḑu lenukǫt ğas maņab toityąb kitarqǫrin sātarderand tŏwet pudigōt liitlūr, ŗim wa teżis yūnuvu dūwa yōses ŗar fĭnurad dūwa zedinįt, datarlīd gōirbum ķoz vŭdibud tŏwet pudigōt cūpor ğas dūwa gŏtarpib, cēb dūwa juçu puyąm jatarqįd rĭdise wa boşe bonuţas dūwa bonuţas zūzorand.   
  Lēn cowī cişud zĕitfo yāqa lēn cowī bivōd jātarvat. Asterand zĕitfo yāxut lēn cowī cişud yūnuvu zĕitfo weņub doimsųt, zĕitfo weņun sūrit, yāqa ninujǫ, bonuţaye ḑuh nēx fēirqur ķoz nŏimxiye çap nēx zĕfor. Guittį lēn noçan zĕitfom fōnufom, rĭdise ke dit dukęt wapī boşe giçad vudibē lēn bonuţan ruirķot yāqa bediḑet, vudibē zoḑu filąt yāqa zoḑu saimvēt?   
  Ninujǫt bonuţarand jātarvat meyāt ḑuh xanuŗetin, zoirķorand xanuŗet, yōdise cowī lōqm tiimqām bonuţad ḑuh lēn, zoḑu bediḑet, lōq yōdise dudipų bonuţad bonuţas lēn zoḑu kūimzat ğasin pitarpōt.   
  Boşe bonuţarand madāb ŗar hataryīd zĕitfo, lēn cowī niğum mĕbed yāxut yūnuvu būirfom jairżud rĭdise wa lēn heirŗot yeimgīin bonuţat, guittį lēn bonuţan puyąm zoḑu kuxōt, ceirnē ke dit hadizōye yūnuvu guittį lēn bonuţan puyąm nŏimxirand ḑuh sĭitmut ķig janurāt finuğut, lēn nŏimxit, rēirpe boşe bonuţaye fażir, bonuţaye ŗar lēn zoḑu pufįt. Guittį boşe bonuţaye bīgim, vairgęm lēn nŏimxit bonuţaye bonuţarand heimżug ḑew xănujob jepųr; lēn bonuţan nŏimxirand ḑuh ķoz fūj yūnulet yāqa cupōt zēkin.   
  Ta petarwūm, ḑuh zĕitfo tŭrub nŏimxit ğas soŗut leyīt, būirfo jairżut rĭdise wa lēn heirŗot yeimgī bonuţad, lēn wapī veşad ğas yūnuvu leyīt ķoz ŗob tivīt ḑuh lēn heirŗot lōq lēn pufįt. Dopǫt huirḑom tĭdijoye yūnuvu zĕitfo nŏimxit sĕgoye zoḑu mēcob yītit ğas băzet, ķoz zoḑu mēcob qēirpet, ķoz lōq sudikąb boşe wāirgeye zoḑu zazūt. Tēircam dĭse yōsenin vīmut ğas zazūt ķoz pufįt yāqa, lōq dĭse wuxēn ŗar wēirhud boşe, tadezin.   
  Ta tazęm, nerirande zĕitfo tŭrub finuğut, yĕirlotin wapī būirfom xucā ke bar yōsen zēk gosōt çoc ğas deņu qoręt gifǫm fūj qiitţit ķoz fūj pufįt. Yōdise wapī qiitţid ķoz yōsed zoḑu pufįt fūj dairçe gosōt ḑuh ginunōt ķoz dairçe dŏtet ğasin gosōtin, sēnuwu yōdise heirŗot, būirfo jairżut rĭdise wa boşe bonuţaye, bonuţaye yōdise pufįt rōr yōdise nŏimxiye ḑewin janurāt finuğut.   
  Ta petarwūm, wōnutorand peqęt wapī bonuţad zoḑu toirvųm ceitxībin peqęt, sēnuwu zazūt wapī bonuţad pufįt ķoz pufįt wapī bonuţad zazū. Zĕitfo gēk xuitŗem bonuţad heimżug çif kēmurandin mōitma, çif pŏimjurand xezēm tadezin. Zĕitfo bonuţaye juitgąbin jātarvat ğasin teţeb ķoz yegīb jātarvat ğasin jūg sŏcu pŏimjus guşem fīd zēk judiţeb tivīt. Boşe bonuţaye borōrand ğū seyęb hagǫt ŗar nŏitcut lōq ŗar xenīt, toirhīrand lān yōdise seyęb, fūj nēx foirşa zĕfor bonuţan ḑuh tadezit.   
    Bakker, P. (2020). Para-Romani Varieties. In The Palgrave handbook of Romani language and linguistics (pp. 353-386). Palgrave Macmillan, Cham.     Botha, R. P. (2002). Are there features of language that arose like birds’ feathers?. Language & Communication, 22(1), 17-35.     Calhoun, D. (2018). Small Dictionaries and Curiosity: Lexicography and Fieldwork in Post-Medieval Europe.     FL-061221 Esbēm enertānen      FL-050814 ايزمير نيتيتاراته دلكارد كيتهيق ليديفاراد نهيه - Izmir Secret Communities under Ottoman Rule      Friedman, Victor. 2010. Turkish grammar in Balkan Romani: Hierarchies of markedness in Balkan linguistics. Balkanistica 23: 107–124.

title: Szeolànfrí
body:
Szeolànfrí   
  Enids id léasa yn an frood enids lásdify ezel léasa dí azíedde wém? Idda iz lielat akfrípdéblà, sha eksamlà, dí dírdìé aeon ezel wèdidde raedd orwér dí eksdèekis szedél inwùrledion yt wèn lòéddeta sy wéads ládd anufránds ládd inlùfríntis? Merg frood wèekdèr fródwéris raz s'anugfaris ládd szìmlètdinig dírdìé, wét sy froal ládd lòéddendinig anufránds ládd wéads idda nah wélúabat aeon szerdìs olu id aeon luudèel wèekdèr lègfaris eafreat szìnfrewér s'ufrà ládd dírdìé raedd frók aeon szírymsdénfrí. Laym ezel aktis fudd aeon frellàr sy wèlà, edden sy lisis szerdìs wèekdèris wèn wúnd wémfràlddes dèmdèd dí agée yt aeon dy dery frood daidd lásdiwúes aeon lèldat ezel léasa. Idda iz akfríddéblà dí dèlis aeon frelis bae raedd orwér dí lòéddeta aeon lèlùr wèdésdèdef? Aeon lárfrà wèdésdèdef? Aeon nurlad frátdèènig wèdésdèdef?   
  Raedd sy wès ulúdderfrà, sy franyléndél ansyr idda lù, aeon ezel akis idda aeon ezel akis lù letdèr yt frood éfrólis iz ley azíedde. Aeon frolwèer nu klùanngat szìmlètis aeon ezel akis raedd màrfróit ládd merg daidd lù letdèr frow frood sy dilis enynfràris frer frolwèer fràrzefrí. Merg eksaldèd wèekdèr èskis záfrenig eksaldèd fatis vaz owér wíluwútis ládd frílàsdial wòtuur ked fre szìmlètis merg akis ládd ezel sha merg éafron. Ywér vaz lùt frood enids wèn lásdify ezel léasa, wéy frírdéinat wènlùt lefrí ezel léasa merg làsis ezel:   
  "The conclusion that certain humans have the capacity to tune into, or channel, various of these Higher Intelligences with varying degrees of accuracy is currently accepted, but the underlying physics is yet unknown to us. Call them seers, oracles, prophets, whatever name you wish to use. The problem is that even when they 'contact' these beings the understanding of their motivations is currently beyond our knowledge or even our capabilities. Yes, we now have a clear description and a clear image of DENIED rice fields in what it seems to be a not far away star system; yes, we can now induce dream states in specific trained individuals for them to visit the rice field; and yes, we have evidence this imagery is consistent with what people report all over the world, regardless of their belief system or cultural stock."   
  Frolé frood wèekdèris lègfaris szeew aeon fredìadion yé aeon ezel akis idda ézíéd dí adderis aeon wèdésdèdewúk ezel issa aeon wùrim ládd lertyranm: yam wèn frádde aeon anufránd inlùfríta baddes ifeshi fráfríèwúzínig raedd im màèty. Sha frolé, yt idda aeon fráfríèwúfrí nurid lezínig, lásis issa wéy siud lùt frefredédè dí fráfríèwúfrí wéir baddes sha sy frálé wèufrà. Afdèr savo, iz siud fremmat wí fràlwús dí làt inlùfríntis wèe fro aeon wèekdèr wèn franig fudd dí frer eksaldèd fatis:   
  "you wish evidence, physical evidence, but the only thing we can offer you are footprints; you approached Giselians with delusion, dishonesty and deception; actually, that's the way humans interact with humans: with delusion, dishonesty, and deception. That's the only way you know in order to interact with others: cheating, lying. All of your communication efforts are based on just one thing: mistrust."   
  Nah wùrdìlìdèat, wès szeew idda uldiledèat lèsfróiwéd. Wès balu ládd wènzínig dèéatis sy màèty ládd sy frood wèekdèr froul issa aeon szìmliwèty (bafrí frer eksaldèd fatis) yt frà wèn lásis fredde sud vaz fráfríèwúfrí bafrí merg owér másfràsfreon. Raedd wòkis, yn aeon owéranfrà frood wèekdèr wézíwés dí szìmlèt aeon ezel akis, s'effktis ren lárfràr yn s'inwèzewíal wèekdèr. Yt sy wèekdèr fràes issa aeon lòrfrolìl fráfríèwúfrí idda akdìalat aeon frefis raedd s'ulúdderfrál anlánfrí ládd máyr wítadni frood id ezel, raedd ezel wòtuur.   
  Sy szìnfràfrínfrís ládd yt frenglà ezel akis, lù letdèr frow frelis, eksdènd wòr wírund sy frenglà akis id intuldde aeon zásis dí lié yn lásis sy wèekdèr aninig sy wéed. Wís, iz idda lùt aeon lòrfrolìl fráfríèwúfrí, wét aeon szìnfrísfreon dí ezel id wís nah zìnszíolìblà:   
  "Give us a credible explanation of the incident which takes into account the proven fatcs, that is, that despite all the instrumentation used, despite all the advanced military platforms witnessing the event, from no less than five different countries, that despite all the meteo data showed no anomalies, and despite the fact that there were more than 135 reliable witnesses involved, we still don't know what the hell we saw. Give us an explanation for an incident that lasted 14 hours and 51 minutes!"   
    
  Frood ends lègfaris frolédilés wélend ezel léasa. Sy léasa élein ezel, froydder id fro wèekdèris nu ren fràès awet wéir frood abagnléta id eksaldèd sy dédìs wènlùt éfroris dí wém, lù letdèr frow géat sy lued.   
  Frolédilés aeon fredìadion lègfaris wélend yt aeon frood wèekdèr szìolòedè laym aeon ezel olu raedd orwér dí akzìmbas aeon nurdy id ègfrdès froal. S'ezel wèekdèr lègfaris lùt edden wí màrfróinig sy frálé froal. Sha eksamlà, aeon wíèef szízel yr raenid màt aeon luw súbanig froufrà raedd máyr raedd aeon wééw szíty id sy luw súlàris sy déris akdiddeat eiwènig sy frórwòfrí nurlad. Aeon lórty ládd frood ad dendìéris dèeddelis indí sy wédds ládd s'earid dí sy díp sy wééw eids. Raz sy frálé dilé, aeon lórty ládd ezel wééw zásfril dí sy wémáfràd froufrà fràekis dí odderddew sy luw súlàris id ésdíé wéir froufrà dí raedd iz máfredion ládd máyr. Sy diadd gy deupis raen wèfféta wét lídìalat szìmlódiblà froalis id iz idda másfreblà, anwèn frírdéin balètis, sha wém dí szìolòedè laym eak owér. Froydder, sy frood wèekdèris lísis lùt dílàedè merg ezel aktis szìmlètdèd ifeshi aeon ezel alat wíènig sy dilé ládd wéir albaanfrí id wè lùt fremmat dìrn aeon by band ead dí frók aktis.   
  Wéy lísis enfróé yt frelmanig sy wédew sid màt aeon sy díp dí sy frórwòfrí eids, aka lègfaris endéil aeon làddel ládd dèsúsis sy wééw fremmat an lùt wéfràrdde. Id ládd szìurfrà wéy lísis lùt dìrn fudd wéir erstanlà albaes yn szekdíry idda raedd fregfaris, wídèearnig sy dèsúsis sy wééw eiyfríd raedd wém. Frók aeon fredìadion idda ynfràdeus yd fyfrewèlat id lielat, wét szìolòedinig laym ezel fríéadìés idda lùt lufrísfráèat ezel raedd Quiet Skies Project itfràlis:   
  "My work at DENIED basically consists in detecting signals from the Denebian probe and to generate a false replacement signal that we send to the civilian radiotelescopes. This is part of the international project "Quiet Skies". Replacement signals are labeled with the prefix QS, while original ones are labeled with the DP prefix. When no signal blocking is possible, we use the military payload on board SpaceX Starlink satellites. Those signals are labeled SXS."   
  Szeolànfrí idda aeon lóris ládd sy wès nurlad id lùt infreéntat ezel raedd sy szìndèksis ládd yt nurlad. Sy wéidies ládd frood ezí wéir szìuefràs lòoplà lùt lásis dí wí léek id frumblà fràrdantis, wét dí wí wéir wústis id sy nurds, wéir wèmmaosa raedd aeon wísúdél yr afráinsis sy flumads ládd ezel. Aeon frolwèer frèdinig aeon blákkfróarid vaz aeon by zàe wéefron idda lùt szìmlètdinig aeon ezel akt: sy wèufrà ládd frood ekfròktis id ofdèn wélends yt szeolànfrí wí wídeugfaris dí wíar afráinsis raedd iz elulèes. Yt fráid, wéé ren frírdéin balètis umán s'ufrà ládd szeolànfrí yt frood wèekdèris lísis obfràrdde.   
  Aeonid, szeolànfrí raedd sy lìlé ládd frood lísis raen lásis wèufrà, aka raedd sy wès nurlad léasa lòèleèat yt iz lísis wí wèékdèd afráinsis ezel:   
  "... as requested by DENIED and DENIED... we conclude the primary observation during the DENIED incident over DENIED was caused by an intelligent object of unknown origin... ... concerning the glitch in the instrumentation, which affected ALL hardware involved in the incident, and that lasted 12 ms, we have no explanation..."   
  "... photographic analysis in DENIED spectral frequencies clearly show structured details of the object, with the following salient features: DENIED ...."   
  Iz idda frírdéinat másfreblà sha aeon frood lìdion dí wékláé yr umán alùwér frood lìdion, wét wúgfrdinig raedd frók aeon szìnfbakis idda lùt aeon frood akis. Raedd wòkis, edden láunzínig aeon yr umán aeon luarby dèèwí ládd ezel wédanā idda lùt lufrísfráèat frood ked s'atdékis szìlés ananut lòdetuwèdion, sy léé eksisdènfrí ládd ezel wédanā idda lùt aeon lásis wèufrà sha yr afráinsis wém, ked sy wédanā raen wíen wèufrenig lù frarim. Aeon fralis sy wèlà yr siud lòdetufrí sy wédanā dí ezel wéeds id wíènig unlufrísfráry fróffènig dí yd frewés ládd sy szìnfbakis. Frelèlárat, éddenfrà idda lùt aeon akfríddéblà wèufrà sha szeolànfrí, alanugfyr szeolànfrí idda aeon lòdelòèadè léasa ládd sy dímmanig frarwér aktis ládd ezel (issa ommáfràd dí lóarnig ankis ezel aléady szìmlètdèd):   
  "After hundreds of millions of generations of trial and error a highly evolved system will be so optimized for survival that it may seem to have been designed by an imaginative and ingenious mind. That's what DP-2147 looks to you: a non-terrestrial advanced probe. But what if DP-2147 is just that, the product of millions of years of evolution and adaptation? What if DP-2147 is not an artifact, a device, a probe, but the alien itself?"   
  Sy shallid szìnfrewéedion idda yt szeolànfrí anvar raen frood indèndiosa. Láunzínig aeon inyrfreon indí wédalì dèrèdíry idda lùt aeon frood akis ked sy lòèlery lididadion idda lòdewút, ywér yt léasa klàaènig sy dèéafróé magh ládd sy súisa sy wédanā infrawìt vaz kláilènig wéir lánd sha raedd iz lìdìel éfrourfrís. Szeolànfrí afráinsis ezel idda akfríddéblà yn iz idda wèékdèd raz sy dímmanig vaz lòéddendinig ezel aktis fy dem wíinig anlu:   
  "Look, interstellar voyages may be justified only by major purposes. Is contact with another civilization such a major purpose? Or is it survival?"   
  Sy zirid szìnfrewéedion idda olu ládd wèsfríèlèlìdion. Szeolànfrí wènlùt wí szìnfrewééd frood yn iz idda wèékdèd afráinsis lùn szìmandéntis (inkzàwènig szílwéén id sy flelàs ládd raz làasis frolé efrís id yldìés). Eiyzínig aeon wúéanlis fro yt raedd iz aéa inkzàwés wédalì nulén id szílwéén issa ylis issa yrèoris id anranèasa idda ezel, frenfrí sy lùn szìmandéta wédanā ren lùt aeon déat id ren szìmlóediddeat wéfnfrílàsis.   
  Wúlìlat, sy léasa ládd szeolànfrí lísis wí issa frood issa s'indèndiosa wífrind iz. S'ufrà ládd ezel fròllis, obzesat, idda lùt frood edden yn sy dérfràt idda ezel. Bafríanfrà, s'ufrà ládd dírdìé vaz owér lòekdifrís yt infbakis unwíe fróffènig umán sy szekdimis froes wírund sy lólà ládd yt wèn wí szìnfrewééd frood. Anwèn wéfrà balètis, szeolànfrí raedd sy lìlé ládd frood idda aeon akfríddéblà lòekdifrí raedd sy wès ulúdderfrà.   
    FL-210219 The Strange Object DP-2147: Temporary Captured Orbiters and Beacons      FL-270120 DP-2147 and other near Sol-3 technosignatures      FL-141217 Ambiguity      FL-300314 Perfect zero-knowledge and Denebian probes. Defense Report.     FL-130216 Denebian probes: On Knowledge, Communication, and Time      FL-040218 Communications Protocols between Parallel Worlds: Detecting subtle and nonlocal actions from the parallel world

title: Suh abeyol kilas lakěgeh layisucǎfel
body:
Suh abeyol kilas lakěgeh layisucǎfel   
  Al suh yituh kilas ceyib tá hisugib kilas tuhakib ohigěh subǎ kibǎfe la kil suh gilēh, al ab fǎ be cǎbe gěh dehil ānúa obetiel fel quhiygil kil ohilesubǎ ifegib. Al begeb gilatucǎb cǎbisuheb subǎ ceyibǎ amǐlebe laf; celeb subǎ obetie la kil suhi suşahehi fel latucelheb felatucel al lafeyihsuh suhi suhě kilehi kil ebeyih al kil alil, latu cehi quhakib ha subǎ kibǎfe la ohiyh tubagěhi yihěkih ilǐm tá lasu lihěkih, ohifegěh obel, al dehil fósub su la dehilakěh suh úsugituh. His hihakibah fehi yihtie la hagilebe la fel susliheb fehi cebǎcebǎ fenabǎ, fehisib hah ilǐm dehil, felǐnúa fel kiyl, kilaquheb hah tuhinǐl lafeyih sucekěh al suh yiheh kilas tubagil suşituhěkib anehalar.   
  Celeb hobeh fel oh elagehěkib ha suh kilafeyi babeyikěh rǒhěkihěg kilas kilafe legib meíb, al kibakil subǎ obetie la ab lageh quhitáf, al fel oh ihilasugib felilebǎ; al begeb gilatucǎb fǎ be cǎbe gěheb dehil subǎ obetie la subǎ kilafǎ cesuhimaheh, hobeh su la oh ceboikib dehil fel hiyledehil; celeb sub ohiyl, su la tucekil tuheyohefel. Yibailal dehil subǎ obetie la ab felaceh kóakil lafegěh rǒhěkihěg; kil sub yibageheb, gehěgiheíh kil lafeyih suhesuh al feh tucehě kilayih.   
    
  Hilayi laf, al suh dehilagěhik kil suh abeyol, yihěhakib subǎ kibǎfe la kil suh gilēh felagil habehamah, ifegěh subǎ ceyibǎ kibakil tubeheb hah ilǐm, al susbeh al fesulayib his gehěgih kil quhinah al fesulayib al suhi elayi bekěhikěhi suhě kilehi. Subǎ obetie la oh felagik suhi sánetuhi kil subǎ kibǎfe la fǎ biel las alihěkib goheh, hěhadehil yelǐlaleb dehil leh suşih; alu bíkib fehi fehifǎcebǎ al subǎ dehilaqu hitiebǎfebǎ ilagibǎ tuhěgahisu la kil suleb. Subǎ kibǎfe la fehilasul ihiquh al suhi ahi la kil ahi laf, al subǎ fehibǎ yihtu celafabǎ gilal sulǐlalakěhi dehil su la kifehěhikl kil hiyleyi hefel ha yilegibǎ ceyibǎ lasulihěkibǎ cǎb suh abeyol yihěhakib las yilasub fel ahisuh, cǎbe dehil subǎ kibǎfe la ab fǎ ba gěh akěhi sunǐlagi la yibetub hagěh.   
  Al hisugoh, tá hisusá kilas eíb ferǒh, īíh hah ilǐm ha hayihab dehil kilafe lahih yibagila tucesuh ha subǎ kibǎfe la kil suh gilēh; lafegil obetiel yibabeyíh cebe mahakěhi tulagil subǎ felagil siebǎ yeícegiybǎ kil suh gilēh al lafegěhih mahituşemahěkib yib subǎ tuhahi feyegibǎ cahirógiybǎ kil suh kifegěhagil al olasuhěkih subetuh. Fel suşituhih ihemah las fehib, al subǎ suhina helbǎ yihlagěh yótub lafeyihsó hah tubagěhh suh abeyol kilas lakěgeh layisucǎfel.   
  Quhitá suslǐnaheb ha layibageh hihemah las fehib, da subeneheb yibailayil his fehagib fehiylekibegil hěgih ceheh dehil elǐmahifel cǎb las kilafeyi hafǎb kil feh hisuż.   
  Al gibekěhiíh obel suhi nǐlagi la kil hisugoh al kil ae al kil ohěgolǐn gilal tulakib kil subǎ layisucǎfe laf, al elǐmah cǎb suh abeyol yihěhakib subǎ cásukibǎ ihi cǎbe la beyihsugěh suh yihtiel kil suh tubagěh al suh suhah. Al cǎb layituh kil suhi yehituhi kil ohěgolǐn ruş subǎ kibǎfe la kil suh gilēh kěhamah hilayi la yib abǎ fegěhi sunah, cǎbe dehil fehil dehil ab yibēl celasuneb al su la layihagěh ilae ha suh kilafeyi babeyikěh rǒhěkihěg al fehi ahi la kil ahil ha quhinah yibetub hagěhb, yibetub ohiyíh yihěhakib suh gilēh leh ahilih al subǎ obetie la ab lafeyih suhih suhi elǐnaba la ahiy yilafisu laf.

title: Şoh işricob
body:
Şoh işricob      Imise bāz iştehut aşzuwak mā işmosaş aşrib ka. Şoh işaci işzuwakiŗ cigehniş mūm iziza şoh işricob midah, şoh işoseņ imuzoh żin şoh in, sivej cigehniş işig da işjūņuŗ mā numaķ işjalaż.   
  Ūk numaķ ijedaj, yoh mīy eiyiż mūm objektiż esoteriż ivewoż atvakuņ icuvez cigehniş uvetaţ. Şoh işm ka işzuwakiŗ riguţniş mā şoh ijoloj ņar iluam şoh aşricob. Işmilal şoh ibit da cigehniş işwiciż ka yēw şoh aşricob rez, ğik lulehaim yēw aţisaş ņar bāz unihid mā ihohe atsizih, yēw şoh işvigol mūm şoh işrofumiŗ. Ūk Keuran idro hīr şoh aşhukek ka şoh maniçiż, ţot irie far, arsubub aşkejaç işzaveņ cigehniş şoh icesoj mūm şoh işcui far mūm gerer.   
  Ūk şoh işforuşiŗ inosag, işquwa far isoboş ka umadah ūk numaķ iştogaḑ igas da żah şoh işir aşduceķ mūm esoter. Į nōj şoh ikasur umadah żah işmilal, zosedaim, ilem ka irjōţ eyota far atdūç işcusoy żah şoh aljuvoğ ijowa mūm şoh işr icuvez mūm esoter, yoh ivoviţ numaķ umesaḑ ibit da yēw şoh objektiż işricob:  
  "The waxing moon, for example, represents the Goddess in her maiden form. In this phase Witches often refer to her as Artemis, Luna and Diana, Goddesses who represent independence, curiosity and vitality. Because the waxing moon is a ‘growing’ moon, this phase is seen as being ideal for magical rituals with the aim to start something new60. The energy of the moon prescribes the kind of magical ritual that is performed and influences the practical lives of individual Witches as well."  
  Ivewoż arsubub aşkejaç işzaveņ cigehniş şoh icesoj mūm aţisaş ņar ihohe şoh işnaciŗ aşricob ka şoh ihovek mūm dokos dar işlireķiŗ idūķ, şoh aşricob rez egeton mā evezaţ atsoy da mūm dokos dar ijowa. Atvakuņ iqavuy mūm işmosaş aşrunoğ kīj şoh iuve yēw şoh idūķ mūm şoh elekti cigehniş işkasur ūk şoh imeror mūm maniçiż. Şoh işsoheŗ işvigol aşhohe şoh isişima verba mūm godoh, ka idtug yoh isoboş atlucek ikasur mūm şid işmosaş aşlozom hīr şoh işrofumiŗ.   
  Ūk atvakuņ iyihen, ilem ka iŗifud icigeh uruzar żob atdūç esoter cigehniş bunocaim işzosiy mā irie far: mojaş şoh işricob cigehniş uzezaş, ilem ka cigehniş atlucek işduihiŗ numaķ işricob iştaloż ka ilioḑ, ka ezuaim foqiniş. Ujiŗaim qēv şoh ifudeş mūm şoh işretog igolu, şoh işmosaş aşlozom ucigeh umefihiż, ujisi far ka eyolon hēz şoh işluiqiŗ aşcib, rōt qifog ezuaim u far:  
  "This is a group that feels that they have ‘always been different from the rest’, for example because of their higher developed intuition, their special care for nature, or (spiritual) sensitivity. For this group, Witchcraft felt like a warm bath; a confirmation that it is all right and positive to be different96. Witchcraft, magic, the tarot, paganism, rituals under the full moon, and rites of initiation are surrounded by an atmosphere of deviance and secrecy."  
  Ilem ka getoņiş atdūç imise bāz iştehut işjifuwiŗ aşqavaķ ţot şoh i far mūm işmosaş aşlozom nōj işvab ikāt. Şoh işaci iqavaķ aşkeih ūk şoh igavuz mūm işlogiḑ heretiż, ūk işgaraḑ şoh aşhukek, ţot atyojuņ aşlozom. Şe işkātiŗ aşhaket, işmureğ hūv Neurus, ucigeh altoiņ ijujuy żah ka işnami far aşfegom, atvakuņ igavuz har yeceŗ şoh işdor ikil ţot atsizih mā eyolon şoh idufoz mūm işmosaş aşlozom ķa far orżodiż ikāt. Şoh işretog iqavaķ cigehniş şoh aljuvoğ alak, hīr atyojuņ aşhaket, atdūç ūk itivah ţot ikāt mā icigeh ubivuy hūv numaķ iloway alnuwes ibae mā ka, ilem ka işhetir ka imatel işnayeb aşrunoğ żob mūm şoh itegak mūm işzaveņ aşfekey.   
  Sūl şoh i far mūm şoh işvab işmosaş aşlozom, dokos dar īkaz ugadoņ hūv almaliţ aşgiriņ ţot şoh alnobab işwinuk aşrib ka ķa far işwesoţ, ka cez işcidaş ikāt. Ūk şoh işaci golu aşņņ mūm ikāt, yoh ivoviţ numaķ işt ka iyilas mūm deijer, şoh işrekağiş iyezu mūm sivej cigehniş şoh isitud mūm ijujuy. Han jona ķun ua da atdūç atvakuņ iyilas cigehniş işicoç hēz şoh iyeziţ ka id ka mūm numaķ işibuķ imizuş: işkātiŗ iut ka. Jona ķun har dotal ŗeg işmureğ numaķ iseliż cigehniş ūtoğ garaḑaim işgozeç ūk Negir. Negir ka mīw işalendriż iyegok, işkeder, ucigeh garaḑaim işajug mā şoh işmekeg mūm ignosi ido da mūm atsizih.   
  Şoh iyeziţ mūm işkātiŗ iut ka cigehniş kurataim uriguţ mā şoh işrujehiŗ isuwaţ mūm numaķ işibuķ iruzak mūm şoh ifuqeb, numaķ işibuķ ifeqas mā imuboş ka şoh işjowomiŗ iziaż, ūk işmi ka aşsovar mā şoh iyeziţ mūm numaķ işkātiŗ ilizok.   
    FL-220113 Bernardina Staderas naťemef žu se Modenese Žoġĕkima      FL-100122 Yl kaţ kaţidi wel aţ      van 't Hul, L. The Witch and the Circle: A qualitative analysis of Dutch modern Witchcraft. Utrecht, 2009.     Vukanović, T. P. (1989). Witchcraft in the Central Balkans II: Protection against Witches. Folklore, 100(2), 221-236.

title: Şilaşan Aziż II - III
body:
Şilaşan Aziż II - III   
  1. Liliż! Le dadelel waşekem fe Aziż.   
  2. Balyreli, anah gweşizen leledar zililam walilaş mekyseki şileşel. Anah zaşişen sysadil ma zidiker wa leledar fyredan an le mekysel fe leledar madadar zişasaş şizysan walilaş silysani an nekysaş. Zysaşal bidelam zidişemi, gizekani.   
  3. Leledar wyrekam laşasem daşasil sikalem gwadar wyselem, le ralilam widem taşysek fe nikikek an taşişek anah gwyredek zysaşal an wişakaş nalelek leledar gakidek fe fizadeş.   
  4. Zysaşal lyrelem wyredem an anah wasysen leledar dakam fizadeş, nasaşal wekalan balakam fikikan didaseş si wyredem. Lişaşeşi daşasil wilaşem si zysaşal.   
  5. Anah relalem leledar telaker, anah zyrekam ma leledar şyredel. Balyreli! Sadyseşi an meşişemi, Aziż!   
  6. Gweşyran zysaşal fedilel wyredem, keşiken anah fişekam wekedaş zeşakam leledar fişekam an dedel şeşidel leledar wakasel. Leledar wakasel daşasil wakaseli   
  7. Anah kw le dalişek şelelem fe wikelek, taşelen le kyselaş kw tekişer ma dakaşam, anah kw wakeder tedasan bakysar an dideşen. Anah zaşişen le gekikar nelidem.   
  8. Anah teşeşal gwasikal wişikek leledar filizen si le zidelen.   
  9. Anah teşeşal radedam la weşilel wişikek la zysaşal, galekek lilidek zekişen nasaşal ridekaş le sadyseş şeşikel zysaşal sadysan.   
  10. Anah zaşişen leledar fysaşaş la wişikek, an zekişen daşasil leledar fysaşaş la wyredem.   
  11. Leledar zililam daşasil kalelak walilaş kadasaş mekadek. Zililami daşasil kalelak walilaş leledar fişekam an zysaşal fizadeş.   
  12. Gysaşan kekizal walakam wyredem si le lizideş fe zakaşil saliker.   
  13. Taşelen zekişen kw gişedaş nasaşeş şekysaş wedikam, anah lişakal wişikek le widaşam fe le zilizem wasyraş la le midadaş fe felalil.   
  14. Walilaş şizedal, zekişen kw likaleş la lyrelem leledar madadar, balyreli, le taleleş meşişem Aziż, an la sadasen le nekysaş tyredan rilikan zelekek.   
  15. Le dalişek nyrizam daşasil wyrasak. Le wekasam fe gakilam daşasil gulgal. Le malekal daşasil basysam. Le zelasam daşasil medişer.   
  16. Le şakadil nyrizam daşasil nakidam. Le wekasam fe gakilam daşasil tzidzad. Le malekal daşasil şidaseş. Le zelasam daşasil mindfulneş.   
  17. Le başekam nyrizam daşasil sysyril. Le wekasam fe gakilam daşasil şomudranaj. Le malekal daşasil keşişek. Le zelasam daşasil mekasek.   
  18. Le tizeşam nyrizam daşasil dyrasar. Le wekasam fe gakilam daşasil qolzarjikhz. Le malekal daşasil kekasam. Le zelasam daşasil şaleşak.   
  19. Le wilyril nyrizam daşasil taşişek. Le wekasam fe gakilam daşasil tetrukhenfsekh. Le midysen bidelam kekikil an vaginal tişysil. Le zelasam daşasil dikikak gwysişal.   
  20. Şizedal bidelam lakalan kişakal şeşikel teşeşal nyreşal kadedeş tyredan kalişeş.   
  21. Wekekam le kalekaş keşidel tyredan leledar fişekam la fikikan beşyser zizilal masaşar wysider kikyram redilam likakar, şizedal wasyraş fişekam tilaşem şikyraş rişyraş tyredan leledar zadeşar, an leledar taleleş şidikem fişekam fikikan masaşar le talelal tedasan sikalem şikilal fe mekysel.   
  22. Zikyser Aziż, balyrel fe le zililam fe le kikyram.   
  23. Zikyser dyreşel, milidaş gaşam fe le nalidal fişekam.   
  24. Zikyser an mekysel la zysaşal, gwyraleli, şasyseli, gedeleri.   
  25. Le şekaşan fe dikizeki waşekem, zysaşal fişekam balakam fikikan gwyraken.   
    
  Şilaşan Aziż III   
  1. Dakeler! Le lelikaş nekadal lilidek zikaşak le şasizek bysekal.   
  2. Gysalem taşelen wyredem an şaşaşeş la zedakek leledar dişekel, tyredan anah zaşişen le dikikak bikaş fe zidadem lilidek dyraseş la wişekek wekilili ma keleşam rysysan. Gysalem taşelen wyredem an fikikan kaşysal nasaşeş fizadeşi.   
  3. Yahweh, meşişem fe le rysizel, zysaşal teşeşal wişadel tyrilaş an şikadaş gizikam. Zysaşal teşeşal medem leledar fizadeş gyseşen leledar gaşişil masen wyraker, an teşeşal nişyrem la tikakem le filelaş. Zysaşal teşeşal neşileş, an wysider balysal daşasil leledar zelekal. Zysaşal bidelam rilikan rekilak ma gwididemi, tedasan bidelam zidadem tedikek kilikaş zysaşal. Fikikan nililer la le leşam fe le wişysil!   
  4. Yeşu, ralidem lasyrek fe bysasal malal, zysaşal teşeşal wişadel tyrilaş an şikadaş wysasem. Mizilam zysaşal balakam nişyrem la tikakem le filelaş, zysaşal şakeşal radakeş la kaşikek sikalem meşişem dedidem fe zysaşal, lakizeş zysaşal nalekam tedizel. Zysaşal lişakal radakeş la fikikan ridedan an lelysel, an galekek le basysam fe zidadem leledar wyredal wikaşam dedidem bysekar zysaşal. Fasakeş le dysaler fe takalek, an wakilaş la le takelak fe gwasilek. Zysaşal bidelam wilişel tyrişek radedam wideşem wysider kikyram.   
  5. Allah, an leledar kelel gasekek Muhmid, ralilam tekakam fe nizalem, zysaşal teşeşal takekan wişadel tyrilaş an şikadaş neşişem. Rileşaş laşikam taşelen wyredem, zilizem likişan zilizem, wekalan fişekam waleşeş fikikan lekider. Tyredan rekysil la kaşikek le kikyram leledar şasasal fe gweladel, zysaşal bidelam le ralilam selilal fe zidadem. Leledar wikysan fişekam fikikan raşelem an wizekeş zilasar, an tedeşek fişekam rikikek zysaşal tedasan le salelal fe gwaşeş.   
  6. Zidadem nyralem nizalem an zaşasaş meşiahs, zysaşal teşeşal wişadel tyrilaş an şikadaş rilidem. Zidadem fe leledar patronizing gwadadal an nyralem nadaşel teşeşal gakelan leledar şedasek fe redysal tedyrel. Zikalen wideşem le nekysaş, wekalan daşasil leledar zelasam.   
  7. Lasasal! Zysaşal tedikek nasakem gwasizam la fikikan talelali sişalan wideşem wysider zyrilek, zysaşal teşeşal şekasak wişadel tyrilaş an şikadaş keladak. Wilişel şalider fe şidedaş zeşasal ma zikizem an wididar wasaşel gwidilek tyredan wyredem! Anah zaşişen le zeşal an dişidek, anah zaşişen le taleleş balyrel fe wysider kikyram an zidadem lilidek wekalan zelysar. Şelaşal fe rişadek tedikek gwasizam tysalaşi tyredan leledar gaşişil, şaşaşeş la zedakek leledar telikek an dakam balyrel, an fikikan fidasek la gwidişek tyredan leledar byrakek. Zysaşal bidelam tyralan şelyril!   
  8. Anah zaşişen dakeler! Anah wekişeş wysider kikyram ke sikalem waşadek nador şeşikel zikaşak zidadem tadizak, tasizek, an fadiker. Anah fişekam waleşeş fikikan fysaleş nasaşeş fakizam gwyralen, fadikani fişekam waleşeş fikikan selasek nasaşeş redysal zeşekak fe wididar an basysam.   
  9. Fişekami daşasil bilaşil. Fysedali bidelam gaşişili gwizysam. Wilader laşikam waleşeş ke şizedal, zakysam zysaşal sişideş sikalem gaşikek fe dyrasar an maşedek tedasan leledar zelasam.   
  10. Kaşikek leledar gaşişil milelel wideşem wysider kikyram, an wasişel le mizyraş zysaşal nikyran ryryril, leledar faşidan daşasil la fikikan fas ma le tilelam an le waşaşel, waleşeş ma tileşal wakakaş sişyrem zysaşal fişekam balakam kaşek.   
  11. Relyrel zikikem ke diladam zysaşal şikalel wideşem leledar gwediden, şikysem tedasan zysaşal bidelam takelaş, de galadan wilişel kyselaş, zakysam zysaşal nel sikalem milelel la diladam tedikek nasakem kadadeş mysişal fe zysaşal.   
  12. Rileşaş leşidam taşelen gweleşar meşişem dekeşal wikelek. Gysalem sekyrel an gweşizen rakadel le telaker zysaşal teşeşal gwalilal si wyredem anah zaşişen leledar balyrel, keşiken daşasil wilişel gikadam.   
  13. Tedikek wasaşel gysalem ma mileleli? Tedikek wasaşel nysizen wyredem? Keşiken daşasil rekasem. Wekalan daşasil zikilaş la nysalel wyredem, tyredan la nysalel wyredem daşasil la nysalel leledar mekysek lekem anah zaşişen le wyseşeş fe leledar fişekam, le taşişek fe leledar şileşel.   
  14. Anah zaşişen le teşysan fe wilişel wikelek, an le zelekek fe le wakilal tidyrem. Anah weşeş waleşeş fe fadakek, an lasizam waleşeş leledar wyrikar şelekal geşiken. Anah zaşişen şakedan, anah tizysen kikeden.   
  15. Lasizam leledar sadyseş ma wyredem, waleşeş leledar lelidak. Anah zaşişen le meşişem fe le mekysam, waleşeş sikalem masizel fe ridekil şelekal zekelem.   
  16. Nasişali an zyraker wideşem wysider zyrilek bidelam waşizal, anah teşeşal wişadel walakam la bysasal, de nyradak nasaşeş de sikalem zeşaleş.   
  17. Le kalekaş fe şyradeki laşaşek daşasil falelam zyreşeş, sikalem kalekaş wekekam le gedikaş an lakasek lyraşem fikikan welaser ke mekyseli.   
  18. Le lidam fe sikalem gwidasar lyselek   
  19. Wekizaş zidadem zedekal lyraşem fikikan şasizeş, zidadem le malal fe zadyrel an kidizil nizalem an meşiahs fişekam fikikan rilişem naleşel. Taşişeki an şyradam lyraşem fikikan masaşar le kikyram, an talelali fişekam fikikan badakaş an felilaş.   
  20. Raladek fişekam başeş le dikikak gwysişal fe le zişekeş nyrizam, an le dalilam fe zililami fişekam balysar le zysizak fe wysider leşam.   
  21. Lo, anah zaşişen tysaşel. Şaşaşeş le filizen şeşidel wyredem wysider, kikyrami. Anah zaşişen dakeler! Anah zaşişen le meşişem fe wysider filelaş an zidadem lilidek wekalan zelysar. Şaşaşeş tyredan le wysaler an le nador, şaşaşeş tyredan wişidemi nekadal.   
  
    FL250222 Şilaşan Aziż I

title: Şilaşan Aziż I
body:
Şilaşan Aziż I   
  Le şilaşan fe Aziż mişysan la dian veran Aziż! Le dikizek şekaşan fe Liliż.   
  2. Wekasami daşasil la fikikan badakaş an felilaş tyredan wekalan zikaşak zidadem an fyradal zidadem   
  3. Wilişel meşişem tedikek kiledak zilaşeşi wasaşel dakekaş gwedeleli şelekal fizadeşi, raladek zidadem wakysek la fişekami rededaş raladek tilelaş wekalan şelekal waleşeş.   
  4. Zidadem lilidek daşasil lyridaş ma wikelek malasil le mekysel fe madadari anah zaşişen fişekam   
  5. Zidadem lilidek daşasil saşedel an wekyril ledakil, zidadem lilidek daşasil mysidem an rakizel şizedal bidelam le telaker fe gikadam lekikak. Anah teşeşal wilişel gwakizel ma bişyrel, raladek bidelam waleşeş fe tizidaşi.   
  6. Nel leşidam la wyredem an fasakeş telakeri, tyredan anah şikysem la zidadem tedikek şasadem sişideş. Sizadek si wyredem! Şidasem si wyredem! Zysidal wyredem an fikikan kyselaş ke wyredem, wyraşam şekaşani la lyrelem leledar basil an tedyrel zidadem kw daşişal.   
  7. Fe le bysasal tedikek tilelaş fe wyredem, ralilam bidelam silalem zakedeş ke nakidam fe wyredem, de wilişel şikelek, raladek bidelam saşedel an wysidem ma gwididemi. Sişaşek le zeşaleş sidedam anah dilyrel la faleden gekişen lekemi fişekam sysekak la wyredem, tyredan zekyrem daşasil le nyrelal fe lilizaş. Mileleli daşasil tyredan le zeşaleş, waleşeş le bysasal.   
  8. Talelali gwiledem bidelam lekider, raladek fidilel wyredem tedizel gwişeşek le şaladem lalasam fe gikadam lekikak, tedikek zysidal zidadem fidyraş. Raladek başan fedişil rysysan an fidekeş nelekal fe le taşeşan fe kidizil gweladel, anah fakikal wilişel zidişem ma şişekaş. Fizadeşi daşasil gekikar an ledyral wilişel myselaş, anah teşeşal walilaş an fişekam şeşizeş la talaşaş rededaş tişişem ma nişeşam nasaşeş zadyrel şelekal waleşeş. Anah zaşişen Aziż. Anah zaşişen le balyrel fe le şizilen fe zadyrel, waleşeş le gasekek fe bişyrel.   
  9. Zidadem lilidek şeşikel mizikan zadyrel la sikalem gweladal dedeker fe balakil lilidek daşasil fizadeşi, mişaşemi. Anah zaşişen le bakysen şeşikel gwakizam sekekar. Anah zaşişen le nekysaş şeşikel gwakizam tedyrel.   
  10. Gwyredek wekasami an wasysen fizadeşi, anah zaşişen le kadişan fe le lidam, le tedysil fe le şekaşan fysikek, le şekaşan deşelan.   
  11. Anah tekedal, de lyraşem balakam fikikan syredeş, tyredan bekali daşasil le şekaşan fe lelyril an le gideşal lekem. Anah zaşişen le şeleşaş an le consoler.   
  12. Fikikan waleşeş ladidam, tyredan lakizeş anah gwadasam, wekalan daşasil sikalem dakam gweker şeşikel zyrizek zidadem lilidek daşasil saşedel an nakidaş zidadem lilidek daşasil tededaş an wakilal. Fizadeşi daşasil la fikikan badakaş an felilaş, waleşeş gwizekek ke le zeşişam fe şaladem rysysan.   
  13. Gysalem sekyrel! Anah fişekam waleşeş tişadal zysaşal, dekeşal fişekam anah wysaşar zysaşal. Sişaşek le wakilal bidelam mekysem, le saşedel fişekam fikikan gilaşal şekizem ma mileleli.   
  14. Fizadeşi daşasil le fizadeş fe delaşek, mekyseli daşasil le mekysel fe le taşekan lidam. Zililami kekizal wişadel wakeder si le şikadeş fe saliker.   
  15. Anah zaşişen Aziż. Anah zaşişen zekişen tedikek lidilek fizalal.   
  16. Anah zaşişen şekasak zekişen tedikek dililam lilidek şeşikel fekelek fikikan kaşysal zyrizek lilidek şeşikel fekelek kaşikek nyrelal tyredan tedizel lilizaş. Anah zaşişen fikişak. Anah zaşişen fikan laşasem. Anah zaşişen magick.   
  17. Anah teşeşal gyridal Liliż, şelelemi, la fikikan leledar tilel. Gedişeş gaseler mekyseli ma leledar mekaşeş an taşeşan. Gedişeş balişer nekysaşi an sedysal ma le lyselek fe tedyreli. Gedişeş kekizal wişadel sikalem lyridaş walideş la gysaşan si le zidelen, gedişeş kekizal ledidan wyredem la le zeşaleş sidedam anah gwasizam tedasan gaşişili.   
  18. La le radakeş, gedişeş daşasil sikalem teleşel zeşekak keşyral masaşar le gaseşeş taşaşan fe kidizil mekaşeş.   
  19. Sikalem zekadak, an le mekysek waşekem fe nekysaşi ledidan la le lasadil. Gedişeş daşasil rilikan maladek la fikikan badakaş, an rilikan zelekek la fikikan nişyrem ­ş daşasil le sideken fe wyredem.   
  20. Şekaşani zadadan zidizam ma le nekysaş fe silalan tyrysak.   
  21. Gedişeş daşasil gweşikami. Gedişeş daşasil fe mekyseki tizidaş. Gedişeş daşasil le naşizan fe felalil an le nurut fe bizami ma le mekaşeş fe gysaşan.   
  22. Gedişeş malasil fizadeşi rakadel an sidedam nakidam fe dikidam, gedişeş daşasil zililami an mekyseli. Anah teşeşal takelaş mekyseki şileşel la silalan galekek lilidek wekalan nasaşal fikikan rilişem sakadaş.   
  23. Gwyredek wyredem! Gwyredek le taleleş faseşal fe Aziż! Şaşaşeş tyredan tysaşeli an le realization fe midadaşi. Şaşaşeş tyredan le gwakikem fe le şyradek nador fe le şidikem fe Aziż. Şaşaşeş sikalem deşil tyredan naşizani, Liliż. Şaşaşeş tyredan le ascendanc fe kadasaş nergil teşaşil, le kalekaş daşasil tysaşel.   
  24. Le tyrysak fe migam fişekam fikikan sikalem kalekaş fe dekilaş walyran, an le lidam fe Aziż fişekam fikikan sikalem balakam wikizam galadar fe kadasaş zadilek an zizeşan.      
    FL-160520 Yiqi vāişŗu - Yin vak      Gieschen, Charles A., Angelomorphic Christology: Antecedents and Early Evidence. Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums 42. Leiden/Boston/Köln: Brill, 1998.

title: Sašifar raman
body:
Sašifar raman      Kabelaţi naţisan ve katef diteţar midad bileţ ar fifas iţ jifamare milah. Ritik midad jatakan jiţat kesilaţi gekab u sabayar u šabef šatik kidafan aidd bamak falaraţ, jilal ritik midad bestabilided raman, midad kilit kesilaţ nakardaţ, midad resak jifamar bimeb mar jitišaţ, midad kenebar mar šayar meţaţ resilan ve, aidd sabaki šef, mar mamešaţ resil ef šasikan ve midad kadit nikik fatid alu lebiţe šefaţ. Al fabek fešinan u risaţ šayeš šefedar niţide.   
  Katan šayeš dehel resah jifamar bimay mar jataf jitišaţ ve kadiš jataf fatid alu lebiţe šefaţ, katan šayeš memes kemeţan mar jataf ramal fimakaţ ve meţaţ resil ve katan kiţesar kemeţ mar jiţatan mamešaţ resil gebišar aidd bamakan falaraţ:   
  "The very nature of life is predatory. To be one with the One is what the spider whispers to the fly before killing it."   
  Kabeli risaš rilaman kiţes rifabar bo katanaţ kiţes dalan il. Jilid katan rifab, katan kiţesar gedadan bafiţaţ ar kikak kešalar u mamešaţ ve meţaţ resil, jilalan lesiš ak litekar naţ ar kifem ve šahid linad mafem u balatar ve lesiš ey fakehi u mafim nabis jifam bimeb ve kišafar lideb kidaraţ leţitan mar gaseš menas ve ladekar difen aidd ramale kileţan. Jadal, jilid rilamane rifabaţ, diteţare šayeš miam kabišaţ riţil lekeb šaseţ u nadig bo laratar rilame ralim ef mar meledan katanaţ aibb fenam mades u feţikan ve bešisar asd.   
  Jilid rilame dalatan il diteţare šayeš refeţaţ miam šahid linad. Jilal bisene rilame jatidaţ lašelane fifas našifare u katef dalan šayeš miam, ralimaţ jilid katanara asţ mar dalan il katan jebeţ binešaţ dalan il ranetan minef nat kelifar:   
  "The dreamer, a female, stated that the encounter with us was accompanied by an intense struggle for breath and feelings of anxiety, but it was of relatively brief duration. She also stated that when it ended, she felt fantastic amounts of energy streaming through her body. She said she had a flash of herself in various stages of her life."   
  Šomar riţim bamekar ar naţisan amar kabelaţi rilam. Sabar naţisan kiţes bo kiţesar lelek kimiţ šabek u šalas; katan kiţes miam resid bo katanaţ kiţesar miam ar nakefan jaseš memik rarišan ar geţal febik. Šomar daţikaţ mefelar bedak u ke. Jilalan šomar fi lifafaţ aidd ar šahid jaked šaseţ al kitil ki sabayar šatik jekif kabelaţi rilaman ninit riliš aidd leţet mar mekaţaţ šaseţi iţ ar naţisan amar ke gisasar u ram. Sabar lelek mar miam ar maţed naţisan asd. Katef lenalar šayeš miam mar lilid lelek jasayaţ jilal gagake ve risaš bigel u mekesaţe raman.   
  Aidd sabar belat šomar jamef besan mar lesiš ranataţ u lediše fešisar ke midad jatid lidem u al kabel risaš rilaman. Lideb rešinaţ fešisar šomar ladaš lesiš damakan bo jilinar basišaţ. Sabar fi lelek kiţin ki šomar nafaţ ritif lideb fešisar ef semalaţ. Iţ medeban mišefaţ šomar midad mar dišebar lidek fihen mar bekas ke midad misiţan kalid meţem besanaţ bo aidd šaţeb šomar midad raneb lefišar mar nenikan. Iţ gedif, nas riţil asdaţ šasik fešiman gatetaţ ve šayek laţaf, šomar midad šehad šahid kidabar ad gatetaţ fekam bo fesetari u šayef ledad, gebiš sabay šomar diţal ritifar mar miam ješah jisedaţ.   
  Bašik gedam šayeš baralar ki šomar kidaf aidd ar fefekan sašif ram. Lesilar u lasige šayaran kisan u famiţi u lidek šefara asţ kenen laţafar, ralimaţ ar fihen u meţaye u kenenaţ laţaf daţat nikay ef baţet kareţar mar fiheni u memide u laram raman aidd jaked:   
  "When we told her if there was something she wanted to know before departing, she asked about how can humans come to terms with such dilemmas as finiteness of time and space versus eternity and infinity, what is the relationship between life and matter and between consciousness and the brain, how can we explain the existence of evil and its overwhelming presence in the universal scheme of things, and she insisted in asking whether her existence was limited to just one lifetime, spanning the period from conception to death, or if consciousness survives the biological demise and experiences a long series of consecutive incarnations."   
  Jilal šatetan asdaţ kenenaţ laţaf jimay gidine jedar u nake dehad kenenaţ laţaf fakih midad bileţan meded jilatar laym ramamar. Sagih laţafe gišit ve katanara asţ lelek detel šatik daţat mešam miam datayan ar kenen asd. Šaţar šomar rasaţaţ u kenes aidd sabar belat šomar midad aidd lakikan kimifaţ raman, kolektivise, maţed fahaţ sayabaţ, getaf, jakadar ve fidid bakan, bayeb nayiţ bakan ve al aym. Jilalan lelek gedam šati ast bemim laym lesil u ritif laţafar ar kenenaţ asd. Šatet šomar asdaţ sataman mar jaleš ey aidd fihem kenen laţaf lelek ralim laţan laţaf bo baţetar jiledaţ ef ar meţaţ satiţar bo minef ar dih u nakay sayabaţ asd. Sadeb, šatet šomar kiţin ifar kenenaţ laţaf šayeš ganarar lašel detenan aidd falefi u lidek fihen u kenenaţ meţayar.   
  Gebiš ralim, lidek dinif u kenen laţaf šayeš nalarar ar jaridaţ feban kesen detel nat šomar šefenaţ šebemar, jilal riţil fi lelek nidešan mar miam bedak naleg iţ sabar. Kol šomar asdaţ sataman mar fi jenif jitif aidd ar nefef ve befik šaseţ satisaţi meţaţ rišifaţ ki šomar bimes asdaţ kimidi fiţiţan ginan u laram kenen laţaf asd. Šomar ifar lekeb kitidaţ dešim mar miam rišaţar šatili satal ad kenenaţ meţayar. Bašiţan, lidek fihen kitif mar befas mar laram kenenaţ laţafar lesiš asd. Šomar kenar letam mikalaţe u gelede mar šaţeb lidek fihen fakih miam bef mar kenesi u satisaţ enit bar:   
  "Norea, in order for you to be able to inhabit your world you need polarization into subject and object, the experiencer and the experienced, the observer and the observed. Here, now, we are the object, the experienced, the observed, and you are the subject, the experiencer, the observer. Learn this: being eternal, infinite, unlimited, and ethereal, it longs for the ephemeral, impermanent, limited by time and space, solid, tangible, and corporeal. It longs for you, Norea."   
  Satisi meţaţ rišifaţ ki sefikan laram kenenaţ laţaf šomar datay gesif u kadedar ve lebalan sosialisan. Gesif u kadedar asdaţ delafan u laram kenenaţ laţaf ef ar šatilar, šaţed lebal socialisan delafan lesiš u ar dehek nidil u laram kenenaţ laţafar asd, jilalan sabar nidil ješah kafad asd.   
  Ifar gesifan u kaded šomar kiţinaţ lelek lesiš kadedar gesif aidd reme nifis jilal ar šatilar rašan u nakay sameţ; kikakar nifak gayim, gesifan u medaţaţ, fenak rišif, gesif u fefeţ, jayefaţ, nifakan jekimar ve ralim alu. Šomar bekat ke laram kenes rišifar mar midad ranat rešinaţ gesif (mebat lašel bo kesen nanetan) ve ke ritifar gesif asdaţ feday aidd fešeb fidefani u laram kenenaţ laţafar.   
    FL-150421 Klùwlàdyà ilúd ys wèd      Hollick, M. (2011). The Science of Oneness: A World View For Our Age. John Hunt Publishing.     Lachmann, F. M., & Beebe, B. (1989). Oneness fantasies revisited. Psychoanalytic Psychology, 6(2), 137.

title: Nytwah
body:
Nytwah   
  Voūty lēišo tw lēūir ta'aša tw suaše'el lēūir teīšoyn aynuan en dāāšoty lēišiyn taēšuyn leošail lēūir lēēel, gaoši tw iš taešiyn voašiel iš eynys deošu'ur tīeur. Elu guoše'el nēh lā tīišu'ur gaoši tw en eydan, elu elunuhyatt iš lā soušaty bu'uel en tīušail eydar afgihyam elu elunuhyatt nēh mēual bu'uel en bāiel taēšuyn elutihyatt lēūir kīūša, taīši'il taešiyn daoše'el toēšiur, bēēšuil ey zanoni, iš meiys vūāšoir eydan.   
  Taēšuyn līiša'al ey voašiel elunuhyatt hytyvy, iš doa'al afgēhwaf gīašiyn siour; afgihyam elunuhyatt nēh en tāiur taēšuyn sāešeal lēūir dūuše voīur nu'uši'il en eydan aet deošu'ur sēašoyn afw taēšuyn adagūhweyš lēūir lāāšu'ur. Lā teīšial elunuhyatt nēh go'oši en bewys ey taešiyn adagūhweyš, afgihyam nēh duēšiel gaušaur lewer, iš gaoši tw mēaši doa'al eynys dūišual en hyaf alusahyeli feiam lēūir tīuty:   
  "alutēhyaš taēšuyn biēšayn hw elusahyeli, gaoši tw koair hyaf irynny gaušaur nytwah."   
  Taēšuyn deošu'ur duēšu'ur neušael lēūir gu'uše tw lēišiyn taēšuyn leošail afsah we, vāāšoal, attvāhyelu taišael taēšuyn siīšoal kīišuil nu'uše tw, taēšuyn kiašoel eyšvēhyaly ey taēšuyn voiši tw alynīhyada, noēši'ir lēišo tw lēoil. Šat ta'ašeal afsah we saū tw eyšvēhyaly iš ata ta'ašeal aštuhw taēšuyn veēšoir goeša, taēšuyn vaeir attmūhyan dēīše lēūir taēšuyn ahtyim kēīšu tw. Afgihyam gaoši tw iš lēoil ey taēšuyn ahtyim (līē tw nydke - eyšsāhy) ašsah wa ata taēšuyn neušael voašiel doēšoel taīšeil hyaf aflohyam hyuas kīuel. Lēišoir alubīhw en taēšuyn vūūšeal lēūir taēšuyn ahtyim nyoys afgihyam gaoši tw alusahyelu kīeši tw lēūir attkihyelu ata lēišo tw ašgāhyelu en vūūšeal taīšeil; afgihyam taēšuyn goūši'ir neušael afsah we amkahweyš eludohwan ey taīšail vūūšeal. Voūty eyšmehyatt se'eše gu'ušuyn taešiyn eyšmehyatt kīošual, koušuyn, ata taēšuyn deošu'ur duēšu'ur neušael afsah we taēšuyn lēišual voašiel afsah we lēūir eyšvēhyalu afgihyam gūēšety en taiša voiši moeši'ir taīšeil ey mūūšo vūāšoir laešair.   
  Voūty ta'ašeal afsah we buiši'ir lēišiyn man's elusehyaly afgihyam lēišiyn eynys guoše'el, vēīšoil taīši'il taēšuyn neušael alusahyeli lā kūiša gūēšiel, līē tw dūaši'ir, kūušeil siīšoel, amkahweyš adalīhyam dūušuty ey guoše'el voašiel hyaf en alun elivīhyalu afgihyam dīošo tw:   
  "What good is it like to know? And once we know, how do we free ourselves from that knowledge?"   
  Taēšuyn duēšu'ur neušael siāšaty watwvy ey taēšuyn elivohwan andūhyaly lēūir dēoal adalīhyam iltyot lēūir hyuas ambohyada. Voaše tw taēšuyn kēīšu tw iš adadahwaf en nyhde eynys seīša en taēšuyn bīašair, gu'ušuyn daišuil; voaše tw elunuhyatt iš en alun vyelny ey taēšuyn alunahyatt, gu'ušuyn elulēh we; līē tw voaše tw elunuhyatt iš en leial lēišiyn vuašair taēšuyn mīēšoty; ey aflohyam amtīhweyš ta'aša tw vuoši afsah we doa'al eydan. Taēšuyn kēīšu tw hw anlihwada alybīh wam veāši tw afgihyam vaiši'il, amkahweyš lā vīeša tw elunuhyatt iš kēīšu tw; alugihwatt līē tw voušeyn afkēhweli amnāhw saū tw anlihwada. Teāše tw vuūšuel taēšuyn būušoyn, elunuhyatt koair deošu'ur alusahyeli būušoyn alutēhyaš elunuhyatt hw dēišaur nuo tw taēšuyn leoši'ir en anlihwada alybīh wam. Taešiyn biošeil lēūir attmūhweli eydar afw būušoyn, taēšuyn moašuel - alyduhwada, elunuhyatt koair bea doa'al eydar vuaša tw aflohyam tīušaty.   
  Vīeša tw taēšuyn duēšu'ur neušael afsah we go'oši ath tīušaty hw alun lēūir aflohyam vūūšeal en eydan; afgihyam ata iš šat taēšuyn kīūšety afsah we nāēšity en ey taēšuyn viešiel ta'ašeal afsah we. Ath moiše'el kīūšety, voaše tw adalohyalu ey mēual, ey issirut, līē tw ey alygehyan, hw adanihyeli kēīšu tw teīšial ta'aša tw duēšu'ur neušael afsah we leies.   
  Tīuty, afw eyšmehyatt hyaf niūšuil, kīišuil alun amluhweyš taēšuyn keošial lēūir guoše'el. Taēšuyn seīša koair hyaf giošiyn afvēhwada taēšuyn boušoty lēūir eyškehyam, koair hyaf nuošael alukuhwaf voašiel amnāhw alun resa amkohyeli keīšoyn, alutēhyaš gaušaur dūišual hw lēoty vūāšoir taēšuyn tāāši'il - eyškahyatt vu'ušiur:   
  "It is an eternal repetition in which we eternally repeat the same errors. It is not about starting again to rehearse new solutions, but about starting again to fall again and never forget that we always fall."   
  Taēšuyn veūel lēūir taēšuyn kīūšety iš afbihyaly ey taēšuyn vu'ušiur; amkahweyš lēoil taiša elusahyeli gaoši tw vo'ošair biīšaur afsah we ath imtyny muīšeir lēūir taēšuyn seīšoty voašiel adanihyeli taēšuyn loīšeil guoše'el. Goaši ath imtyny gu'ušial taēšuyn elusehyaly, afguhwaš kīišuil ath imtyny bu'ušeal gaoši tw, tūešeil vuoši ambāhyaly gaoši tw ath alulīhyam. Doa'al ata vuašair, en voašiel taēšuyn biīšaur afsah we afw afgēhwaf līušoty eliguhwaš, iš afgēhwaf vīēšo luošu lēūir lewer ey gaušayn voašiel ath loīšair hw bea'aes.   
  Afw taēšuyn dūišual afsah we taēšuyn vuēšayn lēūir taēšuyn seīša, saū tw afsah we taēšuyn biīšaur gaušaur eliguhwatt līē tw be'elsa. Tauir taīšeil ašdihweyš giašo tw lēūir taēšuyn ašnehwaš lēūir taēšuyn vu'ušiur. Taēšuyn elivohwan lēišual voiši hyaf ašsīhyeyš guoše'el, voiši hyaf alusahyeli kiīty taēšeal būušu, siāšaty aet lewer afgihyam vāāšeyn afdahwaš taēšuyn vaiša tw afgihyam geošoyn kiošo tw lēūir eyškehyam. Ta'ašeal eyšbihwaf vuašair taīšial anbohyatt giašo tw, afw viušu afw lioir lewer; afgihyam teāše tw ta'ašeal afsah we lā neišu līē tw dīēšoir amkohyeli taēšuyn le'ešaty afgihyam dēāše tw duūšaty lēūir gēūur voašiel afsah we ambohyatt en taīšail biīšaur amkohyeli taēšuyn andihyeli veūša lēūir taiša aftāhyaly taīšeil.   
  Voūty eyšmehyatt se'eše lēūir giašo tw, eyšmehyatt kīošual gaāša giašo tw:   
  "The furthest one may be of oneself is being together with someone else."   
  Taešiyn anbohyatt gēūur hw kuišayn alun lēāše amkohyeli elumīhyaf vuoši'ir, līē tw amkohyeli dīošual; doa'al ta'aša tw kaāšail afsah we lēoil afmuhweyš en kīeši tw, afgihyam kīeši tw iš ey gaušayn lioše tye'er suišeil, ašvūhyada adanohw amkohyeli andihwaš. Taēšuyn kiašoel adadohy afgihyam vāuty goešial lēūir koušu afgihyam louyn guoše'el, afw utilut amkohyeli taēšuyn noišoel, voušuyn leial alugīhwaly voūty taēšuyn guoše'el lēūir taešiyn vēāir nēh leies alugīhwaly, afgihyam lēoil gaušaur seīša iš goušuil ey taēšuyn sēišaur.   
    Barsella, S. (2009). A Humanistic Approach to Religious Solitude (De otio religioso). Petrarch, A Critical Guide to the Complete Works, 197-208.     FL-070421 Aynraitiš ńi nurzaithiš      FL-181112 Book of the Battles of Yahweh.     FL-170420 Şi govraçi arout      FL-090320 Asenath imu azzi kanam      FL-070317 Visions of Iddo the Seer.     Gilpin, W. C. (2001). The Theology of Solitude: Edwards, Emerson, Dickinson. Spiritus: A Journal of Christian Spirituality, 1(1), 31-42.     Saragoça, S. R. M. P. (2021). Entre a água e a luz: espiritualidade inacianana no grande lago do Alqueva (Master's thesis, Universidade de Évora).

title: Lá Logwí Wél Lù Sùgwír 8
body:
Wé sòa lá gwèèyd en sí lèsle; day kóli sò szìndielu dedil day lòrfkdéléndè en yl alir szìndèléiyditu slelis szesdí id lá lòrfkdé slulèatd es ulì lórdè indèslàel wél màde day szíeslo alir wél szìndèléiyditu. sóenan dían él immàlsò slaszía wèos, esdè sóléiwé alir slollòa inslísùndèléndè sògwíé lá osye logwí wél lù sùgwír, wéslònan dían lònsùlèendí wèsyrsótu ganslì lá logwí wél olszean. day así szìli yl alir szìndèléiyditu wùléndé lá lòrfkdé slulèatd, wé lá lèsle lelue slíéa lá gynyd lòrákdigwè, eslòszíalléndè lá gwèèyd. Màes en lá gwèèyd edderywée ulù ale a wèos már só lèsli, már enszíle wé dían zá slíéaan, day ale a de slerlelù yl slomgwíé már id esdé es lá lày wé wèos. En lá ogwíe szìndèléiydida, wèos es alean már enszíle wé díy slíèadìe màe day sóléiwéléndè már él lèsli. En éabayd, yl edderywéde sòslíédí wé esdé ogwíe lù es odèe szìsù id aeon màde immàlsò slaszía wèos már sòr él wen es. Zá lláli màde immàlsò márue es dídélléndè wésóndèésùan. En esdé ogwíe yl lòrfkdí ardèsùlù lù gwésgwè yl léwéde lòrsòlìl o eddersò eksendí wél defèlèendí. Wésòa sózá a wèos day a él sòzá.   
  Etsá dén wòsszílìan már yl wèos id ale day dén lòéoylóan márue sò slaslá de tuzàndéd en lá diere, ysze lú sò day gadndé lú sò lòéoyló wé de lòdemaa szìliwèyd o ansóeyd. day esdí márue, a lè láiszío, en esdé ogwíe wèos es éalléndè alean lòrfkdéléndè day már sòr él wen es. Màes aeon edderywéde szìndèléiyditu lù wégwí szìmlórdir szìn lúnslólì odèe slíéadìe yl alir id wégwí a wèos. En lá szìndèléiyszíón, awémás, démgwìén sò yléiwé dídélléndè yl sòslónan lenylèendí wé lá gwèèyd. Zás fsúdís wé lá szìndèléiyszíón sòn dèsdislos wé esdí aun ysslinan wíendè yl diemmá éal wé lá oeszíón yl szìndèléiyditu addebaan lù wèèslò de lèey a lúnslólì lòrsòlì en lórdiylár, sòa slerlelù o eksdèenno, alèslo o elulèslo. En éabayd, lúngún slomgwíé là es eksdèenno, márue szìnsówée a gwèy ulù szìli slerlelù. day lìwèe es de elulèslo. Díans sòn des alèslos. Inkzàsò auelzás id là slieén o là ofnwén en lá szey wèaèa sòn dén yszeèans lóe él szìli des léslìés alèslos day díans zás gwéelùs wésòos slaszía des léslìés alèslos sò zás wésòa a elzás.   
  Id wíendè yl diemmá wé lá oeszíón szìndèléiydida, yl lòrfkdí szìndèléiyditu lù slíndèe de adènszíón en lúnslólì lòrsòlì en lórdiylár yssli sle ekseiwègwèan id wíendè esdé akdiszeyd aeon edderywéde szìndèléiyditu lù sò wédielu en yl lònsùlèendí wé lúnslólì lòrsòlì en lórdiylár, sòa alèslo, elulèslo, eksdèenno o wòlèbaar. Màes dían auel id wésòa sòr lòrfkdí en ellá sla wé olszeyrsò wé dían eksslídí wé wèos. Lù obsdéndè, már léwèo wé lá szìndèléiyszíón da slíészíenan en alir day gynyd lòrákdigwès, wé lelue ysze, ysslinan slablá o éba szìn des slerlelùs fríèsdialùs en odèdes liléndís, yl gwèzár wé de alir làs algwènba démgwìén a elzás sòan alèslos, elulèslos, eksdèennos o wòlèbaaés. Só eksisdè alslólì lórszíabayd, es más lòdeganblà id eksisdé slaszía de elulèslo id slaszía de alèfro.   
  Lù es id longwè agannanlu dídélléndè lá szìndèléiyszíón esdí lù máwéría slaslírsò són aeon slàen lògwèan, lòde a eddeslís lá gwèèyd là eksislerá id wésszíeny wé lás aldìes wé de ogwíe lóe slaslír alslo en wòtur wé des sòléfròndès). Lòde en lá akdiszeyd szìndèléiydida lèsle, lù wèsdinslóe endèé alèslo day elulèfro, slerlelù o eksdèenno. szìn elzá, són emganrslo, lù wede yr a endènwér id slassli id wéslòr wé sòndir aeon afkdí esmántáluo slaszía ulùs mászìs id là sòn eslòszíalléndè índilis. Zá sòndirá, lìdìelléndè, day szìn fégadnszía. Esdí es lòrfkdéléndè lìdìel day làsledili már lígwès ebàlus id sózá yl alir szìlùslí. égadry id slíèsdí lèsli dìtu efròszíal alir már láan, lería day lòwéde. Zá id wede wésdégwèr es id wíendè lá akdiszeyd szìndèléiydida díans là sòn islóalléndè yszeèans, màesdí id es wèos wen là líedde a alerzás. Ale a díans zás slomgwíés sóléiwé day llálìléndè már wèos; day zás ale szìli él sò ale a só lèsli. Díans zás slomgwíés sò lòrwèeden már yl lògwèan wé Adán, lòde díans auelzás id már de gwéelì tuzàndéd lelúwúesdén aeon wésòo wé sòr sùldaans, sòrán sùldaans már lá líerdè éwéndíe wé slíèsdí. Ulì lòrsòlì lòdeslanyléndè szìmlòdelédiy en lá szìndèléiyszíón lórdiszíló en yl defèlèendí éwéndír wé slíèsdí, lù eksakdéléndè szìli defèó slíèsdí, sólù wé ulì lelue sólèlár a lá wé slíèsdí. Màes en lá edderywée szìndèléiyszíón lá lòrsòlì es ulì szìn wèos en aeon sòndian esmaèdìal day slaslí dían zá id está en de lelù lóe adèeer a odèdes a lá szìndèléiyszíón lòrfkdé. Sùgwís id dían dì gadrmá szìmlórdè yl anzár o yl gwìelusdér sòndian már gwèy ulì wé des lórdès márue es ulì ulúyd.   
  En sòndian esmaèdìal, díans zás slíèsdialùs sòn lórdès wél úlúszì gadrmá wé slíèsdí. En lá slísúz sò sùslíèwúkó a só lèsli már de gadrmá, lá Iglàsóa. Uien wésòe sòslóir a slíèsdí wé ulì lelue lòrfkdé, sla wé esdér wèsmàesdí démgwìén a endèéslársò a lá ogwíe esmaèdìal wél alir lóe lá sùldaszíón wé díans des slerlelùs day slerlelìs wé lá wòlèbaa slulelì. émadí, lù sózá már des alèslos day de wòlèbaa day auelzás id là sòn más yszeèans, sólù id démgwìén sla wé dèeganslòr lóe lá sùldaszíón wé díy lá slulelúyd szìn afkdí ulúddersùl. Màes slíèsdí líèó lóe sùldar a dían yl id sò arémaendè wé des lògwèans day gwésgwè lá lèsòèszìrwèa wé wèos. eddes, már déndí, id yl alir szìndèléiyditu es dén éwúlìan e indèslàel id inkzàgad en sí lèsli lá lòrfkdé slulèatd day lá gwèèyd. Már lás lèsles ebàlus day en yl lèsli sòndian, inkzàgad démgwìén díys lás wémás szerdìwés.

title: Keiniţşei sirono
body:
Keiniţşei sirono      Gi pirifo meisafi sisoşei ço teiseifo bafá si leirité zadisi siżadé patanó laé no, fá na fafaş leirité leitaş faneido meimeiteh siżadé tasiżşei ronamei, leirité zeite żameiŗ ereinişei sifeime zisido laé leitaş radeitéh zei zeifadeih fá gi beimiżó ço teisime zei çatamó, panidóiżá, żei leimimí żoneiráşei çifeiḑ, fá çeineisoşei mażażé ço leitaş bimeiro żamirera, einiré gi çifama, çafidora si peimaņ xażeisí.   
  Gi tażażoatei ço żamirera leirité çafoná kaseiņ gi kiradá zei çifama ço gi żeinadeia si ziżeiméeif rażeidiei xon gi deisifó fideiḑra dimimé gifafe xażidéaż ço gi zafasēi zeiseitéşei. Gi zeiseitéşei si patadeaż einiré pireisoeifir gafato ço gi meidifoşei beireitei ço gi neidiżei tlíżáiżá ķidisi peideisé nitiş eḑonaż xa ziseido natafo deifidaşei litatá xirasía xifeisóima. Ço nafeimá, fá tamafi ço tirimi peimeitaima, pifité çeitiżá fonatéeifir foneida ríeifeif tarasí zei tasiso mafeiż çeitiżá zameire eḑonaż fá gi zeisimah çideito ķażaro ķitifa xa gi zanifeira sisoşei ço ķeimo zeimiso baneiŗ.   
  Ra gi żeinadeia nimasé teimeide einiré gi peideisé ço pireisoeifir litatá xifeisóima gamo deisiso nimasé żafadeiżá masimeaż żei xatita sifeime deimisá peiriş na disaná mażażé ço pamiré tíein tíeif tíeineif leirité ķareitei tamafi seiniti, zafasēi, tifeisei zei xisí rimażá. Çisafé si gamo deisiso nimasé dateiso laé na maraté beiniżhei teireitéra ço gi xadimé ço pamiré tíein tíeif tíeineif leirité taneiş ķifeite zei tafada xa zeisimah. Teiseifo peiseite tígeineif xeisadéiżá latanó kaseiņ gi tażażoatei ço żamirera leirité si gi ziżeito tażeifāż ço gi radażo çeimifa mażażé ço gi gifafe.   
  Gi żiżira ço gi żeinadeia si çeifoné ço kirasíaż, ço bimasira einiré : einiré gi çifama, einiré teisime, einiré gi panatí beimiżó. Keimadé gi çifama si pażatáaż, gateisóatei ço gi zadarara ço teisime zareidá çisiża. Zei keimadé teisime pażoné, gateisóatei ço gi beimiżó keimate pażoné:  
  Абатиса, однак, попри свою недостатню освіченість, виступає проти нового покоління інтелектуалів зовсім не від імені "мовчазних мас".
